listened bach wtc year have studiedplayed quite bit disagree previous reviewer almost completely coming home and unwrapping the package i spent a happy hour glued to the tube and have played part of it dailywhat have the bbcs contribution to the commemoration of the th anniversary of bach death a total of separate program the prelude and fugue of book of bach wtc presented to end four different pianist were filmed four different location playing a quarter of the combined workwhile bach outdid in musical offering and in the art of the fugue the wtc deserve the title of old testament of western music with beethoven sonata the new testament the idea behind the original set of program to combine four different approach to bach music with interesting imagerya program of this nature face the impossible task to stand to the three bach program glenn gould made shortly the end of his life two of program a choice of instrument and art of the fugue were carefully scripted medley of bach piece interspersed with meaningful commentary each of the part of this dvd follows the pattern a short introductioncomment the performer followed by the performance we get title at the beginning and end of each piecelets simple about it this is great stuffi have got about cd edition of the wtc and printed version i advise the honorable w e nicholas to get the alfred edition of wtc i keep god forbid to watch these disc for the admittedly lazy perspective of these dvd worked very well the format of spacing the work a little give the watcher appropriate breathing space and allows for longterm watchingabout the performersgavrilovreaders of previous contribution to the amazon page may be familiar with my previous bout of gavrilovbachbashing here i enjoyed him greatly choosing the masque of the new rasputin of the provides each of his contribution with comment that vary the idiotic and the sublime his playing is decidedly romantic many of the fugue become a very static antithesis to gould dynamic vision of bach exploration of the power of tonality yet andrei repeatedly get to the very heart of the matter his sound is exquisite and the camera people a great job in the beautiful walsall gallerymacgregori a great fan of this pianist and i would chose day martha argerich for the predicate best female pianist i adore her scarlatti and bach recording french suite art of the fugue her introductory comment right the money hampered by the at time sonic limitation of the palace in barcelona play bach in her personal style that could be described a a successful blend between richter and gould great piano playing here probably best a minor prelude on record stunning b minor fugue i hope that she will also devote some time to the classic on the soundcircus label that she started after the demise of collinsdemidenkothe wtc ii is presented in a different format the introduction longer show the performer neither address the individual pair in stead we seem to be getting a successful adaptation of the glenn gould sound documentary the idea of northtechnique of contrapunctal commentary demidenkos style is rather inconsistent he reminded me a little of a concert by pogorelich in in which he played a second english suite with a sarabande that sounded like it came from the hand of good old sergei rachmaninov demidenkos c major prelude for example is highly romantic fugue is not yet the piano playing is often at a very high level minor prelude and he clearly know his stuffhewittangela hewitt winner of the sacrilegious gould bach competition is by many considered a the best interpreter of bach music count me her performance here probably represent the best integration of idea from authentic performance in piano lingo everything is beautifully balanced and she the female eye for every detail forgive me the blasphemy but i think that some of the fugue require an itty bitty of a sale pitch and sound a little dry coming from these angelic handsin i greatly enjoyed this tribute to the man and wholeheartedly recommend this edition to familiar with the work the dvd com with an index for each of the dvd hardware enables the impatient viewer to skip comment and title

liner note recording the bach english suite no distinguished american pianist murray perahia make observation the complex harmonic structure bach counterpoint in these piano piece these structure are merely clever abstraction the frustration fulfillment of different musical goal through the deceiving delaying of musical expectation emotional ebb and flow created is never satisfied the piece is finished the structure guide the emotion without which music thus the heart and the mind are united bach genius is to evoke timeless and true human emotion through the purity and spirituality of his writing which ultimately stand apart specific instrumental environment said perahia is indeed superb guide to these score since his playing is elegant refined and thoughtful without the added hubris of excessive emotion instead through his brilliant technique subtly emphasizes the complex harmonic progression inherent in these score whether are example the prelude that begin the english suite no in a major or a simple folk melody like the gigue which close english suite no in minor this is indeed of the best piano performance of bach piece that heard in a recent recording made the classic swiss recital hall at la chauxdefonds switzerland which also the venue of some of the great beau art trio and the last pianist claudio arrau recording made philip in the im not sure that this is indeed a definitive recording of these piece i think that they are quite exceptional and worthy acquisition for fan of perahias recording and bach solo work for the piano

bought several ozeri digital scale like much i bought last one ozeri sent pepper grinder gift thanks first impression wa gearhead kitchen gadget overkill the time i a peppermill a rather expensive one that worked fine the cheap plastic mechanism ground and the trash it went and i reached the ozeri dubious practicality and battery life i have using it pretty much daily for almost a year my assessment the reservoir is small wa the one my dead grinder a far a filling it it is simple remove the base and battery pack and dump the peppercorn in making a funnel palm help i see ozeri had to compromise reservoir space in order to accommodate battery i thought a battery operated grinder wa overkill i mean hard is it to twist the grinder but i can put pepper in the pot still stirring while using my hand to flip the steak i always have to wash my salt mill cooking i expected this to just another battery devouring device i replaced the first set of battery four aa includedafter about month of use my experience the ozeri scale is that the included battery last a long a the one i buy so i expect the grinder to last longer on this second set still not very ecologically correct but not bad and a fair tradeoff for the convenience of onehanded freshlygroundpepper delivery the lid yes have to remove the lid to use the grinder it pop with your thumb you forget to remove it your other hand is occupied just take it off before you begin your cooking session the lid seems a necessity due to the design of the grinder keep the mechanism clean since it stand upright i agree with other reviewer it would be better if it flat so you could set the grinder on it head for filling the grinder plastic but seem to be holding up well the grind is kind of mediumish the size a little inconsistent really just fine for going into a pot or putting on a steak if i need very finely ground pepper i use a spice mill occasionally a particularly tough peppercorn stop the mechanism especially if the battery are getting old i just turn the grinder upright to loosen it and keep going i have never had it jam up and stop working completely the led seeming superfluous at fist is kinda cool i can season my egg in the darki think for the price this is a pretty nifty gadget

update purchased june today may fan longer oscillating cant believe already broken fan price range fan barely the cost of this last longeri contacted rowenta see fix i will update this review i receive a replyi surprise to see heavy this thing is the base it metal unlike of the previous fan had purchased the installation wa a breeze i manage to put it all together minute wo reading the instructionsthe first thing i noticed wa the bright blue led this fan is for bedroom it way bright i will put small decal the led first tuned it on yes on the lowest setting the fan is fairly quiet great for the bedroom and perfect to leave on at night i have tried many fan and returned of the one i have kept the window mounted fan two fan allows to bring in fresh air and take room air however lack air flow they are loud for the amount of air it pushesthe only major flaw for expensiveness fan is that is no timer unless i missing something reading the instruction right i not see an option to set a timeradjusting the tilt of the fan is a breeze all you do is tilt it to the angle you wish it to unlike previous fan you have to turn a knob to adjust the angle which wa useless the fan would point no matter how tight you turned the knob this fan just click placeits a bit overpriced for we get the build quality seems good the only thing plastic are the blade the motor cover the control panel and a knob this thing is heavy btw so moving it and down the stair could be a bit of work for some at the lowest setting it is great for sleep mode you hear some noise at the higher setting but it mostly air noise and not the fan or mechanical soundthe remote is a bit bulky for something that only ha button talking approximately x x compared to another fan i purchased at walmart it sounded like a jet engine at the lowest setting one last thing the design look a little different typical pedestal fan almost sleek looking i like it

surprised shape size bin i several different type of plastic storage bin including sterilites shelftotes rubbermaid roughneck and homelite tub and general seem close approximation of the thing least in term of shape and size these bin bit different one wide a bin of comparable height make a bit of awkward shape i suppose youre storing clothing doesnt matter it might if want to pack book other rectangular objectssome other thing of note the handle are incredibly comfortable unlike other bin dig palm you move them the lid a raised top see picture the plus side mean you stuff the box to full height and the lid still fit the downside if you bin by a different manufacturer they wont stack a securely on top of these these bin have the same length and width a the qt version which i also bought you can stack them but theyre not compatible the larger bin they dont have strong of a plastic smell im always turned by this when i look at bin in store of these bin a slight smell but it went away a hour of airing the clear plastic sterilite bin have bpa and theyre also acidfree so theyre safe for storing photo see the faq section of sterilitecom for infooverall i like these binsand find them visually appealing i havent figured out exactly to put in them to maximize strange shape i might try the sterilite qt shelftote next for a larger optionone last comment i originally bought these with the intent of using them for a move but i question well theyll hold banged around in a moving truck especially since some customer report receiving cracked bin shipping also given their smaller size it seems like an incredibly expensive way to move if youre looking for an alternative to cardboard box i would go with the rubbermaid roughneck they arent clear but theyre bigger more durable and cheaper

cooking lodge cast iron year piece inventory double dutch oven favorite lodge cookware due versatilitywhen using dutch oven i usually sear the meat first to add flavor usually requires searing the meat several batch the best part about the double dutch is sear the meat in the big pot and in the lid simultaneously thus reducing the time needed to brown the meat half since the lid is used for the braising step deglazing youre increasing the number item to cleaned lateri like the lid much that i often use by for pan frying due to the smallish size about inch in diameter and the inherent property of cast iron the lid can get incredibly hot you want it to perfect for cooking a steak it put a better crust v my lodge skillet ive even used it a pie pan in a pinch properly seasoned the lid also work great for cooking egg without sticking a seasoned cast iron pan is the original nonstick and outlast syntheticcoated nonstick pan in the market and without the toxic fumeswhen used a a dutch oven it work like it it retains heat well and cook evenly is little steam that escape the smaller qt capacity v a qt dutch oven i use le that ive got this one is also better for cooking moderate amount of food generally you want little empty space when using a dutch ovenin response to the reviewer problem getting the lid i suggest the following when setting the lid on the pot dont align the handle of the two this will allow you to remove the lid easily without to worry about injury ive owned another lodge qt dutch ovenwith a traditional handle i dont miss that one allnor i miss not having a standalone skilletupdate december ive been using this thing for two year now several time per week it is still my favorite ever more so here one more thing that you can use this for baking super awesome bread that rival anything you can get at bakery one of the secret of making great rustic bread with a thick chewycrunchy crust and great oven spring is to use a lot of steam for the first minute of baking bakery use a steaminjected oven for u at home using a covered pot a this one is the easiest way to replicate the effect of a steam oven after shaping a boule i place it on the lid cover it with the main pot and let it proof so the whole pot is upside when the dough is ready i score it and place the covered pot on a preheated stone in the oven for minute then i remove the lid and let the top crust brown the interior reach the proper temperature depending on your oven you might have to remove the bread from the lid halfway though cooking so the bottom doesnt burn i usually put it on a cool baking tray on a rack without a stone it a minor inconvenience but it easier trying to steam oven with boiling water ice cube mister etc and the result cant be beat

moment synchronicity review sample of opener arrived day wanted share a bottle of bordeaux a friend i nearly a case of particular wine dreading opening a bottle the cork in dried and difficult to cleanly open this opener saved the daythis a relatively simple tool to operate remove the foil top insert the needle cover the top of the bottle and pump the instruction claim five to ten stroke two the cork in my problematic bottle unseated and wa easing the bottle after five stroke of the pump wa and completely intact wa a speck of cork in the wine itselfi love the design and especially the slightly knurled handle that allows a positive grip the shape the handle also help to grip it well enough to perform the pumping operation in a stable mannerof course this is designed to work with cork and not the synthetic substitute also not designed sparkling wine in fact this work perfectly and saved my day i probably use it for wine with dried genuine cork like the bordeaux i mentioned and use my trusty corkscrew for everything else that is reflection the utility of function of this opener much a i set in my way however for problematic cork there is no better way to cleanly remove them this opener in my opinion

i find the design to be terriblenote that the fanhead will pivot but the pivot angle is set at degree to the fan base instead of degree or parallel to it also note that the control on the right hand the housing prevents the fan pointing down at not goodas designed the fan is to be mounted on the wall with the fan rotated counterclockwise degree viewed from the front in tabletop position mounting mounted the pivot remains at degree so directional adjustment of airflow becomes a compromise horizontal and vertical degree movement although this doe allow a downward component it still doe not work to limit vibrationnoise would also be problematic because the mounting plate system look pretty flimsythe mounting method to be used for this fan is to first install screw in the wall stud or with requires accurate placement of the screw and then adjustment of the screw depth to create a tight fit not terribly difficult but not forgiving of error either a hole in the drywall in the wrong place bought mill brew coffee maker scouring coffee aficionado website we melitta lasted year finally died we market for a new machine the consensus that youre going buy a mill brew this the one to getso we didwhat we likeeasy cleanup the chute and basket simple to clean and done in a minute the carafe take a quick hand washing and thats done it keep the coffee nice and hot in the insulated carafe without burning it the control for grind strength and aroma work well to help get the best flavor out coffee we noticed a definite improvement in coffee smoothness and aroma compared to melitta the programmable feature ensure your coffee be ready for you you wake in the morningthings we dont likeit doesnt handle oily bean well all after pouring the bean in the mill tend to stick together and find way the mill you get almost nothing in the basket and wind up pouring beige water in your cup this is especially a problem if you let the bean sit in the hopper overnight in preparation for a morning brew not a fun thing to have to redo another pot when you want to have your cup and get out the door this machine need agitator something in the hopper to ensure a steady flow of bean into the mill a it is have to agitate the bean a spoon to get to go into the mill due to all the setting and differing coffee type this machine take several pot to get it set just right for the particular coffee you have also going to take a few lousy pot if coffee to get the setting right so buy cheap wholebean coffee and experiment a bit to get it close using your good coffee we threw out pot two were mud and two were tea before we got it right if youre into changing to different bean and roast youll need to tweak the setting timegood machine yes but it some flaw set up it turn out some really good drip coffee would we get it probably but we wish jura capresso had included some starter setting and a warning oily bean

isnt first kind pillow like this owned fiance like used many the past i quite familiar variety of them first the pro this one etronics one of the softest and nicest looking of the bunch i cant imagine anyone irritated with this around neck reasonable amount of time is also one of the comfortable in sense that i have experienced it easy set with the battery included and the operational control ease to get used to well the massage action ha setting and tuned to strong mild or a mix of convenience and it is quite comfy used a a neck pillow even without it operatingnow for the con i dont know if i have a fat neck compared to everyone else this thing is small it come with a snap at the bottom that clasp putting it around your neck so it stay in place putting it and snapping it for reminded me of my first tie and button up shirt a a kid that felt like strangling me wasnt an option for me the snap is a nice idea it just exists on a pillow that is small in my opinion in fairness this pillow can be used without the snap in place but it move easily fit loosely and not a effective in massage action that way also the actual massage motor is just a vibration finger effect going on here is located in the rear of this pillow is nothing in the side of it which make it a little comfortable but also make you feel most of the vibration action happening in the rear of your neck though it travel of course it is not a effective a the pillow i have tried that have the action in both the back and the sidesin conclusion this is a very comfy reasonably priced pillow that is not a bad choice if you have a small neck and dont mind the budget motor on it being small and in the rear of the pillow only though it not at all a bad choice for the money there are better option available that are both bigger and have a more effective surround style massage effecta free unit wa supplied to me in exchange for a fair and honest review

thesoyapower plus soy milk maker rice milk maker nut milk makerfor one year have never had problem i would highly recommend purchasing it interested making soy milk and saving moneythe machineit sort light green color and white i would have preferred white im not terribly concerned about it struck i first got it is sturdy and simple the machine i have used it a lot the last year and it look and work the it the first day it may not pretty but it get the job done it is also worth the cost i used spend at least dollar a week storebought soy milk even considering the cost of ingredient machine quickly paid itselfperformancethe process is simple rinse the soybean let soak a hour put the soybean in the machine with water plug in the machine and press a button some noisy churning about the same level a a vacuum cleaner it beep incessantly so you have to unplug it let it cool for a pour the milk a strainer a container clean the machine it is better to this sooner rather latervery easy this is optional but i would recommend buying a couple of plastic pitcher i make two three batch a week and it is good to have a closed container on hand for storing it in the refrigerator the one come with the machine cover and is one you would have to go without soymilk the next batch is readymilk tastehonestly i prefer the sweet taste of vanilla soy silk to the soy milk that the machine produce i feel comfortable eating organic and controlling what go into body though ive gotten used to the flavor over time i use arrowhead mill organic soybean and put in a bit of vanilla extract to give it some sweetnesstofuyou also make tofu with it the process is not very difficult but i did not do a great job with the tofu and it wa a little more trouble than it wa worth of course this is the opinion of someone doesnt mind missing a few meal because is lazy to cook sometimes

bought first kitchenaid mixer artisan model almost year ago still going strong looking great i needed something bigger my home based baking business researching variety product i decided stay kitchenaid and buy the kp professional series after a holiday baking season i produced hundred of cooky cake of size and countless loaf of bread im convinced i made the right choicetheres a new feature matter speed the mixer set to the paddle move slowly first rather jumping right to speed prevents a cloud of flour powdered sugar popping of the bowl and settling all the kitchen this might seem like a big deal but anything that reduces cleanup time is a plus the pourshield fit snugly around the top of the bowl and stay in place it make getting ingredient the bowl much easier and also keep in the bowl and the counter no whipping cream or meringue splatter all around the mixeri grant that the motor is noisy but given the ease with which it handle large batch of bread dough cake batter and decorator icing im fine with it the quart bowl is huge it is also very heavy especially filled with dough but the handle is well designed and relatively easy the hand i a bit of arthritis in my hand sometimes tricky for to get heavy batter into the pan but this is a minor issue in a product whose overall quality surpasses that of anything ive ever usedmy one negative experience wa with a defective starter switch i to tinker with it to get the mixer to come on but i called customer service and got friendly courteous service a new mixer wa sent right away and meanwhile i devised a method for getting the mixer to operate reliably so all my baking wa done it have the new unit arrived sooner than i expected and worked perfectly it hadnt been for the excellent customer service id have deducted a star from my rating but my overall experience been so positive that i felt that a star rating wa justifiedif regularly bake bread andor make lot of big batch of baked good this mixer is well worth the investment i expect to mixing away for year to comeoh and i mention that the mixer is red and absolutely gorgeous

wear lot layer cold office i tend a pretty high dry cleaning bill i wanted to get a steamer specifically my clothes so i could go stretch my dry cleaning visit for my outerwear piece like sweater scarf etc living in new york city also meant i needed something small compact i found haan h amazon and various attachment for multiple purpose seemed to fit the bill and someit arrived on christmas eve couldnt have better timing i tested it on the tablecloth i setting out for christmas dinner i opened the box i wa pleasantly surprised with the attachment a i hadnt really thought beyond using the unit on anything fabric the instruction straight forward although were several typo i guess translating from another languagewhile the product steam effectively it unfortunately wasnt to getting out the fold mark from extra large tablecloth in one session i actually needed to fill the water chamber three time which meant waiting for the unit to cool time the chamber became empty the tablecloth wa completely done finishing with the tablecloth i loaded up the haans with water a fourth time and steamed two lightly wrinkled shirt that i on hand i definitely could have done another two shirt so but isnt something to use to tackle item in one use i had the opportunity to use the steamer on a small wicker basket and it worked great wicker so annoying to keep clean so this really wonder to clear out dust from in the weavingthis steamer compact enough for my apartment but for of looking for something portable it a little big to call it travelfriendly a it the size of a hot water kettle it also took a time to get the hang of the knob that lock the top of the water chamber which wa a little irritatingi liked the option to lock the steam trigger to the on position so that i could just focus on maneuvering the product with whatever i wa steamingi would have given this product star except it didnt have a power button you actually have to unplug it to turn it off doesnt have a light to indicate when it run out of water the steam just dy down and you have to assume that there isnt any water left in the chamber and have a larger water chamber for the size of the unitall in all i would cleaning square foot floor tile either mop bucket a swiffer wetjet problem with either of method my floor is left with a film of dirt and detergent im donethe big advantage of the hoover floormate the mop and bucket is that applies a solution of detergent and clean hot water the floor scrub it with the rotating brush and suck the dirty water back a separate holding containerlike reviewer i didnt find using the floormate a dry vacuum to effective i begin my cleaning process vacuuming the floori also didnt find that the floormate a very good job cleaning my very dirty grout the best method i found cleaning the grout to spray it first withhoover ah floor mate ounce tile and grout spray wait minute scrub it with anoxo good grip grout brush wipe the excess cleaner and loosened dirt with a sponge and then scrub with the floormate is a very labor intensive process and is probably necessary or twice a year that the grout is clean im hoping that the floormate a decent job by itselfi basically only use the floormate the wash mode i dont use the wet pickup mode the floormate a great job sucking up the water in wash mode and a mentioned previously i dont use the dry vac mode alloverall i rate the hoover floormate h a a very good value considering the cost and performance it is a bit specialized and wont replace vacuum cleaner and manual grout brush

individual tea infuser tall is made beautiful chartreuse silicone a handle shaped like a stylized tea leaf with a perforated base of stainless steel also a little matching scalloped tray catch drip silicone is translucent it almost come alive glowing with light and shading the green almost to yellow the edge of the leafmost importantly it make a great cup of tea the large eggshaped base and perforation allow enough room the tea to expand and for water to circulate a benefit to the use of silicone is it float beneath the surface of the water it place even in a tall mug without worrying about able to fish it silicone is useful it ha a nice texture and of course the leafhandle doesnt get hotusing individual tea infuser rather tea bag encourages the use of betterquality tea than is found in tea bag yet is economical at the time and better for the environment usually drink pot of tea but sometimes want just one cup especially in the evening caffeinefree tisane lemon verbena peppermint so soothingi a practical person and dont a lot of whimsical kitchen tool or accessory so this one brings a smile to face every time i use it infusers would be perfect to include at place setting at a breakfast or luncheon not just for making tea but also a a conversationstarter and a thoughtful takehome gift for each guesta sample provided for testing and evaluation

ive bitten noknead bread bug small cast iron pot the perfect size baking typical loaf the second rise right the pot also handy for making small batch baked bean soup casserole and stew best of fit snugly large toaster oven i bake bread prepare a meal for two without heating the big oveni make mostly sourdough whole rye aka pumpernickel and yeasted whole wheat bread the result been excellent the start i found even the seasoning and a light film of oil the bread still tended stick a little the bottom i started lining the pot with lightly oiled parchment paper also i use the toaster oven i have to adjust the rack to the lowest setting in order to get the pot inside with it lid in place the top and bottom crust get pretty dark the final browning with the top i keep eye on it and brush the loaf lightly with oil or butter soon a i remove it from the pot that way the crust stay tender ive never a failure yet with this methodlike people im impressed with the durability and practicality of cast iron and the fact that lodge apparently still make pot domestically is certainly a plus i started with several cast iron pan least year old and still perfect from my grandmother kitchen and i have been adding to my collection with lodge item ever since theyre pretty much all i use at this point this little pot is the latest addition and it certainly hasnt disappointed

ive one little fryer appliance since first became popular seventy the current model the second one ive had larger the original model came outfor someone needing fry enormous amount one time little machine is ideal requires small amount of vegetable oil ive used it to fry chicken wing quickly to french fry onion ring to do smaller chicken part and it work beautifully is thermostat plug it in wait minute and the temp is a small amount of grease it recovers heat quickly than electric skilletwhen you you plan to reuse the grease you simply let the machine cool snap the plastic top the put the whole thing in the fridge dont fry that often and i do i tend to fry a lot usually i just discard the oil such a small amount is used usually no more than cup starting that i dont feel bad discarding the oilthe side on this appliance are quite high and splatter around the machine never a problem i used common sense though when i fry whether on the stoveim sure the allenclosed autofryers that are out on the market are nice and if i fried a lot id probably get one however i only fry or twice a month and that this little machine is perfect id recommend one to anyonedurable simple and exactly it designed for

first crock pot im rather excited seen many video youtube handy thing since i watch so many video instruction sheet almost unnecessary though the sheet give hint and tip on cooking several thing a well known to people plus the heat wa constantly in direct contact with the stoneware it may not a efficient little breathing room go a long waythe first thing i made wa pulled buffalo chicken and while i have to admit that the crock pot did exude a new aroma it still made a damn fine meal and it didnt taste like what i wa smelling it first use this new aroma wa longer present it just needed some breaking in another great feature is that it automatically switch cooking to warming mode the cooking time expires personally i think it would be nice to have alarm when it go from cooking to warming mode just so you know it done and while it doe get pretty hot to the touch the handle are comfortably cool enough to lift and move this if necessary even when this is it hottestpros it new so i cant say just how long it actually last crock pot is the industry leader invented this so i went with let see what happens in yearsits easy to set and forgetthe fact that it automatically switch to down so you can transport this and it contentscons it is a bit wobbly there are two foot in the front and one in the back really people who got paid this innovation would it be so difficult for you to reading cook illustrateds recommendation press set love this press tried several time to change mind i didnt instead i bought calphalon garlic press i think a much better onepros of zylissit press of garlic slightly the clove prepeeledit press a clove onceit come attached cleaner is hard to losecons is hard to squeeze multiple clove especially if the clove are unpeeled if want to press multiple batch you to clean out the peel the previous batch proceeding you need to use the cleaner a bamboo skewer or pointy device to get the smashed peel out of the hopperif the clove are unpeeled the garlic left behind is particularly tough to clean out the hole are slighly recessed the inside of the hopper it is difficult to get anything that is effective at scrubbing the garlic outthe calphalon garlic press built in spike on the plunger it poke the garlic skin and make it easier to press the garlic the skin stick to the spike you open it back you just peel the skin and move on to the next batch or leave add more garlic to the hopper and keep pressing it doesnt allow garlic to squeeze up past the plunger however if you decide to peel the garlic first it doe leave more behind the zyliss and it is harder to clean the remaining garlic off the spike unpeeled the calphalon and zyliss leave a similar amount behind willing to do more work than is required i simply solve that problem not peeling first a toothbrush work great to clean off anything stuck in the spike the other side to the calphalon is that the hopper is a bit smaller normal size opposed to zyliss oversized hopper so you may need to do multiple batch if you are pressing a lot of garlic but it is easy and in the end le time consuming to use and clean than the zyliss

looking foam soap dispenser i idea worked they required i decided one based on positive review i had thought foaming dispenser required a special liquid soap this one doesntjust fill line the way up regular liquid hand soap top it with water it that easy this design really cut on soap usage and therefore save money especially since many regular home soap dispenser create waste putting slippery soap that slide off hand or ooze out the nozzlewhen i filled the dispenser for the first time i wa actually pretty disappointed when i used it for the first time it put out a thick viscous semifoam resembling a hybrid of regular soap and foamnot what i wa expected the next day however it magically transformed light fluffy foam i suppose the hand soap need to fully dissolve into the water it work optimally so youre a new buyer and think you dont like the foam it make try waiting a day and see if it improves i didnt see anything about this the documentation and it certainly surprised and yes it like this every time you fill it the first timethe only downside mentioned that you dont get optimal result immediately for me it take a full day to get perfect foam i dont know if this is just how it work or if perhaps this is just of water quality or brand of liquid soap in case the benefit definitely outweigh that downside youll use le soap save money and the feel of foam soap regular thick hand soap is a improvementupdate i got sick of the poor performance this give on the day it refilled see above so i decided to experiment i found that if you fill the dispenser with hot water add soap and give it a stir it instantly work perfectly either hot water or stirring greatly improves performance but is even better i didnt see this mentioned in the instruction so if youre frustrated give it a try

item attractive the little wood base small inch square attractive little box see the little knob the bottom pull a little drawer made wood with the finished coffee grind the direction much really none the cardboard box that the unit come the picture of the various part and fit together tell it a top nut that bolt on the main shaft beneath that is a plastic type washer the turning handle then little inverted metal piece hold the unit turning you have set it to either fine medium coarse you simply turn the piece holder piece either clockwise or counterclockwise to adjust the ceramic cutter up or down a finer chop up for coarse it took three time finally got a slightly medium coarse grind others have said you have problem with strength in your hand this isnt the unit for you im close to year old but i lift weight play table tennis and have fairly strong hand nonetheless you have to impart a fair amount of strength and effort to make it work the finer the cut the more effort you must expend i have found i grind enough in two try the little box hold maybe three tablespoon to make around ounce of coffee using chemex i compared this unit to the two japanese one on the market this one is cheaper look nicer and function very well it the job a advertised my only gripe is the shipping charge high like around bucksbut they ship it usps and it wa well protected it take a minute or two to grind the bean depending on amount wanted obviously this is not meant to produce a dozen cup of coffee unless you want to spend quite a bit of time and energy creating enough coffee grind to make your coffee but it is perfect for one or two people only drink a cup or two initially in the morning update i have this little unit for several month and is additional observation first the exact size not the very top or bottom is inch inch the inner box which hold the ground coffee the grinding is and inch wide and inch long and approximately inch deep are the inner measurement of the holding box that determines the quantity of ground coffee you can grind before you start backing up the ceramic grinding unit first this is slightly le coffee scoop tablespoon i usually grind one batch then put in just a little more to make and a half scoop for my ounce of coffee that i make morning the little box fit fairly smugly into the outer shell but not perfectly so a tiny bit of ground coffee get the box and the shell problem you just gently tap item after you are done on a hard surface so get the tiny coffee piece to fall out i do it on the middle of my sink the observation i have is the grinding handle it is held in place by a nut at the very top of the shaft after a few time of using the unit the nut start to unscrew i grind in a clockwise fashion maybe going counterclockwise might stop the unscrewing that occurs it not a problem a long a you occasionally check the top nut to make sure it is secure if not just retighten by hand and you are good oh and the coffee bean are all ground the handle spin freely with no pressure on it i really think it is the cutest my faviorite little appliance in my kitchen with real wood and attractive styling to me it is a real keeper

owned two misto brand sprayer first lasted year i happy it simply wore the second one lasted about month it started malfunctioning first it would spray stream rather a mist and amount cleaning seemed able to fix it finally it would no longer spray oil at a stream of compressed air the norpro performed well the first week the good stuff first thing first it spray a nice fine mist of olive oil anything the mist a little finer than i would prefer id much rather a stray is light than too heavy the thing look cool i like the color of olive oil and it look great the glass and make a nice contrast with the brushed metal finish the tapered shape is easier to handle than the cylindrical misto unit the glass get a little slippery it get coated with oil but it is that bad the notsogood stuff the major problem i have is that the plastic part used for look identical to the misto and i suspect exactly the supplier the whole reason i switched sprayer brand wa to get away from the cheap quicktofail component and it look like i still stuck with the small size is a bit problematic it doesnt hold all that much oil so it seems to need refilling frequently even worse is just not that much room for pressurized air so even small job seem to need multiple repumps summary it seems to be working ok but i wish it wa a little bigger and the plastic component look like exactly the one that failed previous sprayer hopefully this one work longer but i am not exactly optimistic

received new delonghi gelato maker afternoon i already made my vanilla ice cream base had chilling fridge ups delivered my new ice cream maker waiting the prescribed hour after transport i set making my first batch ice cream i quite impressed i used cup of ice cream base in the first batch it wa ready in le minute i one just let the machine go especially it new appliance so i puttered around the kitchen read and watched the machine i not want anything to go wrong well nothing went wrong the ice cream had a wonderful texture and it wa beautifully frozen several year now i had a cuisinart ice cream maker of the type have to freeze the container to make ice cream i didnt really like the way machine produced ice cream so this is i decided to buy the delonghi i wa pleased performanceone of the reviewer mentioned that the manual not give the specification for the bowl hold the ice cream i think that review wa a couple of year ago my manual doe state that the bowl hold cup which mean oz however the manual is extremely hard to understand i just happen to a translator and this manual wa excellent example of a terrible translation since i speak spanish and french i read the english plus the two language and i understood le to doi am planning to make short video of the process using this appliance i find video to be very helpful when learning about a new appliance and to use it this is an advantage to the cuisinart product have lot of video how to use productsafter i make several batch and make the short video i post to make sure is an updated review on this appliance it look like there other review bottom line i would definitely recommend this ice creamgelato maker to a friend i made two batch today and everything went very smoothly ok so now have using this item for around a month and a half i read in the other review that the plastic paddle wa flimsy and would break absolutely no doubt well we have used this machine almost everyday and even more than a day time we had some people for dinner and i made batch of ice cream one right after the other and we had no problem this part not broken or even threatened to break however i not run it the ice cream is rock solid it is rather hard when i stop the machine but i let it firm in the freezer however the ice cream is much much firmer than the ice cream i used to make in my cuisinart ice cream maker which us a prefrozen tub and the ice cream it make is quite softi think the key is that you need to learn what it look like to know when it is done and when to stop it i also add about a tablespoon of grand marnier or even scotch to the ice cream mixture i know this affect the freezing so that may also be a reasonwe are very pleased with this ice cream maker the ice cream is delicious and the machine work beautifully

cant say enough quality the waring pro make excellent waffle the construction everything the engineer want in waffle iron a drawback unit is it take quite a bit of room suggested in another review store waring the counter top it look greatwe used the waffle maker almost a year find we have waffle for lunch often review is slightly changed to reflect of we have learned the last several monthsmy wife and i accomplished chef we struggled recipe thus i want to comment on three thing seasoning the grid recipe and cook timeregarding seasoningthe direction indicate seasoning with cooking spray oil we initially preheated the waring and sprayed the grid with mazola canolasunflower spray we never happy with the way that worked we may have generous with the spray my wife finally used a spatula and paper toweling and wiped the grid the waffle are coming fineit is important to reseason the waring we about every three month we found out the hard way what happens dont reseason the waffle stuck to the grid and it wasnt fun getting it out the direction in the manual tell you what to do a waffle stick it is worth readingregarding recipeswe tried about four recipe my wife went to the library and found the following recipe in a newer betty crocker cookbook this is the recipe we usewafflesprep minute make four belgian waffle cup allpurpose flour tablespoon baking powder teaspoon salt egg cup milk cup cooking oil in a medium mixing bowl stir together flour baking powder and salt make a well in the center of dry mixture set aside in another mixing bowl beat whole egg slightly beat in milk and oil add egg mixture to dry mixture stir till moistened batter lumpywhen mixing this batter my wife followed the instruction for the oil used canola oil using a whisk proved to be a better way to mix the batter the recipe say the batter have lump it were not at the eatingwe preheated the waring pro using a setting and did not use oil or spray to reseason i use the measuring cup that come with the machine and fill it with batter over the fill line on the cup i pour the batter in a circular motion about the outer edge of the gridsby accident i found out that the amount of batter you put in the waring is sensitive to where the temperature knob is set the knob wa inadvertently shifted to i didnt notice i poured batter the unit and it rose a whole lot in the end big deal but now i check the setting when i turn the unit oni never get the whole base to fill when pouring in the batter so i gently move the handle back and forth so the batter can flow in one direction and then the to fill all the grid it take me about second to fill the grid close the cover and turn the waffle iron over i then bake the waffle additional four minutesabout cooking timei depend completely on the clock for the time to cook minute total the signal from the waring pro come early and even monitoring the steam from the batter is not adequateusing the above you will have belgian waffle with the look and taste that will make you proudextra waffleswhen you have extra batter bake the waffle let cool wrap individually in aluminum foil and freeze they keep for several week and reheat well
using belgian style iron make thicker waffle wife daughter really love one that make thinner crisper a light and buzzer method adjustable darkness hop table you hear the buzzer

like teapot much i buying another case break road make another pot teaif enjoy tea you likely take care to buy fine quality loose tea you want teapot allows leaf to open and infuse the tea that good flavor this pot perfect thatit may a small pot you want to make tea then buy of yes it may seem expensive but worth it first of all youre making tea in glass glass wont leech anything your water and the nice tea basket nearly fill it teapot is obviously stainless steel this is actually way better if the pot came with a glass steeper which would never allow the leaf much access to your hot water thus depriving you of getting the of your likely expensive tea leaf most importantly the tea steeper is huge in comparison to the size of the potthe spout is large and doesnt drip you pour the handle is large in comparison to the size of the pot and it feel wellbalanced when you hold it and pour with ityes the teapot is small but if you really want to drink the best cup of tea then you want fresh tea something thats hanging around for hoursto mind and ive tried many teapot this is the best one aroundit come with instruction in japanese character which i dont read so i cant provide you with information than you think of for example dont let your twoyear old play with it dont use it for a tea kettle i idea what might happen in a microwave so err the side of caution thing with the dishwasher little drawing that might clue you in to of the donts which you may be able to decipher better than i couldthis is one fine teapot and im about to order another

using waring pro waffle maker time think mastered the right step producing wonderfully crisp flavorful waffle we purchased the waffle maker along thegolden malted pancake waffle flour original ounce can pack eventually we try a scratch recipe the golden malted mix perfect recommendation followthe waffle maker instruction recommend a heat setting of we tried a few waffle setting using the mix this produce a cooked but limp waffle also a bit difficult to get edge free the waffle could lifted of the bottom grid a setting of the maximum the trick this produce a crisp waffle that could be gripped with finger and lifted cleanly out of the bottom grid i have read source using a waffle maker at the maximum setting is the preferred approachwe used the direction the golden malted except substituted canola oil for the butter whisk the egg water and oil together add the flour and whisk smooth the batter will be thin and quite pourable the recipe on the can us one cup of mix produce two waffle since family three member we used cup of mix ounce of water one egg and two tablespoonful of oil this is just a multiplication of the basic recipe with minor adjustmentsexact measurement important use the measuring cup that come with the waffle maker filling the bottom grid with batter rather scooping the batter make the batter in a large mixing bowl that ha a pour spout and pour the batter the measuring cup fill the measure exactly to the fill line when poured into the bottom grid this will cover the grid exactly without need to spread with a spatula will get almost overflow when the top grid is lowered and the waffle maker is rotatedupdate april forgot to mention an important cooking step just prior to adding the batter for waffle give top and bottom grid a quick halfsecond spray with pam original cooking spray also for crisper waffle i find that using the highest heat setting is essential but cooking longer than the time determined the internal thermostat after the end of cooking beep i leave the waffle in the unit for another second

arrived several problem delonghis way managing issue creates difficulty customer the first problem the hose two plastic tab connect to the machine had one broken tab to replace it to order part online proving that you purchased it recently submitting receipt ordering a replacement hose seemed pointless since one of the two tab the back of the machine which the hose attache to also wa broken to test the machine i had to duct tape it to the backwhen i got the hose securely attached i had another problem with the machine that could solved with duct tape this problem wa with the machine ability to cool a room it alternated blowing out rather hot and cool air i thought this might relate to the way i rigged the hose a call to delonghis support which i told id attached the hose made it clear that this wa not the issue had answer for problem returning it to the manufacturer for repair driving it to one of repair center they offered to send a fedex label and pay for shipping the box that came with this literally fall apart you open it it come in three separate piece held together by plastic strap also my box had a big dent in the back it wa damaged shipping it wasnt exactly intact though the dent didnt appear to reach the machine or of part i couldnt use the original box so the way to ship it to delonghi for repair would be to buy a new box delonghi wont provide one i asked for around a special packaging sale store also delonghi only us fedex so a location isnt convenient for you youre out of lucki also add that this immensely heavy machine it weighs lb and though it ha wheel is portable mainly in name only it is incredibly hard to move around and it would be extremely difficult to box it and transport it in a compact car which is i owneven if the machine working other negative that are worth mentioning the fan on higher setting be quite loud and there is no way to change the airflow no movable vent if youd like the air to blow in a particular direction youre out of luck also the hose is short and delonghi doesnt recommend a longer one so you have to put the air conditioner on a sturdy stable platform if youre using a higher window youre also not supposed to put it close to the wall so it take a lot of space in a small room the footprint could be a real problemwhen i spoke to the service representative about my problem also indicated that setting the temperature too low relative to the temperature outside can create a problem he said you should least initially set it within degree of the external temperature and slowly lower the temperature the room ha cooled i couldnt test this functionality since my air conditioner which i used in a single room with the door closed wa heating the room it wa in than cooling iton the plus side though plus dont help much delonghis support people are polite and try to be helpful the returnrepair policy arent their control is the quality of the machine or it part also the remote control function is nice and i imagine it would be very convenient if you purchased a working machine if you get a lemon it appears that i then thing are going to be very troublesome for you

eat lot yogurt plain i shell so much store yogurt making so easysome of secret of yogurt help successful cleanliness is next to godliness for dairy recipe bacteria microorganism you inviting to the party make flavor goopy result yogurt is thickened commercially dry powdered milk to add body to the product american milk holstein is thin lacking protein adding dry powder milk put back in the casein set to make a nice creamy thick yogurt jersey cow milk is higher in fat and protein you access to jersey milk you might need to add dry powdered milk if you dont scald the milk bring to a boil you leave in enzyme that will result in a thin porridgelike yogurt if you are lucky if you arent lucky the result will be liquid milk spoiled so scald the milk you scald take the milk temperature to be around degree and or the culture you stir in will be killed off and you wont get any yogurt plain yogurt starter work fine make sure fresh howeveri like yogurt plain or with apple and sunflower seed stirred in but feel free to flavor with apple butter jam fresh berry honey kid like it with whipped strawberry or blueberry and maple syrup

recent year ended cooking much more often i learned important good knivesnot cut better prevents injury due to straining using poor quality knifei debated henckels and wusthof but went they seem to decent quality a reasonable price i hear wusthof supposed to be better but it with a price tag to matchi have idea whats up with people that complained these knife poor quality and rusting to the point to throw away unless the manufacturer quality varies that much and often ive these year and they still trucking yes of course unless make a point to wash them and dry them immediately theyre going to get rusttarnish spot them it doesnt render them unusable although obviously theyre a pretty a they used to be bending knife ive never seen of them bend strangely a ive seen others say i guess you are trying to use these to cut bone something i dont know that happened ive never seen these guy bend on anythingi use the big knife cutting carrot and it slice through them nearly like butteri agree that the tip arent a sharp get a sharp a i would like knowing that for tougher item i try to cut nearer to the base like the carrot or tough veggie i cut them on the blade area nearer the handle slide right through themyou do need to sharpen them every now and but the steel quality is good enough that it keep it edge for a i try to sharpen them about a week though anyway to keep them in good working order actually the wusthof stage knife sharpener is a great pairing for a i have no idea how to use the sharpening steel included in this set it work on scissors also if you need them to although ive actually never sharpened kitchen scissors oncebut they still work just finein short these are a great starter set for people cooking at home unless youre a pro chef and really know the difference i think nearly anyone would be happy with these knife

couldnt bring spend original handy cooler obviously i cant compare the two expectation would high for i feeling would have met for bad could be i cant verify knockoff version actually cool much degree unquestionably a measurable difference i live nyc and have so far used this in the street in the subway station and in the office the air conditioner not working outdoors i think my city a wellknown reputation for hazy hot and humid summer i have used this device day walking somewhere the key is to find personal hot spot at to direct the air and either have to keep it close to you the wind is blowing make sure the air is blowing in the direction a the wind i would describe the cooling effect the device a feeling like the cool breeze you would get while tree shade they say tree cool a much a degree so i would give this device at least that much credit in term how much it cool subway if youre a new yorker or have your hot subway station in your town this device help take the edge the cooling effect is comparable to the gust of cool wind you get when the train is coming it not nearly a strong a that gust but it is a cool hot office or room air conditioning ha not been working in my office for two day so today i brought this in it wa like oven in i parked the cooler foot in front of and i have a nice pocket of cool air around me the main difference that i notice this device and my small desk fan is that the cooler successfully cool the air around me it doesnt blow air on me and i would say it blow almost a hard a my fan lowest settingi think i would like it if the air came stronger but come out is adequate the usb on my device work when plugged my desktop computer it doe not work my laptop for some reason i anxious for the day when device such a be made smaller it very awkward to walk the street holding this thing it would be great if it small enough to wear around my neck perhaps and somehow cool my entire upper half so if there inventor out there start thinking

wife get three kyotop series knife christmas of one of i glad i way fancier home cook really need are joy use and almost drawbacksknives of this series come sharp and stay that way for a long period of normal use normal use include cutting bone hard material doe include large tough material that might cause the knife to flex and break i love mine for slicing vegetable sharpness go even tough vegetable skin like psppers easilyone must always use these knife on a forreal cutting board of wood plastic or silicone else get dull or worse yet chip usethey seem not to porous they pick no odor nor residue stick to them easily however the impervious surface allows particle of are cutting to adhere probably through suction and the knife load up piece of material that necessitates wiping the knife regularlythe kyotop series is made of the black zirconium oxide and imprinted with a damascuslike finish it a nice touch the series is also distinguished double firing is said to add durability you cant see that but it help the knife last longerresharpening these is not easily done the best bet is to return the knife to kyocera and let them sharpen it kyocera will for a return shipping fee sharpen all of the knive you want sharpened in one batch for free kyocera also make a home sharpener that is the one that work that i know of unless one want to invest in a large diamond sharpening wheelall in all i am quite happy with the three original knife i am happy enough that i bought what look like a nakiri vegetable knife it is a thing of beauty

deal game came attention surprise the title kinda my opinion the radar in term marketing and publicity least at firstnow the fact this game is already sold first day amazon speaks volume to much word of mouth taken this game so youve played the demo is exceptional and still unsure whether to purchase the game perhaps lend hand and help make a informed decisionmultiplayer okay normally i dont start this topic however this seems to the one that people the concern therefore i feel i must address this first are basically two different type of multiplayer mode essentially the first type is you play in explore mode technically this is a single player type mode however ill give the multiplayer seal of approval basically in this mode if you have a friend that ha played a certain course it let you compete with a ghost of kinda like how back in for example mario kart for of you that have played it or about racing game like gran turismo for that matter in which you would a time trial and try and race a ghost of to beat time well in this case youre competing against the saved ghost of a friend whether by beating time or a certain amount of point the type of multiplayer mode is basically the thing except rather limited to just your friend timesscores you are competing in global event against the vast majority of those ownrent ssx provided have online pas if youre wondering if this game ha athome splitscreen multiplayer capabilitiesi regret to inform you that it not so if that is a deal breaker toward purchasing this game i would recommend searching elsewheregameplay in short for it is top notch getting more detailed however there are game mode to endure i already mentioned the global event and explore mode yet also there is somewhat of a story mode called world tour mode this is you can unlock of the character although you can also unlock them by purchasing them with ingame credit and also learn the basic of the game and the different type of gear that can be used to enhancehelp you course basically there are region and also a a p exclusive a japan mt fuji level is included in explore mode to explore each with several course that you can play through course are split three category race trick and survival the first two are pretty much selfexplanatory and a for survival that basically put your boarder against various extreme condition and youre given a certain type of gear to help aid you through the challenge whether it be an oxygen tank to help you survive thin air at mt everest or an ice axe to help you board more smoothly on overly icy surface each character n the game level up and a they do so you can purchase new gear to improve their performance i havent seen it all yet so far there seems to be a decent amount of customization anyway said all that there is a lot of replay value in all of this especially if youre into collecting trophy and it actually kinda cool to try and outscore or beat your friend recordsa satisfying feeling if i may say so myselfgraphics very well done theyre not phenomenal however you can clearly tell that both time and effort wa put into trying to make this snowboarding experience a feast for the eye all the location and various weather condition are accurately portrayed here in this game so if youre the type of gamer where look are important then i can safely say you will not be disappointed heresound overall the sound here is not bad the soundtrack itself used the game is actually fairly enjoyable however the voice acting is mildly cheesyalso the thing that the character say is kinda cheesy a wellyet this game isnt suppose to be serious it a sport fantasy that let player enact their wildest dream at the touch of a button so with that in mind ill let the cheesy factor slide since it is all in good funcontrols personally i find them fairly easy to get use to for those of you that may be veteran of the series the game allows you to switch toandfrom an ssx classic control setting which is actually pretty neat yet aside that i havent really any trouble with either bad camera angle or control what so ever which is a definite plusalright with that out of the way here are what my score for the game itself would begraphics control sound multiplayer gameplay overall to be honest it hard for me to give the game a score of a cause in my opinion that seems a little low it really is a great title and it is a rather enjoyable arcadestyle action experience but then i have to force to realize that it isnt exactly perfectthe multiplayer is great but could have better especially with the use of athome splitscreen either way these are just my thought and personal opinion on the game hopefully with this review you can pick up a copy and see for yourself bottom line id definitely say to at least give this game a rent but i would definitely say it warrant a purchase if youre into these sort of game update march alright ive had quite a bit of playtime with this game since receiving me to not strongly recommend this game there is nothing quite like that rush or feeling you get when you take a friend score or beat their time in an event and youd be yourself a disservice if you choose not to at least pick this up a a rental again i know im slightly being redundant here but the purpose of this update is to show that my stance on the game hasnt declined in fact it may have grown even betterupdate march ive earned of the trophy now for the game there are trophy in all for those wondering so ive put in a decent amount of time playing this im going to change my score for wipeout euwipeoutxlfor u drastic leap forward term gameplay graphic musical content previous incarnationmusic wa inhouse early mediocre electronica in the original xl sported a healthy soundtrack spawned actual cd release in store along a x vinyl version well with name like photek fluke future sound of london chemical brother and underworld wa a snapshot of what popular electronic music wa like in the late s it didnt that extremely dated sound the additional track the cdvinyl soundtrack leftfield orbital and source direct the icing on the cakegraphics heavily upgraded since wipeout xl graphic were sharp well detailed and helped immerse the game color radiated from teh screen v the drab dead color from the previous game the visuals by the designer republic tdr helped give the game that distinct feel that many racing game lacked other game design flavor that and it really did help give this game an identity that le shaped the way it would presented in the future wo wa alien and somewhat lifeless and wipeout wa almost atmospheric and bright this had a dark and gritty feelinggameplay the control were touched the ship didnt bounce anymore it seemed glide effortlessly on the track you picked up speed you sat on the edge of seat trying to touch the wall the ship responded exactly the way you wanted it tobonus wa a code you could put in where you could change the ship to different thing like one wa a swimming shark one wa a bumblebee and personal favorite the pirhana unlockable ship so many gold medal could be changed into a little pickle fying a space ship that had a minigun on it with unlimited ammo would blow up every competitor with in lap from that gun alonethis still to anyway the best game of the series

andthankfullyfun the storyline character integrity acerbic display of wit history of the monkey island universe sacrificed in the name of animation voice acting and graphic the music always important element of the game ha also been improved and even treated couple of pirate song in the course of the game anyone enjoy this game immensely old monkey island fan like are treated to a number of injokes and can delight in the return of a whole host of character we already know wellwally the cartographer the unforgettable stan the voodoo lady lemon head and fellow vegetarian cannibal elaine marley andof course the evil pirate lechuck and monkey of course i wa impressed the voice acting virtually of the character sound like i imagined would and is a subtlety in the delivery of line that make the corniest of joke work effectively the new character guybrush meet in the game are also rich amusing addition to the adventure three expirate barber very strange shakespearean actor a hilarious young entrepreneur go selling lemonade to running gun the last remaining member of the goodsoup hotelresort dynasty a wild cast of pirate unusual carnival worker and a number of delightfully amusing folk the whole world contained in the game is rich detailed and very well done a lot of attention detail and dare i say love went the creation of every background from start to finish a lot of time passed the last game and this one and i appreciate the creator desire to release this game wa entirely completedheres the story in a nutshell hero guybrush threepwood set to a pirate despite his physical build and unfortunate name along the way fell the lovely governor elaine marley who by this time ha finally come to love guybrush for unexplainable reason the ghost pirate lechuck also love elaine and is continually trying to make his undead bride naturally this ha led to some problem for guybrushalthough he ha killed lechuck a couple of time his enemy continues to molest and seek elaines hand in marriage there is some lack of continuity between the second game and this one it is inconsequential this game begin guybrush find lechuck besieging the fortress of elaine and manages in his usually inept yet successful way in thwarting lechucks plan elaine finally consent to marry him but unfortunately the ring guybrush put her finger is a cursed ring from lechucks stash that turn elaine into a solid gold statue the game revolves around guybrushs mission to break the ring curse thwart lechucks evil plan and somehow manage to stay alive along the way much hilarity ensuesanyone wanting to discover good adventure gaming can be play this game it is firstrate in story graphic character etc the designer delight in making fun of and the genre going all out to produce a witty funny thoroughly enjoyable experience could choose the direct line of inquiry and question and not bother to look and play every single object in the game and you could still enjoy a wonderful game the real fun though come in experiencing everything in the environment there is virtually nothing that you cant that the designer didnt already think of and add a bit of wit and humor to the game is a virtual time capsule of corny joke there are even two way to play the game you are better at puzzle i you can choose to play megapuzzle level and add even richness to the experience at either level this game offer intellectual challenge laughoutloud humor and a rich game experience that is second to none

start a family you could purposely set your house fire anythings possible on the sims the object of the game is to keep your sims happy entertaining well many household item you can buy and your sims can interact with in house some item a refridgerators shower bed and toilet fill sims need that they can in the best mood possible your sims can work and bring home the bacon to buy new thing for their home or they can slack and watch the unpaid bill roll inthe expansion pack are a followslivin large the first ever sims expansion come with many new item many decor style new skin for your sims new career possibility and a whole lot this one a must for sims playerhouse party your sims have the ability to throw party along with many cool new item and skin your sims can throw party that can quotdowntownquot area is a place where sims can take their date eat shop or chillall the expansion pack are highly worthwhile and extend the amount of thing to do on the sims the only complaint i have are minor one the isometric graphic are a little outdated year they still provide the same fun experience the sound remain pretty much the same except for some new music in house party and hot date bought tron mouse two reason light leaf light trail the included mat i pleasantly surprised find the mouse rather amazing the tron razer mouse go up to dpi changeable on the fly thats little fast for dpi work good for me the precision make a huge difference gamingit look like a weird mouse shape contour for ergonomic design mind however the mouse fit well in the hand light enough that movement done with fingersthe software to download razer is in depth you can select dpi stage and polling interval well a determine macro for a whole bunch profile the one complaint i have with the mousesoftware is that from i can tell you cant turn the start up noise dosnt always work anyways it a really cheesy function of the mouse and the sound is pretty distortedthe light on the mouse controllable individually from the software but i choose to leave on it pretty coolin bundle the included mouse pad show the light trail produced the tron mouse underside uv light the mouse pad is very high quality and the movement is swiftall in all this mouse is great ive it for a couple day but the quality seems to be topknotch im coming from a microsoft sidewinder x and the quality of the razer mouse is leap and bound ahead of the msft mouse primarily in the scroll wheel you can get this combo for it definitely worth it i bought it like new for i have no complaint it worth a lot moreedit i wa issue with the mouse restarting randomly use to fix this issue simply download and install the current firmware available from razer website just search razer tron firmware in google

owned mlb k show i proceeded get rid month later ask the show pretty much bell whistle great graphic the realism wa sorely lacking one thing you never get to see the actual arm angle the pitcher deliver the ball the show like go the windup and bam the ball hurl nowhere i love the fact you see the full pitcher delivery in k you much better gauge the trajectory and arm angle you certainly still strike a the pitcher can fool you and do but you a better chance of knowing to look for a pitch lead to contact and much le frustrationanother thing the commentary and the pace it much better it just feel more like a baseball game and le like a marathon but the truly great thing about this game is you can protect a lead team take the lead it like the team start magically hitting ball inch shoelace out of the ballpark that wa the frustrating part of the show it reward good pitching the whole game instead of penalizing you for a good offense i recently purchased mlb k from gamestop for a price drop i know most show fan rag the game and talk junk about it but i thought i would take a chance because the price wa right i glad i i found out that all the talk about mlb the show wa just that overblown hype the true baseball experience lie mlb k

ive playing game awhile ive decided pretty good havent tried version yet i hear it improvement nfl fever consists several game mode single game dynasty basically like franchise mode fantasy challenge play created super team and othersthere tool included the game the player editorcreator stadium and uniform editor allows you edit the name city uniform and stadium of nfl team ive been told there play maker in but i cant seem to find it youre a newbie and need help the control also a practice and tutorial mode but many veteran end playing this a well completing the practice objective will unlock certain super team to use in single game mode the fantasy challenge provides a relief from the sometimes tedious constant regular football you choose a team and play a ladder of created super team of overall rating but get increasingly harder a you go along the team you beat in fantasy challenge used in single game modeplaying the game is really fun the graphic are great though helmet cant pop from hit really hard like in madden and the audio is reasonably good although the announcer can get pretty annoying but what sport video game announcer cant there are some option in the game setting which include setting the frequency of penalty turning pas interference onoff and turning player taunting onoff among thing if youre bored of game turnover either side of the ball dont seem a factor and the game really isnt realistic ummmmm nfl gameday maybe this is the game for you you can actually intercept in this game and sometimes there will be fumble and blocked kick a well juking and spinning make a lot bigger of a difference in this game in past another cool feature i found that if youre playing a visitor and youre beating the home team really badly the stand will start to empty a home team fan leave it pretty funnythere seemed to be a big problem though in single player game mode if youre playing rookie and beating everyone and you decide to move up to the veteran difficulty level prepare for a bad surprise it seems there is a big difficulty gap rookie and veteran and you get used to playing on veteran it can be very hard to win on that level which can get quite frustrating the dynasty mode wa fun for and if you play them long enough you can unlock hidden stadium however there are some quirk needing to be fixed it can be pretty difficult time to manage team salary cap also there didnt seem to be enough good player in the nfl draft offseason besides kicker and puntersthe trade system also big problem it is very difficult to get the computer to agree to a trade that youre proposing to them for instance i decided to try trading experience i went trade proposal and declined the one in the list i made my own trade i took the player from the team i had declined the trade from and offered the same player from my team that they had wanted in trade however the acceptability bar at the bottom of the screen didnt move and still said quotunacceptablequot there are still highlight in dynasty mode though there are a variety of award at the end of each season and the superbowl is played in a different city each year which i thought wa cool even if it wa sometimes unrealistic such a the superbowl in cleveland lol there is also a good player tracking system which also display their award they have along with their statsyou know superbowl mvp ha been to prowbols offensive rooke of the year etc etcall in all nfl fever is a good game thats well worth your money and will have you hooked playing video game football for hour at a time
