several year le neglecting assassin creed best described good reason whatsover finally decided go ahead jump series after hearing much wonder a to i never really jumped into it the long run im a bit disappointed i waited the way the third release to start i suppose better late never the hand for a much fun a assassin creed im sure strong the first entry is a story standpoint it a damn amazing game great twist and turn and a great plot likewise from a production stand point it also pretty awesome is why it so sad the spot assassin creed hit a snag is of all thing the gameplayby of probably familiar with the story but it never hurt to a refresher of sort desmond is kidnapped abstergo he subject and is hooked to a machine called the animus allows to experience the memory of a man named altair this wa a man wa part of the assassin in the third crusade after failing a mission altair is stripped of rank and his weapon taken away the way for him to work his way back up is to go and assassinate nine templar to prove a the plot move on it becomes a pretty engrossing tale in particular so much of it is so well presented the plot can be a little thick time and take some time to get to the point but it overall strong it also a plus that the voice acting is also incredibly strong tooreally drawing you into this fictional worldunfortunately this is part of where assassin creed can also hit a snag the world may be a bit big at time not so much the incredibly populated locale but rather that so many of the mission are repetitive you generally go on smaller mission to find people and interrogate or something before moving on to mark there not much variety at all the city are fun to explore the mission make the world seem smaller than it actually is there a lot to explore and some collecting to but for the most part this is no grand theft auto there a much deeper story but dont expect to be able to explore a city wrecking havoc wherever you go for some time assassin creed take pretty seriously in some respect and this is something to love the city are detailed with you also able to look across the landscape to map the data for on the other hand it quite surprising how little it feel like you can do after a while particularly because of the way you have to go about it often time youll have to blend in run around and push people about too much and youll alert enemy to your presence and have to fight them off and this is perhaps where assassin creed stumble the most the combat is for the most part boringdont get wrong the combat can be fun but after a while it becomes even more repetitive than the mission themselves this is because combat is relatively easy the guard often time stand by and let you take them on one by one and most time all it take is just a simple counter and theyll go easy and youll go this again and again and again the challenge is merely nonexistent this rear it head even more so you take into account that most of the bad guy are surprisingly stupid a altair you can blend in with crowd sometimes this work a little too well a altair may a well just be invisible you can sneak up behind a guard kill him and watch him drop to the ground while another guard look on so long a you blend theyll never suspect it you at first it hilarious to see a guard watch you stab someone and say five second later who this after a while however the novelty of a thing wear off and this is something that can also be exploited all the time when youre spotted and run away there are time when thing will be a little tough but stand and fight and youll easily emerge victorious on the other hand running and hiding work just a well sometimes so long a you get far enough away you can hide in bail of hay and the guard wont detect you on the other hand when you run far enough away and just sit on a bench and cant find you it can break your immersionassassins creed is still fun it just that it easy to take advantage of one of the best thing about it however is how one can seamlessly run across rooftop scale wall and jump from one protruding ledge to another it pretty seamless and isnt complicated at all not to mention you do manage to screw up it not big deal it also not sluggish at all or nearly a meticulous a say uncharted there room for error here and there are often many different place to explore guard will often attempt to follow you or hurl rock at you to knock you down and some will try to follow but theyll still rarely be a match for youthe game is a wonder on the eye by far a one of the better looking game in it wa a looker for sure particularly the location there definitely a pulse in the city area are populated with people going about business and their day you really get the sense that the denizen have life youll even hear them speaking a time or mumbling to themselves and the way altair interacts with them is quite fascinating a well a you run for instance hell push people of the way if youre walking hell gently brush past them the animation are smooth much of the time even when scaling wall there a lot of meticulous detail here it just a shame that from time to time the game buckle it weight there will be time when the frame rate will dip and there will be some performance issue there also moment of clipping although in experience they were few and far betweenwhat save assassin creed from many of it fault is that the narrative and story is very good despite how repetitive it can be youll often find yourself wanting to go down the rabbit hole to unravel more of the plot because that actually is pretty interesting in and of itself

game it seems to like to put the player in a small to medium sized pen where guy come behind obstacle like crashed car it feel youre ready to move on there flow of combat with the area no long hallway or large ballroom or temple courtyard to flip or wallrun it just a one level small pen which not much room to maneuver to be able to do movesthe gameplay also feel sluggish and unresponsive i found too many time that i wa trying to turn ryu or get him to flip out of a group of enemy or use specific combination but it seems to not respond properly there time that i wanted him to fight a specific target and he wanted to look at someone else which would lead me to actually get hit even i could gaet him to do what i want it wa slow and just didnt seem responsive but that doeasnt matter because honestly this game is super easy even when it not the hero mode the new developer talked about much in the previous game button mashed you learned that hardway and died this game you just get a gentle smack there no reward or satisfaction to something difficult because it handed to you the flow of combat seems off too in the st ninja gaiden it wa focused on a target with a small of other other guy to go you almost this nice way of focusing on a target yet untangle group or go after friend ninja gaiden really improved it too where there wa a fluid motion of engaging an enemy and finishing him then moving onto the next enemy withing a large group of enemy it felt almost a though you could chain the fight one large string of combo if you timed it well enough here it seems messy fight are somewhat chaotic but not in a good way it wa a though the rd game took battle element of the previous two game but made a mess of it nothing seemed to work right along with the sluggish control engagement just dont seem to have good pacing to do combo or to switch target the handling and gameplay element just seem off to me compared to other game in thie genre and even in this seriesnow quick time event or qte i always hated these in god of war i feel that are a lazy way for developer to do the top sequence without really making it part of the gameplay i do find done some way where wind waker interesting game say the least development never another zelda game garnered polarized reaction anticipating fan regard to reaction to wws artistic style gamers got their hand gem however fear zelda going astray becoming childish quickly dispelled and were treated to one special game know one could argue the legend of zelda ocarina of time is the greatest zelda game of all time you could also argue that twilight princess is the best refined zelda game of all time actually agree with of statement despite that though wind waker is still personal favorite zelda game and one that i absolutely incredible amount of nostalgia truly is a special gamethe most noticeable and immediately striking aspect of wind waker is undoubtedly graphic despite initial cynicism most people came to embrace this aspect of the game and view it one of it strongest aspect the cel shaded graphic on display spectacularly vibrant and seem to really pop the screen a you were actually looking a window a space another great benefit of this graphical style is that it really lends to emotional impactful storytelling in fact i find that wind waker character convey emotion and thought better of game released despite many are using advanced technology like motion capture these day this really add to the impact and emotional strength of wind waker already moving epic storythe art design really compliment this cel shaded graphical style well the place you go the people you encounter all of it scream classic nostalgic zelda taking you to place of well exactly hyrule sort of that you wont expect from going into flaming volcano to inside an island held entirely in a magical vast hallowedout tree trunk this is one heck of a visual adventure sailing across a vast ocean never looked good the music not go unmentioned either you hear classic legend of zelda theme and motif in the music but also new music that really fit in with that classical zelda vibe while striking a decidedly colorful tone on it the sound design is of equal caliber a well and really add to the atmosphere of every environment you visitseeing how this is a zelda game you can pretty much guess the premise of the story it set in a world the ocean cover most of the landscape pockmarked island big and small on one particular island it is customary for boy of a certain age to dress a the legendary hero of time from the nowfairytale folklore people tellthe story that gamers played in ocarina of time in order to instill and emulate in the boy the same courage a that legendary hero of time well it one boy birthday but wearing the hero tunic is more than customary a is to become his own fabled hero his sister is kidnapped by a giant evil bird and he go to save herthats the initial premise of the story it not entirely derivative of the princess in distress tale were used to and by the end of this epic tale link will have joined pirate become the next hero approved by the god go through dungeon for ancient powerful artifact to save the day meet familiar character and have one heckuva climatic ending sequence to think thats a taste of where the story will take you i have to admit when i first went into ww i expected amazing gameplay gorgeous sound and art design and a merely decent acceptable story but boy i in for a surprise the story here is exceptionally deep even surprisingly dark time and that is right my alley i absolutely love the story in wind waker and it may very well my favorite aspect it definitely isnt kiddy in sense of the word it a adult a any of link adventure have ever i really dont want to give away any specific detail but suffice to say i picked my jaw off the floor and even held back a tear here and more than once throughout the entire tale it truly specialthe gameplay is a you would expect from a zelda game meaning refined near perfection the basic format is here explore a large open world find important area and meet important people go on sidequests enter crucial temple go through dungeon with it various clever puzzle and new gadget imperative to succeed and fight epic bos battle the thing different here is that instead of traversing dry land on epona you traverse vast oceanic space on the red king of lion the overworld is an ocean this really feel like the biggest zelda game space ever even in retrospectsome find the sailing part to be boring but not i find very relaxing and enjoyable to take in the game world radiant sunrise beautiful sunset and storm on the open sea is a sight to behold and it scene like this the sailing sequence that really add to the atmotsphere of the story there are le temple in wind waker than zelda game and is a bit shorter a a result it also seems to be a bit easier than other title in this franchise but none of these issue lessen the value of the experience in any way this is a good a zelda gameplay get in fact there is a substantial amount of swordplay improvement here it predecessor and that really add to the feeling of a legendary swordsman hero amazing stuffi know that im missing of the more minor detail here but im sure you get the idea i could write twice this much time three about this amazing gemstone in nintedos gaming library a a matter of fact i have played this game at least once year since i bought it and it never get old show any sign of age whatsoever it a timeless classic and a mustplay for anyone love zelda adventure with fantastic story this game feel like a prettier more stylistic ocarina of time it an incredibly epic story a beautiful imaginationfueled design and gameplay bordering on perfection it really is that good buy it sail through it majesty and become a new hero worthy of legend

storyyou begin game atsuki saijo young member the group named fort the person charge of rooting infection called silent he traveled the town of kisaragi in order to track the perpetrator of several crime a well a a notorious silent infectee investigating atsuki to pose a a normal high school student and glean information peer the story while sounding simple enough first becomes confusing and difficult to wade a time go doesnt help the game come multiple ending meaning want the full picture youre going to to play through it multiple time the plot isnt would call bad it certainly try to mash many theme together the tone of the story seemed to a horror storymystery at the start but it quickly changed to one of high school fluff and drama the mixture didnt sit well with especially since you could find looking at a suicide one minute and discussing cake the nextgameplayas known a a visual novel the gameplay in luxpain mainly consists of sifting through mountain of text while running around town talking to different people the game try to give you the illusion that youre free to go you want school but thats really it an illusion always certain place where you wont be able to go and really there almost strategy involved in searching the town all you have to is check the available area hitting the hay at atsukis house luxpain really hold hand throughout the entire course of the game and rarely let you have control of your action it certainly possible to choose order you want to do thing in but it almost never make a difference at school and around town youll often find people to talk to and theyll rattle string of dialogue while you stand around saying nothing there are a time and there youll get to navigate a bland and uninteresting dialogue tree but that atsuki is completely quiet it nice that there many people around town to talk to but i often got the feeling that were talking at me with me a little more freedom of choice would have helped the game a whole lot you never really choose anything to say do in fact the mystery basically solves youoccasionally when talking with people atsuki notice a worm inside someone and begin using sigma to detect it it a bit like a simple minigame all you have to do is scratch away at the screen and then hold the stylus the worm it gone there really not much skill involved with it thats done a term will appear the term is generally just a few word which will appear to have almost no meaning at first sometimes the term are relevant to the mystery but sometimes theyre completely inane at the start of the game i impressed with the way the thought of the killer and his victim presented there wa a sense of disjointedness and all tension and fear but the majority of other people thought are a good deal le impressive i remember that near the start of the game i to scan rui yamase and tap on a worm the term showed and thought were abouthow much liked her school it wa quite simply useless information ruis love of school wa never vital information and it didnt provide me with real insight anything either that wasnt the time it happened there were several other occasion where the thought of the person had nothing to do with the investigation at all sometimes phrase are mentioned and then never brought up every and again youll encounter a larger silent inside of someone and then you have to go through luxpains equivalent of a bos battle sequence are rarely anything more challenging than simply tapping on the touch screen though there almost no other interactivity with the touch screen except for the moment when you have to scribble madly at the screen in order to uncover a worm of the time due to the enormous amount of text youll simply be mashing the a button like your life depends on itone of the many thing that rubbed me the wrong way luxpain wa the fact that i constantly had to refer back to the manual to remind what wa going on at the beginning of the story the game simply dump you into the overworld map without so much a a vague explanation of the menu system lack of a tutorial can actually severely affect gameplay case in point certain event are limitedtimeonly and expire if you dont see to right away natsuki one of atsukis ally from fort ha a very useful scanning ability which let you know much time you have to witness the event before it lost forever unfortunately the game neglect to inform you of this in fact i didnt even realize that event had time limit until i missed one or two of them missing important cutscenes mean that you will most likely not get the best ending on your first playthrough there an incredible amount of information that the game simply doesnt tell you instead youll have to pick up your manual assuming you still own it and read through it just to figure out what in the blue blaze youre supposed to be doingthats the majority of luxpains gameplay in a nutshell visit place at school and around town talk to people listen to inane psychobabble repeat it not bad it just boring half the time youll have no idea what your peer or fellow townsfolk are talking or thinking about and trying to shovel through massive clot of pointless dialogue only make the problem worsevisuals character audio and writingluxpain is a visual novel and a usually consists of simple static image on an unmoving background character sprite usually have a few different emotion all of which look decent and get the point across it a slicklooking game and will most likely appeal to an audience enjoys anime and manga it closely resembles of the more recent persona game in case a frame of reference is needed there are quite a few different character and animation packed into the game which is something ill praise luxpain for the music wa decent but nothing struck me a particularly memorable it wa standard fare and served mainly a background noise to whatever else wa going onas mentioned before there are ton of character in luxpain really there are youll encounter a variety of people from day to day some of which may end up being key part of your investigation the game manages to flesh out most of your schoolmate fairly well but there one glaringly obvious problem that rubbed me the wrong way i didnt connect at all with atsuki let sum thing upatsuki an orphan whose parent and sister were killed he supposedly quite attractive but brood a lot and rarely say anything throughout the course of the game he show little emotion or reaction to anything his friend do or say how many of these hero have i seen before his type is a dimeadozen it not a though i like or disliked it a though he just never bothered to show up on the day when they were handing out personalitiesmy final and possibly most infuriating problem with luxpain is the translation and localization issue to put it frankly the game is absolutely filled with grammar punctuation and spelling error this is a textbased game in which virtually all you do is read they have no excuse for screwing it up sometimes i found myself getting lost in the midst of conversation the way the character talked wa so obtuse and irregular the dialogue is no mean unintelligible but it very distracting to try and pay attention to a serious scene when eye keep getting stuck on missing punctuation mark sometimes usually more important scene a voiceover will begin the voice acting is quite good i have no complaint with it so whats the matter the text and the voice sometimes dont match it confusing frustrating and above all it make you wonder who proofread this game it really have cleaned up more before being released to the consumer if you are a stickler for proper grammar and spelling bewareconclusionluxpain could have been a great game the concept of exploring a town hunting down a supernatural mental virus and uncovering a sinister plot sound awesome unfortunately it didnt live up to my expectation the lack of tutorial repetitive nature of gameplay convoluted story and flawed dialogue will drive many gamers into either a state of severe boredom or a one of teethgnashing insanity although i had a decent time with it i cant really recommend itthe whole thing left a rather bad taste in my mouth because it could have been great only it wasnt

silent hill hd collection brings back the two game the silent hill series helped define the series whole in glorious high definitionthe first silent hill game the psone released two year later something extremely rare happened a sequel wa released that wa far superior predecessor in graphic story the release the third game went back to the story of the character the first game the basis the movie silent hill from and silent hill revelation from probably know that and the two game featured youre buying collection neednt go deep the story of the game the port to the p look absolutely gorgeous i actually a hard time telling the difference the hd port and standard playstation graphic it that good of a transfer the new voice acting in game far superior to the original and i dont usually condone going back and reediting creative property george lucas and star war spring to mind ill make exception here james sunderland new voice in particular is much better the version the actor played vincent brook in atluss catherine portrays james a a tortured man with deepseated psychological and sexual issue that manifest into uncontrollable flesh in a town right next door to hell known a silent hillthe gameplay is awesome a return to the classic style is always fun while i prefer the newer downpour style of gameplay this a retro feel to that give the player a constant sense of unease of control and making the game all the more intense i prefer the control the d control personally something im not sure wa available in the original p release of game either way this collection is well worth the thirty dollar and if youre a fan of silent hill buy it

qualitative feature of doom iii graphic engine that impressed it ability to render video in real time make way the level you see monitor upon are often displayed video that purport to explain some aspect of the story thought wa a cool effect and i havent seen it in any other gamethe sound and music in doom iii are also quite good and you may wish to play the game a good set of surround speakersnevertheless this graphic and audio excellence come a price i played the game on ghz pentium system mb ram and a mb radeon pro graphic card and experienced significant performance problem many of these problem alleviated by downloading driver ati that noticeably improved performance but my pc could still eek good performance at x screen resolution at midquality graphic setting youve got the money and the inclination id suggest you spare no expense in getting the best gaming computer available this gamethe gameplay fairly standard for a shooter you wonder through corridor and room killing monster if dont kill you first and you look for important item a weapon ammo health kit armor and item you may need to open a locked door sometimes it is very helpful if essential to find a code you use to open a door or a storage cabinet since the level are very often dark you need to use a flashlight a lot much ado ha been made that you can not use the flashlight and a weapon simultaneously although the flashlight can used a a weak weapon however i found that a good strategy is if confronted by enemy in a dark area one run to a lighted area and battle the monster if possiblespeaking of the monster they are mostly horrific and they make the game a bit too scary even for me although the first of the game or so you battle mostly zombie that are rather weak youll be fighting for your life tougher monster later in the game one monster that really sent chill my spine is the hellknight these thing are about the most frightening monster ive seen in any game theyre huge ugly very powerful and youd better be ready to fight if you run one in some dark corridor on one level my health wa low and a hellknight wa coming for me fortunately i wa able to circle strafe around a metal lift and i managed to shoot it with my weapon and duck behind the lift it could retaliate i killed and breathed a sigh of relief battle like this one are make this game so horrific and im no sissy but frankly it got to be too much at time the bos battle were too difficult in my opinion and i to use cheat code to get pas at least two of the bossesdespite some of the imperfection in this game i must give id credit for creating what im sure many people might consider a masterpiece i really liked most of the game and i believe it wa worth the wait just keep one thought in mind however doom iii is an intense and scary experience thats not for the faint of heart enter if you dare

hesitated play xcom enemy unknown im huge fan alpha centauri alien crossfire expansion i havent liked a civilization game since civ ii and the game based the original xcom wa complex to get nevertheless one day i decided to give it a try told great it wa a coworker and try it i didxcomenemy unknown wa for me equal part amazement and frustration everyone played it know a hard game a hard game hard fact that i completely lost the game on first playthrough on easy my pride wa severely wounded to say nothing of my squad member i decided to try it and on the second playthrough i wa able to beat the game i found the gameplay to amazingly fun but hard hard hard oh yeah and xcomenemy unknown in the window pc version ha horrible bug im talking gamebreaking bug a in spending hour playing to it suddenly freeze the entire pc a in running window update and finding that the game wont launch a in freezing for second at a time every minute and locking my pc completely on the final level i wa eventually able to beat the game by saving often in the middle of battle rebooting frequently and uninstalling hundred of patch on my computer and removing every program except the bare essential needed to boot and use my pc but good grief the game good butit left me wishing i gotten the console versionfast forward to the end of year my best bro bought me a copy of this expansion a great guy after played the game to completion i have concluded that anyone interested skip enemy unknown entirely for first playthrough and then go back to the original want to try a steamlined experience my reasonsbug fixespraise the lord of gaming the horrible gamebreaking bug that plagued enemy unknown have fixed in this expansion the freezing in battle is gone the game launch failure gone the complete system lockup are gone and yes i wa even able to complete the final mission in a single sitting without my computer crashing woohoo i havent tried playing the original enemy unknown since getting enemy within yet so i cant say whether the fix affect i may never know becauserebalanced gameplayyeah yeah people have gone on and on about how the original enemy unknown wa balanced like a fine violin playing while sipped fine wine and ate your fine cheese your fine girlfriend but i to burst your bubble and tell you that enemy unknown had aspect that really unbalanced for starter assault class soldier were almost impossible to keep alive they mucho damage but since they have fewer hitpoints and are best at close range i watched all of get massacred likewise heavy had poor aim that they were pretty much useless so like people i just ended up making a squad of mostly sniper and medic this my friend is balance enemy within fix thisquite simply the addition of meld force you to come of hiding and go after objective making the offensivedefensive more balanced and use additional capability to balance the deficiency in your soldiersinvisible psychic mutantsenemy unknown had special type of armor but their perk were so low compared to their negative that you wouldnt be blamed for just sticking with plainjane weapon and armor that simply did the most damage all that change with meld though now your assault class literally be the most powerful unit in the game i know this because my bluehaired german woman had genetic cloaking autofire on near enemy double attack and so many defensive stat boost that yes wa pretty much impossible to kill ah nothing like a double shotgun to the servo of a mech by a woman who fire a cannon at point blank range and wa two foot away because she wa invisible and of course if that doesnt work shell fry youwith mind mwahaahaaa ahem at rate when you have medic that cant be poisoned strangled heavy with super vision and invisible assault troop that special armor and weapon youve been throwing away and all the lovely new addition to this game go being useless to useful tradeoff giving cloaking armor to your medic who cant be poisoned or flight gear to your supereagleeyed sniper suddenly make a lot more sense this would unbalance the game if it werent for all the new soupedup enemy tromping around in mech suit and strangling you like smaller version of squidies from the matrix but thats okay becausesuper robot warsthe mech suit completely change thing up in this expansion because they can not hide they are good for charging into battle because they can heal multiple unit they encourage you to be more wreckless in your charge and because they can devestating closerange damage to a single unit or cause panicdeath in entire group they arejust plain fun seriously who doesnt want to run around in a giant robot suit smashing and blasting alien isnt that every boy dreamthe more thing changethere are more map to play on more mission an entire subplot with an enemy organization a frantic battle to defend the base an alien attack more type of grenade more language spoken medal to pin on your best troop genetic modification robot suit of armor but the main game and the primary gameplay have not changed if you didnt like enemy unknown this game wont convert you arent underwater mission or sky mission or space mission youre not going to fly skyrangers or have any new type of gameplay but the addition here are enough that this is definitely version of xcom and there is very little reason to go back in my opinion i can do without most of the other change people might have asked for but one just irritate me a bit i would love a branch storyline with different ending or at the very least a better one got in enemy unknown that said the journey is still very much worth taking and this game is even more fun that it wa couple that with the miraculous bug fix and we have a winner for everyone who enjoyed the first game and a great entry point for everyone who hasnt given it a try yet

pc you like action game a good storyline terrific presentation great graphic and a whole lot bang buck you pick sensational game mafia tale of tommy angelo driverturnedmafioso henchman work for salieri and gang combining aspect of grand theft auto iii and the terrific max payne game mafia delivers unparalleled gaming experience show the pc is the best platform around for the mature gamerthe city of lost heaven is packed style and substance with nod new york city and new jersey and the backdrop work perfectly the car the character the mission and the gunfight combine to keep you interested and wanting to come back for the game start a little slow you get the car race the rest of the mission become a game within assassination escort planting bomb bootlegging revengeyou name everything involved with organized crime is represented and represented well the graphic crisp and blood flow plenty it should you liquidate the member of an opposing family with a tommy gun an italian restaurant the voice acting is superb and the quotflashbackquot method of explaining the story work perfectly the sound of the city make the entire game come alive with each section of the bustling metropolis orchestrated to beat the car look and sound genuine and the driving portion of the game sometimes tedious are a necessity that youll eventually come to accept and have fun with especially when youre blowing away the windshield of your tail while hitting corner mph in a flatbed truckthere are knock the game a the ability to save whenever you want the game autosaves key point this frustrate some since many time a difficult gunfight that promise quick death have to replayed multiple time since you cant save at will however is a greater satisfaction killing your opponent since the game will usually save after a tough shooting sequence also the ai in the game is rather strange enemy are either completely stupid challenging and alltoooften youll find shaking your head in disbelief after you find that your enemy still stand despite the pointblank blast of your pumpaction shotgunbut dont be fooled mafia is wholeheartedly recommended the drivinggunfight action sequence are the best in the business and when you combine the tight storyline with the sensational mission design youve got a game that will keep you enthralled for many night a great holiday gift for the adult pc gamer in your family omerta

nintendo always lovehate relationship i liked wii outstanding exclusive however i hated nintendo constantly trying shove innovation throat to a certain extent i feel the the wii u refrain the console entertaining though and the end entertainment the whole reason gamersdesign soon a i unpacked box i wa surprised the size the wii u the console is the size of a sandwich however the size is actually advantage in my opinion fit comfortably alongside my p and my biggest gripe the design is the gamepad i know that a lot of people love thing however im to give my opinion i miss the day nintendo worried about fun innovation and like youve probably hear the gamepad is simply a gimmick that doesnt mean that i dislike the controller it fit nicely in my hand are a game that take advantage of a second screen despite this it still feel unnecessarygames here come the fun part in term of enjoyable game the wii u is league ahead of the competition i purchased this bundle with several game from super mario world to monster hunter ultimate there is plenty of way to game the wii u the game i had the fun with is arkham city armored edition not doe this iteration of an already fantastic game include of the dlc it also plenty of exclusive feature even the wii u doesnt have game on it right now that appeal to you it ha a promising future that includes game a super smash bros mario kart and the mysterious yet excitingly nicknamed xconclusion im aware that i didnt touch upon aspect of the console that are customary such a the interface and community this is the interface and community are perfect combine this with an outstanding library of game and ambitious lineup of game to come it fairly easy to forgive the wii u for it sometimes poor design choice this console is definitely worth a buy

metroid hard game review a lot reason first take a beloved franchise remove many of element made it great it also feature a previously mute character become a poorlywritten horriblyacted wuss the face of the danger shes faced in many way a step back for the metroid franchise the excellent prime gamesi guess since everyone else need to talk the story first metroid other m story is abomination it script is one of the worst ever written it contains moment that make sense in of the game context it twist obvious and handled poorly point made hour ago are repeated endlessly a murder mystery plot is brought and left completely unresolved many pointed out the fact that samus aran previously an amazingly competent female bounty hunter is reduced to a simpering mother figure must subservient to a man who doesnt outrank there something to that and yeah it amazingly sexist even apart clunkily it handled im concerned about it doe to the feel of the gameprevious metroid game based exploration contained labyrinthine world and the gameplay based around the gradual widening of world new weapon and tool became available they became series of revelation that built upon one another culminating in bos battle and discovery feeling of accomplishment is replaced the arbitrary edict of a bureaucrat that samus doesnt even work for and the implementation stink for reason this guy cant be bothered to authorize the varia suit the second samus step an environment that hurt her no need to wait awhile this independent woman suffers for no reason all beyond that an explanation is given to certain type of weapon cant be used make a certain amount of sense but what possible reason could be to authorize the use of a suit that doe nothing but protect it wearer what about the grapple beam which isnt a weapon at all or the speed booster this is never really explained there no way it could be made to make sensethe gameplay of other m is better it story though still containing many odd decision one of the strangest is the ability to scan some object but not others the game constantly contains thing that look like they be useful but arent this is a departure from the prime series in which nearly everything could be scanned for useful information and worldbuilding thats all gone here in favor of able to scan object that be blown up and occasionally storyrelevant object the game also contains annoying section in which it shift to firstperson scan the correct thing which isnt labeled more than once i to spin around until something looked interestingthe core gameplay is similar to a version of super metroid with le exploration this is far the linear metroid game and i think thats a mistake in a series known for it explorationbased gameplay the decision to use the wiis dpad instead of the nunchuks analog stick lead to some imprecision though one get the impression that the game wa designed with this in mind problem with it rarely come up in addition the decision to wrest the decision of to use missile away from the player lead to some very frustrating moment the elimination of powerups is an odd omission a well instead of getting simply hold the wiimote upwards and hold a until missile refill or when youre low on health until a bar fill restoring some of it one could argue this wa done to avoid the problem of collecting powerups in a pseudo d environment but the original prime solved this problem in by letting the charge beam attract the power ups i dont understand why this couldnt have done here toobut and this is a big but one cant really blame nintendo or team ninja for refusing to simply make another entry in the prime series a someone who preferred the control scheme of the gamecube controller to that of metroid prime imprecise aiming mechanism i can see why someone would want to move away from it while the game on the whole may be a mistake it at least took some chance with the formula of metroid in an attempt to streamline it instead of adding feature nintendo been playing it safe for so long with some many of it franchise it kind of nice to see them take a chance with a major label the chance doesnt pay a well a it should have but hey this is how progress get madethe compliment i can give other m are actually kind of numerous despite the control problem the team made them work pretty well for the bos battle which are often pretty spectacular the fight with ridley despite immediately following one of the game most insulting moment is one of the best encounter with in of the game comparable i think to the encounter at the end of the first prime the game functional final boss are great a well a little short the game difficulty curve is about deadon for i think the final bos may actually be the most difficult to killthe game benefit from extremely brisk pacing a well just when i thought i wa about to get sick of the game for stagnating it introduced a new weapon or an interesting section which kept thing fresh throughout or to put it another way if metroid prime wa this series jurassic park this is it jurassic park dumber more actionoriented but briskly getting the job done the fact that i finished the game in about hour is actually a point in it favor it come in doe what it need to and get out before one can really get too tired of it think of it a the minute franchise threequel that doesnt compare to the original but is entertaining nonetheless and i think your expectation be set about rightthe game look just fine and sound just fine too the music isnt too memorable and the woman voicing samus is just awful but the rest of it is functional on an aesthetic level i would have like a couple of track that paid tribute to classic metroid tune but i criticized nintendo for stagnating so whatever im loathe to criticize a wii game graphic why beat a dead horse but there nothing wrong heredoes that spell a recommendation just barely and for the price currently listed on amazon i got it for if you cant get past the sexism i cant say it bother too much compared to the storytelling fumble by all mean stay away youll be fully justified but take metroid other m for what it is a dumb action game never sega genesis growing didnt stop going friend house playing fantastic sonic the hedgehog series that reason i fond memory sonics first console outing from sonic the hedgehog up sonic knuckle let pretend that blast didnt exist unfortunately sonic and i parted way for quite time that barring a brief stint sonic hero on my gamecube and sonic rush on my d well a the aforementioned classic a part of one of sonic collection game but i certainly havent unaware of the significant decline quality of sonic game over the last decade so i heard that sonic generation one of the best sonic title to come along in year one that paid tribute to the classic that know and love i knew that wa one game id need to check sadly i discovered that one of the best sonic title to come along in year apparently doesnt count for muchsonic generation started extremely strongly for me aside from some annoying cutscenes and a poor attempt giving this game some sort of plot the game featured remake of some of the memorable zone from the genesis classic including green hill zone from the original chemical plant from sonic and sky sanctuary from sonic knuckle level in the game featured act the first a classic version thats completely side scrolling but still us some impressive d effect from time to time and the being a modern version that us the d version of sonic shifting seamlessly from d to d play playing act in all of those zone wa a lot of fun and for a second i thought that i wa missing out on some genuinely great game skipping most of the d sonic library unfortunately a the game progressed that attitude quickly changed a the game progressed the quality in level design declined with the final zone planet wisp being so completely awful that i refuse to play anymore the later level also rather repetitive with of the zone in the game featuring citybased level wa that really necessary sonic game have featured so many awesome fantasylike environment yet give u urban one the bos fight are equally bad with the second to last bos being completely buggy everything from bad hit detection to broken control to a lockon targeting mechanism that work half the time and the final bos so poorly designed and unenjoyable that i had a hard time believing that i wa still playing a sonic gamethere seem to alarming number of bug in this game for something thats been out for month ive had the game crash twice on me so far and countless issue with control working when they particularly with the jump button button and lockon function for d sonic yet despite problem i finished the game in hour a lot of challenge content to tackle afterward but a lot of these are just speed run or lousy gimmick tacked onto part of or all of a level for completionists this might bump up the playtime significantly but just want to play the game and see most of the content that the game to offer you wont be longthat been said the game is not without it merit the graphic and the music are fantastic the former offering amazing view of the game massive level with a buttery smooth framerate if computer handle it and the latter featuring some memorable remixes and original version of the library best musical offering there is plenty of artmusicvideo content to unlock for the nostalgic a lot of level offer a great sense of speed and exploration that reward the persistent player despite a level falling completely flathonestly if sega had managed to make the entire game a good a the first of the game i would have given it star in a heartbeat everybody remembers sonic for the genesisera classic there is very little beyond that that is worth celebrating and paying tribute to in a future title

sephiroth is a black a the deepest pit of hell an embodiment of the satanic ungodly blasphemous and profane force which seek to crush the frail yet unbending rose of the right still one a meek a i couldnt hope to analyze all the intricacy metaphor chiasma simile hyperbole analogy fable and parable which fill up this text which is easily the densest and richest of all known human and alien languagesall the beauty truth meaning wonder significance and interest in all the world are a nothing you have discovered this hidden treasure i for one would trade all my remaining day for one more minute of final fantasy vii inspired pleasure rather than forced to live a hollow bitter joyless existence without it

perfectly honest im big fan military shooter occasion stomach a good fps halo metroid prime series tactical shooter like rainbow six vega of call of duty medal of honor whatever else little to interest i thought id check out game anyway and while still not genre and not a game id buy i did fun and got it unlike corruption combined a great atmosphere and story with control this seems like it fun to play to experience the whole packageits a wwii shooter so know mean invasion of normandy storming city covered rubble and debris and destroying uboats it not a particularly engaging story and time it feel more like youre going through the campaign mode to play the next mission rather than get more of the story though might find it intriguing and fan of war shooter could find it worthwhile thoughgraphically the game isnt exactly stellar even in progressive scan widescreen while it look fine on it and i didnt notice a lot of issue with detail or texture it doesnt really have that jawdropping feel that game or even stellar art design but of course war game shouldnt wrong in term of sound and while i dont have the benefit of a surround system the gunfire explosion and other element tended to be accurate and i even had that private ryanesque ringing in ear it muffled the sound voice acting is alright not exceptional but not laughable either so thats a good plusone of the thing many gamers anticipated with the introduction of the wii remote in regard to first person shooter and this game is certainly no slouch in fact it one of the best control experience ive had in the genre deadly on the battlefield never so fun and picking guy in the distance without that constant adjusting analog stick wa quite satisfying to say the least there also other element like peeking around corner tilting the nunchuk or throwing grenade by obviously a throwing motion with the wiimote wa quite immersive there even some nifty idea such a putting it on your shoulder to mimic carrying a bazooka or tilting it to turn radio dial to call headquarters wa wellhandledhowever i still have many nitpicks one some weapon such a the sniper rifle i found quite sluggish and aiming to hit the next guy felt strangely slow and going for the next guy took a lot more time than i wanted prompting me to exit the scope screen and just reposition and go and one i wouldve liked wa something like halo or resistance where just pressing one button could throw your grenade while it neater to press a to pull the pin and doing the throwing motion i wouldve liked immediate return to my gun rather than having to press on the dpad to go back and not just be stuck on grenadesis it buyworthy unless this genre is your thing than by all mean give it a play but you have game like rainbow six vega resistance or call of duty the orange box and even the wiis own metroid prime it wouldnt matter all much you missed this one but if you decide to give it a try than there is some fun to be had with this one

caught one discount bin at work figured id give try even it proved disappointing it wasnt like i dropping fifty buck it well it would worth fifty morethis one the best title ive ever played the xbox or system it great action incredible gameplay and truly innovative idea the story is pretty simple youre glitch a reassembled mining robot who to save fellow robot the nefarious scheme of general corrosive and his legion of evil mil bot this game is basically a combination of a thirdperson shooter a troublefree camera setup a definite plus and a platformer missionbased go from point a to point b kill anything get way go to the next level thats par for the course with platformers make this game stand out however is intense action and the unique element incorporated it gameplay hijack enemy robot either terminal scattered the game looking much like arcade console or using a control tether awarded about halfway through the game sometimes this is required in order to advance some security checkpoint that enemy bot can pas other time youre allowed to wreak havoc at one point you control a giant titan robot a quotweapon of mass destructionquot if there ever wa one if youre careful you can sneak on enemy hijack and have him take out a number of enemy he destroyed or go out of range another way to take control of an enemy is to use a recruitment grenade use that and hell fight for you he dead or you release hima tip youre finished using an enemy bot have him destroy jump into water or a chasm for example otherwise thats another enemy youll have to deal withyou begin with some basic weapon gaining powerful one the game progress additionally most of the weapon can be upgraded either with upgrade found at random point in the game or buying from two shopkeeping robot with load of attitude natch that you encounter and there you buy upgrade using washer that dead enemy sometimes leave behinda couple of hint an easy way to get extra washer is to shoot enemy computer terminal and machine also dont be quick to buy upgrade and dont upgrade every weapon some are worth it and some arent the game give you some upgrade for example you get one at the beginning of quotenter the trenchesquot and another is hidden behind a large rock in a trench definitely upgrade the rocket launcher your best defense titan the spew a machinegun basically the rivet gun fire explosive rivet and ha good range and the scatter blaster devastating at close range dont bother to spend the extra rivet on the mining laser weak even at maximum power or the ripper dittoyou also have a steady supply of coring charge the game equivalent of grenade and special thrown weapon there the emp grenade cast an electromagnetic pulse that disables enemy for a moment long enough for you to destroy or hijack them be careful though you have some shielding from the emp effect it can disorient you if you get too close magma grenade cast a lethally intense pool of liquid fire effective against titan or closelyclustered enemiesscattered throughout the game are gold chip collect enough of them and youll unlock multiplayer level also you can gain speed chip by finishing a level in a certain amount of timegraphically this title really shine on the xbox the game feature great particle effect when you destroy an enemy tends to explode in stage usually from the top shedding wire gear and shrapnel in every direction the larger the enemy the more impressive his demise lighting and environmental effect are realistically rendered and glitch himself is welldesigned and move easily and smoothly control are simple and uncomplicated doublehanded attack for example with the spew and a coring charge are very effective against large group of enemy a single rocket shot combined with a coring charge directed at a titan can be devastatingwhat else can i say firstrate the way full of action humor and excellent gameplay definitely recommended to fan of action game and shooterschristian wheeler

got first legobased game original star war game i fell love the series simple done with excellent incredibly fun execution couldnt help but fall in love with it it wa game that would appeal child easily and perhaps adult even easily recreating favorite scene the film followed suit with the lego indiana jones trilogy the complete adventure i still wanted nothing to with crystal skull when the first lego batman came i wa ecstatic and i played it my finger ready to fall my favorite comic character of time a lego game it wa probably my favorite of the lego series that i had playeduntil lego batman dc super hero came out that isi playing this game with a greater fervor of the previous game combined the biggest plus regarding this game the much more open worldness of the game it feel like a much bigger game and it certainly is in regard to character story and graphic the main story is much like the older and sillier teamup comic book in the best villain combine force to wreak havoc respective hero which is brings together batman robin and superman v the joker and lex luthor of course all of the inmate of arkham escape well so youre many of the villain of the first game a well such a twoface harley quinn the penguin catwoman etc but this isnt three character a the hero a you go deeper the story gameplay you get the of the current lineup of the justice league wonder woman green lantern the flash and cyborgyou still have the constant pumping of danny elfmans iconic score the batman film but nicely when youre in the open world scenario you choose to fly with superman you get the even more iconic john williams superman theme a far a sound design is concerned this is the first time that youre treated to actual dialogue in a lego game and the dialogue is aimed kid but for allages game the dialogue fit character very well and particularly the newscast the cutscenes very clever with the scroll at the bottom of the screen which is something the adult get a big kick out of the sound effect are terrific and you even have clancy brown returning to voice lex luthor a in the superman and justice league animated series sadly mark hamill kevin conroy tim daly thoughthe biggest attraction for me personally wa the amazing list of unlockable character character like aquaman hush ra al ghul hawkman and many many more are hiding around town waiting for you to build the golden door so that when you do get to the free play mode you pick and choose without always to rely on the suit also the dlc for this game which includes pack of five heroesvillains a piece is very inexpensive and is really for the big comic fansthere are nitpicky problem that i have with the game i wish that green lantern could shoot projectile from ring i wish the flash could run straight up building like i stated nitpicky but the problem i have with the game play is the flight mechanic are a little clumsy during the openworld segment and thats a pretty minor problem i know that many people play coop are having some problem with the ingame camera coop play but since i dont even have another controller honestly not something i could comment on ideally these game are designed to play with another person so that can join in the fun but im more of a solo player anyway so it never been a concern although my wife expressed interest in playing this game with me a did together with the first lego batman so i might looking for another controller soonfor right though lego batman is one fantastically entertaining game filled with action humor and joy and if youre a fan of the previous game this be a really easy buy

over pandora and there a resistance called the crimson raider want to stop going with plan ill leave it at that since thing more deep here than they the first game and i dont want to ruin of the twist though most of the fun and time put the game is in side mission if you were to ignore them altogether you probably clear the game in the time it would take to do everything in the first run wheres the fun in that though the world of pandora ha a lot to see and shoot with bullet and loot chest everywhere bandit skag hyperion robot and more are just a plentiful and a usual there ungodly amount of gun to go it insane two gun can look identical and have the exact attribute in every category but one may have a slightly bigger magazine size or have better stability elemental weapon are back explosive fire corrosive electric and slag basically if you loved the first game there nothing here you wont likein the previous game you four different class this time around you can have to if you buy two of the dlc class but you still have access to the main from the get go they all play a little bit like the previous class though one is essentially the same thing axton the commando is pretty much roland the soldier ha a rad turret that can be deployed a his action skill use this to act a a distraction for enemy you take cover and recover or snipe them from a distance or just deploy it and shoot sidebyside zero the assassin would be mordecai the hunter i suppose with his skill tree a section that buff his sniper skill he also ha a unique ability that creates a hologram of to distract enemy while he turn invisible a the time run out for this mode zero do more damage want a great critical hit hit em at the last possible moment maya is another siren like lilith with a new ability ha a phaselock let levitate an enemy into an orb for several second making them a sitting duck it doesnt sound that good on it but when you look at her skill tree and realize that this ability can draw in foe cause everything around it to burn or melt and it can give maya health if the enemy is killed while phaselocked it quickly becomes clear that this skill rule and if the enemy is too strong like a bos or something they take raw damage instead of trapped finally there salvador the gunzerker do i need to say anything more than that he can use two gun at with his skill any two gun a sniper rifle and a machine gun sure a rocket launcher and a shotgun not two rocket launcher oh yeah he can do that too something great about the class this time around is that none of them are truly more efficient with a certain weapon type like they were in the previous game yes of skill tree ability help out with certain weapon type but x character isnt best with x gunthe game also ha much better graphic and the soundtrack is just a memorable too my absolute favorite track come from my favorite mission in the game the circle of slaughter survive round of an onslaught of bandit while this killer track bandit slaughter is playing seriously go search for that track and listen to it that sucker get me pumped for circle of slaughter every time and i never get sick of hearing ittheres so much more i could talk about with this game to try and convince you that it worth playing hopefully the low price get it a little more attention now are a few minor nitpicks i have though that keep it from being a star title first it the same issue i had with the last game and it backtracking i got sooooooo tired of going two area over and over for certain mission or having to walk back through an area because the car couldnt pas through an entryway or something it seemed like the fast travel station could have placed better or there could have been maybe two per map to cut on this having them so far apart doesnt add challenge it just get annoying a while and maybe it just me creeping up on in year or ive dealt with this kind of humor too much in other mediaits the writing a lot of the humor here will probably be enjoyed a lot of gamers i liked some of it too just not when it variant of the same thing repeated over and over there were only a few time where i really laughed out loud notably a robot who want to be human trying to think human thing had some line that were just plain comic gold aside from that most of the threat from enemy are the kind of thing youd hear from a middle schooler who just watched south park for the first time the only other thing ill mention is that character animation could have been much better when two maijor character in the town of sanctuary are going over something terrible that handsome jack did theyre having a heated conversation with great voice acting yet theyll just wave one hand around while the other hand is on their hip and the other character is standing there in a neutral stance you couldnt put a little more effort into these animation it nothing major at all just something that bugged me after a whiletiny complaint aside borderland is a blast and one of the more memorable title ive played this generation ill definitely be getting the game of the year edition when it come out im going to work on a new indeed scariest game ive ever played dont get scared easily thing like video game movie this is indeed right resident evil one the best survival game ever createdin sh control man named james sunderland who wife mary died three year ago yet recieves a mysterious letter telling come back to silent hill you arrive there up to you to explore the town and find sent the letter and the truth mary sunderland the graphic this game a kind of grainy but look like it done purpose to give the game horror feel even though effect like fog lighting and shadow done with flawless precision the music is excellent and the enemy are creative i also liked about this game is the replay value bc on top of the sunderland story you also play a a character in the game named maria in a subscenario there are also multiple ending depending on you go about thing and various difficulty level ive honestly never felt hooked to a game simply bc i wanted to know how it ended the story is incredibly gripping the best thing about this though is the detail put this huge town even the pointless of room are made with precision detail in most game like resident evil you dont really get to go outside and are pretty much trapped in one area in sh the town is the exploring and thing like carstraffic light store etc are all there it amazing how much work went into creating the towneven though i gave the game star bc it truly deserves it the game isnt perfect the factor i a problem with wa the control are nowhere near a crisp and responsive a in resident evil and were overall a little sloppy but tolerable the other factor is the voice acting although i heard a lot worse ie resident evil and it seems a though they try hard it come a little unbelievable and cheesy they almost make the character look stupid a third and im kind of stretching it is the weapon and fighting scenario basic weapon is a hand gun and most enemy except for the boss can defeated with this easy giving thing like the hunting rifle shotgun and huge blade real fun factor it also hard to run low on ammo and health kit giving the game grade on challengethese are minor hindrences and dont effect the game hugely all on a whole it still very fun and have you picking up the controller and again to fan of actionadventure game

gear and start job your ai multiplayer controlled teamgraphicssoundwhile the graphic arent anything particularly spectacular are par with the ps capability jobsheists take place urban environment the surroundings are pretty static city street and tall building the folk game a good job with choosing the music to go with the gameplay a semitechnodubstep soundtrack change in tempo to reflect occurs in the gameplay the swat start swarming in the bass dropsgameplaythere is plot to payday no core story that need to told the driving force of the game is heist to earn money experience point and gear to make the harder job a bit easier heist are player chosen via the ingame crimenet menu command gameplay are simple but adequate one button on the controller is designated your interact command is self explanitory use on ammomedical bag and whathaveyou using aiming at one of your partner let your partner know you to come to your location and doing the while aimed at a special enemy will highlight the enemy sillouette you and your party offline play is if you want it but of you stick to offline play will probably find bored rather quickly in offline mode your parter ai character effectively shoot and kill your enemy cop and gangster a well a revive you if youre downed in combat during a bleed mode but thats it in a game you are committing high stake job an a tactical fashion the ai is sadly not tacticle multiplayer eliminates that problem allowing you to team with player and really plan out a perfect heist the harder the heist get the more necessary a functional team is to the point of absolute if youre not playing online youre missing out on the core purpose of the gamereplay valuethere are unique heist to play of which take multiple day to complete day job while admit that doesnt offer a whole lot of variation a far a level go the method in which you complete the job are many for example a bank job on normal will you break a bank crack the vault handle some swat run and run with a bag of money quick and easy but if you raise the difficulty the stipulation for completion rise also bag required for your employer plus raiding the safety deposit box so you turn a sizeable profit plus maintaining hostage cooperation throughout if you run out of hostage full on military assault will be put into action to shut you guy that plus the fact that ive at this game pretty much since it came out put replay value score at highoverallfor a multiplayer oriented teambased game with a simple premise payday a damn good job at keeping entertained i mean what is there to lose when you make a game that is basically all of the best part of point break heat and the town rolled into one

first spoiler review feel in order give this game proper review ill need to talk i marking i will reveal spoiler youll be aware of to avoid reading if dont care to hear about that said none of them involve end game anything particularly late in the gameim going to be front this fragile dream a fun game really tedious and be frustrating and of the gameplay involves fetch quest like the title of the review state even with all of it problem this is a game that all wii owner at least play yes it flawed but it so unique you owe to to play ityou play setovoiced johnny yong bosch amazingly gripping and tragic portrayal of the main character a young boy who life with an old man call grampa in observatory the game start a the old man passed away leaving behind a letter to seto telling to head west in search of human some time the start of the game something happened and almost all human killed in said event he leaf he encounter ren the first living human girl he ever seen seto doesnt leave a good first impression ren and run away him the story of the game involves you traversing the haunted of the ruined world looking renas mentioned this game gameplay is horribly flawed thats not to say it broken or buggy a everything work fine from a programming standpoint the problem come from the horrifically uninspired gameplay mechanic attack are essentially whack what is in front of you you cant move attacking reducing your already limited mobility you also get a slingshot weaponaimed with the wiimote in the game but i havent found this to be particularly useful except bos fight of their larger hit box the biggest problem with the combat in this game are the very small airborne enemy who will fly of your attack range for far long there also the problem with weapon breaking while probably realistic and understandable is extremely frustrating by and large you will be wandering around the dark landscape with a flashlight controlled by the wiimote this also work well a i problem aiming turning and the camera worked fine a well that said the game isnt very hard a you pretty much trip health and save point you can also meet a merchant you access a save point emphasis on the world can he show up on random and it seems like he almost programmed to stop whenever you dont want him there and just want to save and to never show up when you actually need himas mentioned before most of the objective involve fetch quest savaging various key for various door this is made bearable a it just an excuse to traverse the dark creepy and strikingly beautiful landscape the art is cel shaded giving the world a unique and well detailed look that reminds of a very well animated anime show that said i find one portion of the game where the frame rate dipped dramatically this game is technically survival horror but it le about frightened you are because of disturbing brutal and nightmarish creature but about the depressing cold atmosphere and the frightening undertone of the game a mentioned almost every human ha died in some kind of catastrophe and is where the real moment of brilliance come play in the game there something of a side gameplay element where you collect mystery item that you can identify when you head to a save point sometimes theyre just item weapon or money but often time is an object that carry with a person memory when brought back to the save point it will activate a monologue by that person recounting their last moment alive it very haunting and tragic and really help set the tone for this gamespoilersas ive said i feel i need to spoil a couple of thing to show just how brilliant this game can be at time by and large you are alone through out the game but not always the moment when you are alone are extremely unbearable to play through not because of any problem or advantage someone with you is but because of how bleak and depressing this game is without them the combat isnt exciting at all and the bleak dead world is hard to swallow the first person you meet who accompanies you is a computer named pf who you find in a train station pf will talk to you give you hint and is generally nice to around through the game sadly battery are dying and she dy very early in the game leaving you a gripping cut scene where she tell seto how happy she to have met him and how she wished could have spent more time together before dying it extremely painful actually and the gameplay once feel very lonely and depressing the next person you meet is a boy named crow who clearly isnt human he steal your pendant and you spend the next part of the game chasing him through an amusement park trying to get it back normally this would annoy me in any other game but it wa just nice to have someone there again even if all he is taunting you putting you in danger and generally a jerk he eventually leaf after you two become friend a he ha journey he on and youre back to square one again the way they juxtaposed the segment where you are with someone with the segment were you are alone is nothing short of a work of genius it add so much to the tone of the game the feeling and the theme of fighting against isolationspoiler endthis game narrative is truly haunting memorable and deep it much deeper what you usually get with video game this is a game that made me think it effected me on an emotional level that most game not despite the fact that the gameplay leaf much to be desired which to be honest help with the overall mood of the game being alone on a ruined earth would be neither fun glamorous when combined it work so well that it something im never going to forget combine this with a great voice acting cast great visuals and a gripping narrative you have a very solid title while this game isnt a must love and it going to be very off putting to a lot of people it still a unique game that i believe all wii owner really should play through onceprosgreat voice workgripping narrativegreat haunting visualscons gameplay ranging from decent bland to unbearable clunky combat

didnt expect much going game i played first force unleashed the console game problem still fun time however force unleashed fails fix the problem the original and introduces host of new issuesi think main issue this game wa length even playing the game on hard with numerous restarts due to technical issue and to wait the annoying unskippable logo movie the game still wa a hour it felt much shorter the first game and wa even worth the discounted price the gameplay while still pretty fun at time got very repetitive simply i tended to use the tactic grip object stormtroopers lightning and throw on practically every enemy in the game the saber combat another weak area of the first game wa not improved at i found using the same attack over and over slash slash lightning the longer move easily blocked or interrupted and i had to force myself to use just the sake of varietyi also experienced a number of serious technical issue prerendered cutscenes frequently failing to play to crash loading to completely broken physic stormtroopers would float in midair like it wa in zerogravity in addition the game capped at frame per second making everything feel a bit choppy problem seriously detracted from would already a mediocre gameall in all ive found the force unleashed to wholly inferior to jedi knight and jedi academy it proof that all the fancy technology in the world like dmm euphoria and havok cant replace solid game mechanic and a strong story

that a child couldnt figure out you look online youll find a lot of fascinating information about how spore made a well a player video of gameplayspore ha integrated into the game the ability to upload your experience straight to youtubeunfortunately spore ha hampered by some bad business decision there a lot of truth to the story youre hearing about the copy protection making the game impossible to activate went through many hour of grief and many generic reinstall and write back email from tech support giving in dialing phone support and spending half an hour on hold it wa worth it because the person on the other end wa friendly smart and extremely helpful ea account wa perfectly valid there a problem with ea many subsystem they simply dont keep in sync ive noticed before with other ea title they to fix the account from their endthere is also truth to the fact that you are actually buying this game you are buying the right to install and use it on one machine a certain number of time provided you properly activate it using the aforementioned nightmare you are also agreeing that you can reinstall it a small number of time i think right ea say it is before it becomes useless which explains i didnt reinstall the game like i wa asked to you go the number of installs you have to convince ea to allow you to use the game againprovided they will still honor their agreement or have a way to activate it you or the original install is still compatible despite needing to be updated which is a bigger problem it may seem you also know that the software may decide should also know that the game will not allow you to update it unless you install the ea download manager the download manager will run on your computer in the background unless you disable it and it will reenable whenever you run spore i dont know what it given that of the time i have to manually instruct it to update my game but i do know that the update will be concealed from you and you have to use an interface to run the update either ingame or via the download manager depending on the titleoverall spore ha a lot of clever programming a great openness to it and an enjoyable interface that make the game fun for age unfortunately it is a throw of the dice a to whether or not getting it to work will be easy for you plan ahead and keep ea phone number handy it

havent played single player campaign yet current review the multiplayer aspect i usually prefer the cod multiplayer battlefield due more variety map more focus close quarter infantry combat i usually opt for cod im in the mood for twitch run and guntype shooter and when im sick getting gunned a tankchopper for the th time in bf the new bf gamesmaps also support this style to a degree battlefield look and sound more realistic well cod just seems like getting a little dated when compared the competitioni also appreciate the attempt to mix thing with the leveling system and the kill streak award but im a huge fan of the new system still seems tedious and the kill streak reward still seem a bit overpowered i got this game a someone that play shooter multiplayer casually so maybe im not the intended market but i figured id give this yearly release a try on the new gen system i probably skip next year installment unless change make it look more appealing

usual read review anything i reviewand a usual i amazed the variety of reaction the gamut of emotion involved among group of interviewer usually pretty wide covering everything bliss boredom to even outrage the lost crown is exception but the crown is fine performance mainly of the superb black white graphic splash of eerie color and intriguing plot and a lusciously creepy atmosphere many sensitive little touch a a dragonfly hovering dandelion seed blowing the wind there is constantly something to look at and observe cant sit there and click you to peer around the time or youll miss something vital and you miss a vital trigger you proceedi agree with others nigel is a bit clunky and slowmoving but i like in game i move along a ponderously a a i like to immerse in the plot imbibe the atmosphere and smell the rose slowly the lost crown is a long complicated game and not exactly scary is creepy enough to titillate and interesting enough to keep you hanging in therecrown is a class act but prepare to spend a lot of time in saxton among the reed and the dank cavern and the sullen ocean wave youll meet the often strange local character and eerie ghost commingled in a rich atmospheric stew highly recommended
