tale franchise one is sadly overlooked everyones played symphonia sure the others shame the game ive played pretty good but imagine game better the others is one of the weaker gamesgraphics minus the anime cutscenes this look like a game that could fit snugly snes cartridge it easier the eye than a polygonal mess doesnt look much different than tale of phantasia you know that the p is capable of graphic that are much prettier there excusemusicsound are quite a good track in this game the bassheavy battle theme the town music there isnt a bad track in this game the battle voice sound good a well and theyre thankfully in japanese all know bad english dub video game in the sstorycharacters a bad story the talking sword concept neat and the main protagonist stahn is likable the character join you are solid a well leon and rutee are welldeveloped and while the amnesia character is a bit cliche mary well done the other character are hit miss philia good garrs alright chelseas typical annoying yearoldgirl and bruiser while a good character to have on your party isnt developed all the story is pretty easy to follow but it nothing memorable also one thing didnt like wa that the main antagonist kept changing while it keep you guessing so doesnt give you a solid antagonist and the final one a bit underwhelmingalso wheres the spa scenegameplay for an early tale battle system it decent it d of course so it doesnt have that flow that later tale game have one thing i hate about the battle is that theyre too easy compared to other tale game i felt overpowered throughout the game and i didnt feel threatened the final bos another thing i dont like are the random battle while tale game today have the enemy on screen early one were random the game make you think at the beginning that the enemy will on the screen but it change to random problem is that there are too many it annoying to go a maze of a dungeon or a puzzle while getting pulled a battle every five secondsone interesting thing about the system are the swordians theyre the talking sword that four of the character obtain and are part of the story the sword are customizable through disc and can level making it interesting than buying a new weapon in every village you can also learn new move that are on tablet around the world depending on you and your swordians levelthe rest is your standard jrpg formula it all work well but there nothing too interesting one thing that could have potential wa the lens system enemy drop lens along gald and you can exchange your lens for gald but i always find not needing to use it because i usually have all the money i needanother pet peeve of mine is your way of travel you get a flying ship at the end so of the game you are traveling ship the dock will only take you to port town so there no exploring it also very annoying to accidentally choose the wrong town and it happens because you have to watch the ship go to the destonation on the world map it a bit tediousmost of the sidequests and minigames arent too interesting many sidequests involve the food system is something i kind of ignore in the tale series one sidequest that is good is a hidden dungeon that is based on the namco game the tower of druaga and it the hardest part of the game the minigames consist of thing a racing or tag so theyre nothing special but one of the better minigames is a quiz asked by phantasia character cless and arche which is pretty neat a few other sidequests help develop the character more but theyre nothing really spectacularoverall despite my nitpicking this is another good p jrpg to pick up especially you are a tale fan it doesnt have the mechanic of later tale game or the charm of phantasia but it a solid entry nonetheless the price of the game a bit steep and it not yet available on the psn but if you can find this game for a reasonable price add it to your collection

try to put the character texture at high in the setting for this game at least the first chapter because it amazing to see alyxs face can show sign of fatigued sad worried happy amazed and so much more general texture are amazing at high but take large chunk out of that framerate of if it is at high sadly i had to put it at medium which look like the xbox graphic not too appealing hdr stand for high dynamic range which is hard to explain but i will try to tell you how greatly it work in this game take a sunny day at home and have a window shade covering half your window avoid letting any light in the room so it is quite dark compared to the rest of your home now stare at an area in the room that barely ha any light on it also make sure no light from the window is touching this surface continue to stare at it for about second when you are done look at surface near the window that ha the light from the window shining on it the area should look enlightened to a large extent to the point where you can only see pure light you cant even see detail on the surface clearly in due time it will not seem to bright anymore and you will see detail on that surface again this is one of the feature you will expieriance with hdr fully enabled in the game not every level includes hdr just to know i wa happy to know that my computer ran this game with full hdr without large portion of different for and every computer and they are quite trust worthy i get a very good balance of graphic and framerate with these setting the only dissapointment for me in these recomendations is that they say i should completely turn off antialiasing there is a large amount more on the graphic to this game but i feel i should press ongameplay an area large amount of people look at really the creature and take more one shotgun blast to kill unlike normal zombie youll also be fighting creature more often this time considering the fact that the combine defense if failing so there are more finished game last night i honestly say one best game ive played the past year can tell the developer really put time making really special game here reviewstorylisten im much of a fan of storyline in videogames said that i recognize a game a great storyline drake fortune and a terrible one resident evil the story of darksiders is forgettable and confusing i found skipping cut scene this is easily the weakest part of the gamegameplaythis is darksiders shine the gameplay is really really fun people mentioned it is a combination of god of war and zelda but in way is it a copy of game definitely it unique game sureyou get plenty of weapon and magic and upgrade throughout the adventure the way take you hour to complete a the game progress the puzzle become much difficult and new thing added a the glaive and portal gun simply put this game ha a terrific balance of combat platforming and puzzle solving i found myself looking forward to playing it every day and making progressgraphicsthe graphic are great a little the cartoonie side but still sharp combo look and feel great and the level design is really unique a i mentioned earlier the developer really a great job creating this open worldenjoymenti enjoyed this game a lot you are into game like god of war and zelda this is a perfect fit for you my complaint is the puzzle become difficult the last rd of the game kind of ruining the great pace by having to stop and look walkthroughs to figure youre small complaintbottom linethis game is worth a purchase it is a game that i will not soon forget and really a great experience

recently got around taking pikmin franchise spin pleasantly surprised the first installment the series i want to eventually purchase a wii u and figured i needed to beat game well attempting pikmin impression generally a lot give and take in this game compared to the original pikminthe gameplay expanded significantly the addition of a second leader olimar command one group of pikmin partner louie lead another may slow first to get used to the level seem larger in this game and a gain access to the area in level by utilizing various different pikmin this aspect of the gameplay come in handyin addition to the original redblueyellow pikmin trifecta the first game this game introduces three new type of pikmin purple pikmin are stocky heavy and slow but the strength of regular pikmin white pikmin which are small very quick and have xray vision that can see buried treasure are also resistant to poison and poison enemy that successfully eat it finally there the addition of bulbmin bulborg pikmin which are unfortunately temporary they white and purple pikmin also have onion and can not reproduce by the usual harvesting mean you can only convert rby pikmin pw pikmin by mean of the candy pop budsthey also retooled yellow pikmin to have electrical property for the sake of conceptual symmetry to the elemental property of the red and blue the level have of elemental hazard that require you to divide pikmin by color to address the appropriate hazard bulbmin are unique in that they can go hazard they wont die in water fire poison etc finally the game also add the introduction of multilevel dungeonstyle cavesall these expansion to the gameplay make this game significantly more difficult the original one level of one of the more difficult cave forty bulborbs in it there many moment in which i cursed openly at the pikmin predator while all these addition from the first game sound great im coming to the game main shortcoming the storyok so olimar finally return home rebuilding his spaceship only to find that the company work for is bankrupt his coworker louie botched a delivery job which left the company deeply in debt the president decides to sell company asset to pay the debt but the only asset they have is olimars ship which get immediately repoed including the ship part made by olimars kid everyones about to call it quits they notice olimar brought home a souvenir from the pikmin planet for his kid a treasuredetecting ship immediately snatch it up paying olimar and co a modest sum thus the president decides to immediately send olimar and louie back to planet pikmin to retrieve more treasure and repay the debtso yeah they didnt even let olimar use the first toilet he seen in a month or perhaps refill his prescription for his cholesterol medication much le see his kid before sending back into harm way to bail out his bos i like this game but i feel like they couldve come up with a better premise for returning olimar to planet pikmin the first game had a time limit and a sense of urgency there is time limit in this game and even the day which lasted roughly min in the first one are now significantly longer time is even suspended while youre in a cave there well treasure in this game to collect so it can get rather repetitivepros and con aside this game new gameplay feature and harder challenge make this a great expansion the first title long time ago a galaxy far away bioware legendary creator dragon age star war knight of the old republic gave gamers first epic multipathed xbox rpg mass effect released much fanfare the heralded actionrpg hybrid allowed player to guide their customized main character commander shepard and recruitable multispecies crew a scifi journey of galactic proportion literally fast forward to presentday earth the mass waiting to affected the sequel a select of u missed the first portion of the story simply want ingame decision to carry to the successor decided to go back and try to save the original galaxy again the day of second impact fortunately while of the creak and crack of yesteryear have fissured eye sore since original release the old girl still largely got it countslets start with the probably the best reason to play through the original game again the highly shapeable story and the dialogue system on it rest although bioware fan recognize the company mo nearly every conversation and decision within mass effect allows the player to select response that lead to major and minor consequence depending on whether react to a situation with a coolheaded and diplomatic paragon response or a hotheaded and likely risky renegade option or anything in npc will come to either respect you or hate gut open to you or shut you out or ultimately be allowed to live or suffer a gruesome death although not every detail of commander shepard adventure will be changed via this system youll still fight the boss still be able to access the same shop and still have the same amount of selectable mission it major choice that the player forced to make that have become mass effect true legacy wont sugarcoat the situation some of the decision be quite difficult that reinforces the success that bioware ha in helping player establish meaningful connection to their ingame crew and support character their fate is quite literally in your controllergreased handsbut while youll delight in seeing the fruit of your dialoguebased decision chance are that the combat wont live up to your modernday expectation battle are carried out through a behind the shoulder thirdperson perspective with shepard leading two of his fellow squadmates with different trait and ability of course into a coverbased shooter army of robot mercenary and nogoodniks character ha assortment of different gun and special ability that allow an amusing combination of battle tactic your disposal you can suspend enemy in midair overload their weapon and disable their shield all before hit the ground unfortunately the cover system in which you try to stick a close to a wall a possible in hope of automatically latching onto it can only be described a serviceable at best especially with thirdperson shooter a gear of war setting a high bar over the past few year and while certain character class such a the soldier or vanguard will have little trouble disposing of the legion of seemingly crackshot enemy despite this flawed mechanic others will be doomed to restarting the same battle multiple time due to an overexposed limb add to this a fairly crude checkpoint system and you could find repeating the same minute battle over and over again complete with unskippable cutscenes and loss of saved player setting suffice to say your learning curve may varyits also surprising again given it release well mass effect graphic still hold up while it certainly doesnt represent the bleedingedge of texture and polygon that it once are still quite a few aweinspiring moment to be found within the galaxy especially the last few mission and although some may blame unsynchronized voice and mouth movement on a general lack of polish and they might be right i find more willing to stick the rather uninspired sidemissions and exploration quest into that unfortunate possibility bucket matter the task might be whether it to rescue a sibling purchase a certain good or procure information for someone everything revolves around either lengthy although admittedly welldone conversation or raid on generic building wiping out baddie for cash thats all but worthless with nearly every worthwhile weapon and piece of armor procured through chest along the main story arc there even le reason to explore the dozen of additional planet littered throughout the galaxy of empty wasteland that contain some sort of mineral or artifact good only for cash or obsessive collection reliefbut despite the janky unbalanced combat the slightly outdated visuals and the largely uninteresting sidequests mass effect still manages to win over the majority of player through it thoroughly engaging story and dialogue system it proofpositive that giving player a greater array of choice within their game will allow them to connect more strongly to it especially the consequence are interesting heartfelt and permanent it little wonder fan are excited for the sequel want to see how our action will continue to affect all of our story lack of polish be damned but while the new model is right around the corner dont hesitate to take the ol gal out for a ride if youre interested might not look a pretty anymore but she still run finereviewed by nicolo accordino

note purchase penumbrablack plague you know nd installment series of three episode you play plague without played overture youre like youll regret getting the entire collection the startthe collection is also offered amazon the time of writingyou see worried that i would not like this type of game a fps without the i didnt see defenseless wa going keep me interested long but that is the beauty of this game you cant run around blowing everything you to explore piece together clue adapt to the environment to survivesynopsispenumbra put you the shoe of a man on the search for answer answer the father you barely knew answer that you may not prepared to hear the search take you to father last known location a remote and secretive facility in greenland buried deep within the glacial ice doesnt take long for you to discover that something gone terribly wrong and unraveling the history of this place and part your father played in it is the mystery that drive this adventuregame playthe mechanic of penumbra simple you can walk run crouch and jump just in fps looking around the mouse reveal object that you can interact with you can add your sparse inventory others you pick up manipulate in some way item in your inventory can sometimes be combined to create new item and figuring how combine is often a central piece of the puzzle you must solve to proceed another interesting aspect of the game is how you use object that you cant add to your inventory rather clicking on say a door and having it swing open or closed you grab object and move them just like you would in real life that mean that you can slowly open door to peak out drawer valve and lever react according to your hand motion rather than being clicktoactivate and on many object can also be investigated that is you can get your character impression of what is looking at often this is than a way to set the atmosphere and provide a visceral element the stench from this sink is unbearable but it also serf a a way to provide hint for how to proceed this door look weak i wonder if i can find a way to force itthere arent any weapon in this game sorry mr freeman but there not even a trusty crowbar to fall back on but then really arent that many enemy either you encounter a monster your option is to run and hide or to barricade in room wander again you cant even look at the enemy directly without experiencing a simulated panic your vision will blur your heart will pound in your ear and your breathing turn to ragged gasp this game simply is not about combat about the experience the whole point is to immerse you in this twisted mystery to make you feel vicariously at least your character disempowerment and isolation at that it succeeds admirablystorythe story is engrossing enough although it tread mostly familiar territory suffice it to say that of the central element have appeared in film and novel in some form the execution is competent and well paced and the atmosphere and character are more than engaging enough to keep you interested i believe that that played the first installment will find the conclusion thoughtprovoking and somewhat of a twist but without being overthetop ridiculous i should also mention that the voice acting is superb and lends the character in the story a great deal of personalityany complaintswell it short but if you take the full series account youve got a complete game on it black plague is a day diversion even for a casual gamer replay value is practically zilch honestly you cant really be surprised the second time around can you the puzzle can really only be solved one way so there not much a second run can offer you on that front eitherif i have one truly legitimate complaint about penumbra it is the lack of depth in the environment im not talking about the graphic necessarily for indie game are quite good really but rather the lack of diversity in the object and texture it a bit disappointing that more attention wa not paid to fleshing out the generic room and hallway of the facility it also would have nice to have more area to explore that entirely optional and just added for depth and to reward the more curious player however this can be attributed to the small scale of the development team and is a small price to pay for a truly fantastic gameplay experiencebottom linelooking for a bioshock or halflife title is the only good zombie a dead zombie then penumbra is not for you if you want a somewhat different action game something that offer a genuine scare or two and some interesting puzzle to solve then get the whole collection a penumbra protagonist implores right from the start dont make the mistake i enjoy

single playerbattlefield bad company single player mode good enjoyed playing it add thing separate it pack wide open playing area and destructible enviroments unlike call duty linear gameplay approach enemy from different angle is nice the whole game feel le claustrophobic and scripted sometimes you choose whether you want snipe from afar go blasting away or you can storm the enemy a tank or armored vehicle blowing away stuff with tank and the helicopter is a blast to speak the destructible environment is great and i can see it the future of fps game because this blasting a thin wall with a grenade launcher and seeing it still standing seem silly nowthe control is good except aiming way sensitive and take awhile to get used to especially after being accustomed to the precision of cod i turned the sensitivity the way and still it never feel right i to turn it back for multiplayer because otherwise you turn too slow and youre a sitting duckthe graphic nice and the job however i never really had the wow factor you travel around with three squad mate with different abilites and yes do help you of course it up to you to get the job done the voice acting is great and so is the motion capture guy sounded and moved like real people add to the immersion of the game however the dialogue is silly these guy are always joking around and they funny line but it so unrealistic that it diminishes the game one of the reason people loved cod so much is the realism you grew attached to squadmates like captain price because they talked like real people would in the middle of a war that game took war seriously and the time you got to that amazing ending you felt genuine emotion in bad company i always felt like i playing a simple videogame the contrast humor and war didnt work for and wa emotional connection to the character character like the real people in cod and drake fortune the future it time to move from stereotypical videogame charactersso must compare and take everything consideration overall cod is a superior fps experiencemultiplayermultiplayer is a hell of a good time and by far the best part of this game there a lot to do you can drive tank and armored vehicle and also the helicopter there are two team mode gold rush and conquest mode require different strategy and approach i like conquest mode the best i like in this multi is the sense of teamwork that you feel the point system encourages good teamwork and i like healing guy or fixing a guy tank and hopping in and being gunner i wasnt to crazy some of the map in conquest mode they feel too small and there a lot of dying going onthere are i think different class with different gun and equipment time you learn what class work best in different situation if there are a lot of vehicle on the map i go with support class because you get a tool to fix tank and other vehicle and other map it usually just assault class with a good gun grenade and the healing ability being effective sniper in this game is easy due to the destructible environment you cant just sit by a little window in an attic forever eventually theyll blast you out this multiplayer is challenging and people new to fps multis will die continuously first but if you soldier on and not get discouraged youll begin to understand to be and you rack up point you increase in rank and can unlock equipment a far a lag i never have everything run very smoothly but that could vary by person overall i love this multiplayer and very addictedso the bottom line is bad company is a good single player and a great multiplayer and definitely worth playing

love still play return castle wolfenstein game play lot like predecessor weapon selection extensive new game buy upgrade the weapon you getmy complaint and the reason i deduct one star is the default video setting i tried to start the game and monitor started flashing range is indication the game set to a refresh rate higher my monitor is capable of checking the internet i found that this a common complaint people said that the game is typically set to hz and many monitor like mine only capable of hz since you cant access the ingame menu to adjust not able to see the menu your monitor you have to force the game to shut you have this problem you must adjust the setting manually in the configuration file find the file called wolfcfg on your hard drive it in a couple of hidden folder but you can access it via search you might have to try to run the game a couple of time this file is generated open it notepad and scroll down your find this lineseta r displayrefresh xxthe figure within the quote actually a number representing the refresh rate setting of the game mine wa actually to start wonder my hz monitor wouldnt display the game change that number to and save the file the game will play after that enjoy

dark mirror one many long line of syphon filter game carry the tradition of excellent thirdperson shooting action serving the foundation twisting plot of intrigue conspiracy a sensitive incident a refinery in alaska lead investigation agent gabe logan and covert team uncover is what they expected and thing dont add they dig deeper slowly adding piece to the puzzle of a deadly conspiracy in order to keep up the story important to find hidden evidence on level and read the file in inventory they provide essential detail to story progress without they arent necessary it sometimes difficult to figure the who and why of what is going on the twist and turn come fast and apart the occasional unaccounted for gap due to missing intel the story is solid deception abounds and dark mirror feel like a mystery past tactical espionageoriented syphon filter gamesthis time around the mission presented in smaller piece with simpler design sit and play one part of a mission in minute are checkpoint within bitesized area at critical location you never to backtrack far you die something result in mission failure the level are fairly straightforward and linear it doesnt feel constrained and there is room for tactical experimentation a well a secret to findmost of the time you moving sneaking shooting aiming and taking cover stealth always a staple of syphon filter and it is well represented in dark mirror thing quietly often ensures resistance along your path is lighter however stealth is not necessary in case and there is severe punishment for attempting it and caught you can get a rush of anticipation a you sneak around your quarry or you can get a rush of adrenalin when they spot you and assault you full force however you want to play it dark mirror will accommodate youwhen you do get trouble you can take cover along wall or behind obstacle is a new addition to syphon filter gameplay and it isnt a new gaming concept it ha been done properly not sticking your neck out needlessly can save your life but with dark mirror fairly easy difficulty you can usually opt to just stand in the open and fire if youre quick on the trigger this allows casual gamers to enjoy the action while allowing more tacticallyminded individual to be more deeply involved in the battlefieldenemies are unpredictable yet intelligent many time using cover a you would when they have you outnumbered they take advantage of the situation to put pressure on you and ferret you outthere is a nice assortment of weapon and device for gabe and company to use pistol shotgun assault rifle sniper rifle submachineguns experimental weaponry explosive grenade etc at one time you can carry one sidearm one submachinegun one rifle sniper or otherwise the experimental agency rifle you carry at time a melee weapon and an explosive the experimental rifle shoot dart of various type explosive poison gas or electric shock firearm have varying attribute and fire mode so are better under certain circumstance generally speaking though most any gun can get the job done for you so it almost never a matter of not the right tool for the job with all of these toy at your disposal it a ton of fun for anyone love gun again dark mirror make accessible to casual gamers and hardcore shooter fan alikeyou also have access to a set of hightech goggles that have three different mode night vision infrared and electromagneticarmor and medkits are place around the level and provide a quick refresh particularly intense areasthe graphic are neat and clean while the p can push out more dazzle than is presented in dark mirror this game succeeds in looking fantastic in it simplicity if youre used to the highend cg cutscenes of late you may be a little disappointed in the movie dark mirror provides but the ingame action still look goodthe sound is decent with some good voice acting and a lot of spoken line play cant help but feel there could be a little more oomph to the gun and some more environmental sound but again dark mirror succeeds in it simplicity the music is provided by several composer including the ubiquitous mark snow nothing terribly rousing here but it keep pace with the high and low of the actiondespite these easy to swallow portion and an emphasis on simplicity there is a lot on the table to enjoy and dark mirror offer hour of story playtime in addition there is a mission mode you can replay level and earn rating in tactical area a headshot stealth kill use of rifle dart survivability and knife skill for your performance you are awarded badge of merit and these patch unlock additional weapon ability such a increased health and new bonus level earning full rating for each level usually requires you to play through it a more time each time focusing on a different tactic due to the quickfire nature of the mission this is quick and fun but can eat up a lot of time in the long run making dark mirror very replayabledark mirror is quite enjoyable it doesnt shoot itself in the foot by catering to casual or hardcore action gamers instead it allows for and so admirablyon a final note dark mirror brought to the p after being made for the psp everything wa designed for quick portable gaming in mind this account for the short mission structure somewhat easy gameplay it much easier to move and aim with a p controller and allround simplicity a opposed to more complex game like socom or metal gear solid fortunately dark mirror is a shining example that satisfying gameplay and quality content dont necessarily imply complexity

rarely game immersed world extent nocturne found constantly playing to see would happen next in the game unlike game one start the world end find in postapocalyptic japan full demon you fuse and recruit demon to fight team your party member the battle system addicting and incredibly fun and put a serious emphasis on exploiting enemy weakness trust me on this one this game is kind and you try brute force technique it punish you hard it requires a high level of strategy and is ruthless is also incredibly rewarding you get it the setting of this game is very dark but thats part of the reason great it setting make it fresh and unique and totally different rpg another great thing this game is that your action and decision have serious consequence mindful of you choose to respond to action and question posed others in this game seriously affect what occurs later this game is totally fresh and unique and time very philosophical one warning though is that it is also very very difficult and can be downright cruel sometimes youll be really close to beating enemy and outta nowhere theyll just instantly kill you this is the kind of game that will make you throw your controller at your tv so be careful still this game is incredibly fun and if you stick around the whole ride you will be rewarded one of the most deep and enjoyable rpgs ever i highly recommend it but make sure you start playing it with an open mind

behind the scene there much going on is immediately obviousthere are also three interesting featured of gameplay define halo gameplayshields a rechargable shield that automatically recovers to save you you keep the damage you are essentially invincible the problem start shield hit and wont recharge you can get of open firetactical combat unlike quake is a twitch game the gameplay is a step faster than counterstrike action is a bit slower than most game but in that it becomes much more intense that extra moment when youre lining a shot trying to get that lastmoment kill make the experience so much moreno magic pocket you can carry two gun and your alwayspresent melee ability youll spend ton of time thinking about the battle that lie ahead and weapon to take ah the sniper the rocket what to classic fps gamers tend to complain until set down and see the real strategy in the choicesbut something set halo apart and the attention to detail fire your assault rifle and listen closely you can hear individual hammer click and the chambering of bullett on a big outdoor level stop for a moment and you can hear the wind whistling the terrain you can hear bird chirping in the distance watch an alien run to get in position and youll hear feetboots clacking and armor smacking they move and if youve ever played bungies previous series marathon youll quickly notice a million tiny connection the detail make it greatnot to mention the detail in the physic engine dont want to spoil much but are a lot of interesting trick that this engine is capable of for example putting explosive a vehicle flip it getting more get it airborne pile up two dozen grenade and you get something special

avid fan word general decided upon learning of existence purchase classic book nintendo dsfirst thing first of the book included in the software of copyright people invariably scoff the idea of paying actual money for particularly since legally for free place like certainly valid point feeling on the matter are thus i like to read i terribly fond of reading book on the computer had i an ereader a the kindle the nook might be little reason for to purchase a title such a this however decent ereaders are still relatively expensive there the cost of a cover or case to help protect the thing and possibly the optional protection plan etc without used one at length im not sure whether or not would be worth it to me to drop the coin required for such a purchasesince i already a d making a small purchase like classic book is a much easier pill to swallow in order to dip my toe in the water of ebook readingwhen the title start there is a pleasant and soothing tune playing a an owl fly across a row of book and settle on the nontouch screen to watch the owl also serf another feature the thought of choosing to read the book available is somewhat daunting you can ask the owl for a recommendation hell ask you a question what you want to read length genre reading level etc and make a suggestion based on answersyou can also get recommendation the online ranking you connect to the nintendo wfc you can update the ranking on the book and there will be sticker applied to various book are the highest rated in several category romantic most humorous most scary best overall book etc this is a neat little feature but wholly unnecessary particularly since most people wont want to keep going online to update the ranking and again whilst connected to nintendo wfc you also have the option to download ten additional book to the software immediately integrate the bookshelf there a little dl on the bottom of the spine of book so you can see which one are hardcoded in the software and which are dlcyou can recommend book youve finished reading them or after youve skipped ahead to the last page and finished the book if youre just eager to give a high rating to your favorite book you get to rate it from to and then pick an adjective that describes it the adjective correspond to the category a book can be stickered inthere are really two thing that are important in a title such a this and thats the quality of the book and the quality of the interfaceive typed up a list of the book at the bottom of this review and there is quite a large variety available across all genre which is a plus author ranging from louisa may alcott to oscar wilde and the book themselves going from league the sea to wuthering height there is literally something enjoyable for practically anyone even remotely like to readthe one big problem i had with the book is that there are sporadic typo to be found a an example there a passage in the jungle book which erroneously say hoy instead of boy on page if you are using the standard font size theyre not everywhere but i found a couple in the jungle book and elsewhere ive only read a few book in the game however they are offputting you find them and it put a bit of a taint on what is otherwise a very solid titleas for the interface it is so intuitive that practically anyone could figure it out within a matter of second however there also a tutorial that play the first time you start the game which you can skip if you so desire you hold the d sideways like a book clever and you can use either the button or the screen to turn the page the dpad or face button depending on whether youre a righty or lefty can be used to turn the page left or right and you can optionally set the shoulder button to change page a well on the screen tapping the left or right side of the touch screen will turn the page back or forward you can also slide the stylus across if you want a realistic pageturning motionyou can set up to three different bookmark per book this is nice if you have a particular passage that you want to refer to later or if you have multiple people reading one cartridge if you want to remove a bookmark just go to that page and take it out or you can simply place it somewhere else in the book and it will move automatically you dont have to go and pick it up you can set it somewhere else which is nicethe font size can be changed two setting and i found to be quite easy to read there also several background ambient noise choice you can use some of them are a little unpleasant actually both the music selection of classic and easy listening sounded a little harsh and synthesized for me to enjoy reading but i found some that very relaxing and actually enhanced the reading experience summer night is my favorite but moving train and park are both good tooits obvious that a lot of work went into making the interface a smooth and a intuitive a possible and it really show it extremely well thought out though it not perfect one glaring omission is the lack of a dictionary to look up unfamiliar word i understand that the kindle a builtin dictionary for just such a purpose with all the book from or prior it is not uncommon to run into many unfamiliar word particularly from the international author such a tolstoy kipling or hugo secondly there no search functionality unless youve bookmarked the page youre stuck hopping from page to page looking for whatever phrase or quote you wanted to find another feature that would have nice though it isnt strictly necessary is a texttospeech feature also included in the latest model of the kindle synthesized speech ha made many advance the past decade and although it not perfect it would be nice to be able to turn on a texttospeech function if i wanted to listen to a book whilst browsing amazon for exampleone of the interesting thing you might notice is a lack of an esrb rating for this title apparently due to the content being entirely literaturebased this title not require any age classification granted it doesnt affect the software in any way but it might be a bit of a collector oddity for this reasonso a i mentioned at the top of the review i basically purchased this a an experiment to see whether i would get any use out of an ereader before i whip out the wallet and buy one so the experiment go well i just placed my order for a kindleand im sure exactly expecting i loaded rumble rose xx first i remember i wasnt expecting impressed much for prejudgmentrumble rose xx turned to be pretty sweet gamefirst i to say i rarely ever play wrestling game the last one i played wa the dreamcast i thought sucked the game not the system so common criterion game judged by i unaware i comment on what i liked and disliked the titlethat said i must say there wasnt much about the title i didnt likerumble rose xx is a wrestling game of the standard character play are female there are a variety of play mode to enjoy and entertain you and friend withthe graphic are gorgeous and im not talking about lovely polygon model you wrestle with though are err composed well the stage you play on are richly detailed and beautiful the soundtrack never seems to be inappropriate every song tune seems to match the moment it is played the character model are well designed and well animated model motion are smooth fluid and natural looking with the odd exception of the execution of a of the holding move im pretty sure most normal people cant bend like character model can bendgraphics sound and pretty polygon are all done very well but all those point would amount to nil without good game play to enjoy them with fortunately rumble rose xx very solid but simple game play nearly all move are executed by hitting a single direction and a button special move are executed by positioning correctly and hitting a simple combination of button usually two the most annoying control issue is the mashing of button to escape hold or pin but that seems to be a universal design flaw among almost all wrestling game ive read aboutyou can participate a variety of different match type a computer opponent you have the traditional one on one match the tag team match battle royal free for all match handicapped match two on one and humiliation match with the exception of the humiliation match in all of these you win by pinning your opponent to the mat or them submit to a holdrumble rose xx ha in addition to the wrestling mode a street fighting mode is a sort of simplified street fighter type fighting mode your wrestling move are limited and you have a life bar you win a round by simply pummeling your opponent life bar is empty and you win a fight by winning two out of three round it make for a nice change of pace the normal wrestling matchescomplementing the primary wrestling focus of this title there is a collecting aspect that feature many thing may be unlocked character ha many outfit you can acquire these outfit run the range from very revealing thong bikini and suggestive short to combat gear and school girl outfit there is a photo shoot mode you can take picture of the character wearing the outfit you have unlocked they participate in special activity you have also unlocked like riding a bike swimming or stretchingalso in addition to unlocking additional outfit each character ha a counterpart that can be unlocked the game ha a face versus heel arrangement good guy versus bad guy each face character ha a heel version you can unlock and the go for the heel character each character version ha unique outfit and intro moviein addition to playing against the computer there is exhibition mode where you can play against up to three friend and use the outfit you have unlocked all of the wrestling match type along with the street fighting mode are available ive found this to be a very enjoyable element of the gamerumble rose xx let you online to play against others and even let you share photo you have takenthere are only three thing about this game that annoy all fairly minorthe first thing that i found annoying is that it is a great pain to change a character costume in the exhibition mode you can only change the color of the outfit your wrestler is wearing or pick her super star outfit if it is available to change the outfit to something different you have to exit out of the exhibition mode load up your single player character change her costume there go back to the exhibition mode very annoying of you have four people keep wanting to change outfitsthe second most annoying thing i found about rumble rose xx is that it is unclear what you are supposed to do in the single player mode and you progress in the game if it is explained in the manual i overlooked it i just kept playing match until i a titlethe last thing that annoyed me about this game and this is really the most minor is that there wa no kind of training mode i guess ive played many fighting game where this feature is provided and ive come to expect itover all i have to say i enjoyed this game greatly entertaining to play by yourself and is a great title to bring out when your friend come overunexpectedly rumble rose xx turned out to be a really sweet smelling rose without any thorn

give donkey kong land rating of ive decided update review four year later my original review extremely negative not only wrong also a bit disrespectful well i apologize thatyes i wa hating donkey kong land pretty hard and heavy my original review and i even reached a boiling point i said id never touch game againmy reason for immature episode of anger wa simply because i preferred the donkey kong country series and donkey kong land felt like a cheap imitation comparison however playing dkl i realize the error of my way i wa completely wrong to dismiss game originallyfirst of the level in donkey kong land not a direct ripoff of the one in dkcsure the temple water and factory theme make appearance but not fair for to say are direct ripoffs of the level in donkey kong country the level actually designed completely differentlyby different i mean the level are not trying to like the one in the dkc series all instead the game maker took advantage of the popular theme in donkey kong country and used theme to create something else entirely completely different objective and whatnotin word the gameplay involving collecting banana stomping on enemy head and everything else exactly the same a in the donkey kong country series the level are not the same a the one in the dkc seriesim actually really surprised that the water stage for example are significantly fun they are in the dkc series theyre also much harder actually the water stage feel twice a long in comparison to the one in dkc is rather odd considering the dkc series appeared on the super ne the console where idea were normally utilized to full potential seems like the water stage were more thought out in this gamethe stage where a squid is chasing through a deep underwater maze is definitely really creepy because never stop chasing you but more importantly water stage are really exciting and challenging im really surprised significantly more fun and challenging the water and temple stage are in comparison to the one in the dkc serieson the flipside however the jungle stage are definitely worse than the one in dkc this is because theyre usually quite short and not much attention to stage design wa given compared to other stage in the gamethe bos fight are really simple because the strategy required to defeat is usually something extremely basic and easy to figure out but thats a minor flaw that doesnt mean the final bos fight is a cakewalk though he really test ability to move quickly during final phasemany of the enemy the dkc series return in addition to plenty of new one bee rat snake and crocodile are back other type of enemy a floating crab spiky fish flying pig tornado hey they mine a well be enemy and snake on rope yes thats right are new and exciting addition rambi and expresso are back but winky and enguarde are not perhaps that explains the water stage are longerone big flaw however is probably due to a game boy limitation remember in donkey kong country whenever you run and jump you actually go pretty farwell in donkey kong land whenever you run and jump for reason donkey kong and diddys animation slows drastically you almost hang in mid air which mean you never actually leap in the air far which mean you basically to stand right next to the edge of a cliff in order to make it across to the next platform it seems youre holding a barrel you jump a bit though weird either way a while youll learn to adjust to it fine so it wont present much of a problemoh and donkey kong doesnt slap the ground anymore thats slightly disappointing because i used to like slapping banana out of the dirtthe reason the game is challenging is because enemy are placed in spot that sneak on you pretty quickly in other word enemy probably be walking where you least expect also the game is stingy with up balloon for some reason there a distinct lack of banana compared to dkc which mean getting of them for extra life definitely doesnt happen a frequently compared to dkcsome of the level are really strange the mine cart level are gone and in their place are level involving these platform that you ride these are quite possibly the hardest stage in the game especially this one you will encounter later on where you have to jump in the air in order to make the platform move in the direction you desire youll see i mean here when you play the gamethe graphic are really good seriously considering this is a game boy game the only flaw is actually one that make me feel like im nagging when i mention it the graphic are in black and white thats basically the only difference compared to the donkey kong country version oh and the music is actually a lot more melodic and creative too i love just every single theme song game boy game have boring music not this onein the end the number one reason this game is so good is because and every level is positively loaded with fun thing to one moment youre collecting banana and coin the next youre either jumping through barrel riding up and down rope swinging around jumping up and down on tire riding platform to faraway place tossing barrel defeating all kind of beautifully animated enemy the fun seriously never end this game rulesoverall a pretty solid game that i definitely didnt appreciate when it wa first released nowadays i play donkey kong land and say it just really fun and not a ripoff of donkey kong country

newest version rocksmith see improvement advance game play the prior version making joy play and stick got the original rocksmith and pleasantly surprised much it wa able to teach however the menu and progressing the lesson wa a little unintuitive it wa tough to get playing a song back to the lesson the newest version a much intuitive menu it easy to just pick and play some song going the lesson track to sit down and learn a song or specific part of a song to master a techniquethe guitarcade is a collection of minigames to help practice technique it is themed around style arcade doesnt really fit with the rest of the style of the game thats okay still fun you problem with lag long a you use the audio through the rca cable and the hdmi or optical outone aspect of version is good and bad is the inclusion of the lead or rhythm guitar learning track or you choose bass track with the last version you would learn aspect of the lead guitar along with aspect of the rhythm guitar i like that it provides an option to focus you best or want to focus your learning on on the hand i liked part of the song intermixed in one track im mainly on the rhythm guitar learning track but i really miss able to play certain lead riffsthere is enough variety of style and genre in this to keep you interested even if every song is not your cup of tea you find enough song to learn to make it worth it no matter your musical taste a great game and a big improvement over the last version

nintendo announced bringing new super mario brother game d the majority gamers rejoiced critic ranted raved marios upcoming game would the true return to platforming that long overdue nintendo unveiled super princess peach well and looked a though peach wouldnt get sort of praise wouldbe platforming goodness well im for peach super princess peach actually and youre hearing correctly a good d game gameplay problem to speak of you put chickenboobsandbeer manliness and adapt to the pink fuzzy cute peach charm you learn to love the gameplay concept found withinpeach play almost the a a typical mario game but peach lighter weight make her a little le likely to cause harm jumping the head of incoming attacker instead peach us a trusty umbrella to attack everything her way a well a four different vibe power that activated by touching large button on the bottom of the screen throughout the typical platforming level feature ton of enemy simple but clever puzzle and elusive collectible item peach can find coin that can be spent in toad store for even abilitiesthe vibe power that peach ha are interesting aspect in theyre used for attacking travel and puzzle something that definitely go the surface of the travel left to right gameplay that mario and sonic game often supported one of peach vibe is the joy vibe which sends peach happily floating in the sky this vibe let her float fly and conjure a cyclone to blow thing away another vibe is the anger vibe which set peach on fire when activated peach fiery body incinerates enemy stomp along the stomping even allows peach to hurt bigger enemy like the wiggler bos and stomp on switch the third vibe the sad vibe sends peach wailing her tear used to douse flame water plant while cry peach travel quickly allowing player to run and jump around higher speed the last of the four vibe is calmness which restores her health at the sake of losing extra vibe juice the fuel that power her ability to use emotionsdespite the amount of move and ability player can gain in peach one shouldnt assume that a difficult game every level is rather easy even in the later part of the game finding the toad that are lost in level one of the several elusive collector item mentioned earlier is just a matter of searching each room you come across a very obvious large pink and bouncy box some of the bos fight required effort though wiggler particularly annoying and it took four life to put the angry worm down sadly this is the place peach break a nail the gameplay is fun but the game isnt very long at i would estimate that the average player could beat this game in a few quiet sitting all of the unlockable item are added bonus to gamers that want to get everything in the game but going back every easy level to find hidden item isnt necessarily the enjoyable thing to dosadly peach also isnt the most technically advanced game the graphic want to scream oldschool but the d is capable of recreating a nintendo classic like super mario with improved visuals certainly nintendo could a little more make a fresh peach sprite and new sprite for enemy like goombas and koopatroopas peach is like that moderatelyattractive girl that is appealing once you get to know her but doesnt look like anything special at first glancesuper princess peach isnt just a game for your little sister or your daughter or your girlfriend it an entertaining platforming game in it right it may take a few hour to complete but it go to show that the plumber in red isnt the only nintendo star can steal some limelight id highly recommend this game to d owner especially those of you who enjoyed super mario kirbys canvas curse or yoshis touch go on the handheld until mario steal the show with the new super mario brother later this spring peach is your best handheld platforming outlet

overall like product the money nice way add additional port memory card slot i miss owning original p fatthe fit and finish opinion is fine snap right in fairly tight it took second to install and seemed to work flawlessly for the last monthso star i went to plug in my p singstar usb microphone branded and sold specifically for p not some cheapo aftermarket thing and the singstar program continually kept recognizing and dropping the microphone i finally unplugged my new medium expansion bar and just used the original p usb port and the microphone worked perfectly bottom line accessory may not work product which is a major flawstill overall for the money it is decent just play normal game singing and need the memory card slot for slideshows etc then this product fine for you and it detaches fairly easily so if you to temporarily disconnect it it isnt a big dealoverall recommended just go in knowing it isnt a perfect product

get item amazon i did pick day it released local game store i wa initially worried this would watered version the console title thankfully i wasnt completely correctgraphically the game pull the nice vibrantly colored world well race themed around a particular game really awesome thing going on the background it is a step down from the console version but not noticeable on the vitas smaller screen the character at least the human one could rendered a bit better but since pretty much see the back of head while racing it not a big dealperformance wise the game ha a minor hiccup mostly in the way of frame rate drop thing get cluttered and busy it not game breaking but it is annoying when it happens performance issue knocked it down a half stargameplay is amazing of course it a racer but it got a nice sense of speed and power sliding quickly becomes second nature the game is a breeze when going cclass race bump it up bclass a good and fair challenge and aclass you want to be frustrated seriously on aclass the computer you ive been playing kart racer since the original super mario kart on the snes but i have to replay aclass race multiple time and on some challenge stuck on for almost a day aclass reminds of demon soul but for cartoon kart racer maybe not for littlest one depending on their tolerance for defeatwhen i said i wa worried a watered down port i didnt mean graphic i expected a downgrade this is a portable machine and not a home console still game like uncharted golden abyss and wipeout proved that you have killer graphic on the little system i wa worried that the console track would be redone to accommodate the handhelds in word a d port like the lego game thats not a knock the d it that the power of the vita there is need to cut corner like the lego game have done in the past redone levelsomitted feature cut scene that dont make sense within the new level lego batman and lego harry potter im looking at you thankfully that is not the case the track all have exactly what the console have just not prettyand the race track are the real star of the game the whole hook of the game is that you can go from kart to boat to jet at point thus the stage change in order to allow you to so race along a track and suddenly the road collapse you you fall but your car morphs a boat and you zip along the water the bridge across a chasm youre about to cross get destroyed a dragon and instead of falling to your doom you morph into a jet and take off after said dragon all this happens from lap to lap so certain stage are never the layout for one lap and thats amazingthe only other thing i can bring up against this game is that controlling the boat seems mushy a it that youre on top of water but i feel that in arcade racer the realism should be kept to a minimum especially when the hedgehog thats all about speed drive a car that go slower than purportedly run and there are a lot of boat section so in my opinion another half star taken offonline the game is great of course i mute all the other player voice i really dont feel like hearing people swear up a storm while playing and thats not a knock against the game but rather the people cant control their mouth ive never played in a full lobby the people i played against but i wa able to find game easily and quickly and best of all the game run just fine online no lag for meoverall this is a great game if you dont have the console version already get this game and if you love the console version so much that you want to take it with you wherever you go get this

good firstperson shooter there shooter contain story captivates player enough blast a dozen level shooting dodging grenadelobbing those level generally multiple objective that are varied bombing a structure to rushing a certain location and killing everything from point a to point b staying alive those shooter are generally accompanied attractive graphic and pulsepounding music the xbox version of quake doesnt have many of those quality a terrible game it one of the least impressive shooter ive played yearin quake brainless campaign youll strap the armor of the space marine matthew kane a member of the rhino squad that attacking the evil strogg on home planet the biomechanical beast are foul dirty and ruthlessand a small twist near the middle of the game show and corporal kane dirty the strogg thought that nice raven to throw a truly unexpected story twist but i never really found the rest of the game to be interesting least the second half of the campaign is fast frantic and intense it preferable to the first half overall the game is hour long clocking in at or near the shooter averageits the gameplay that let and shaking head quake play like a good first person shooterfrom the fragging is so ridiculously generic from the start of the game the very end will say it just quake traditional gameplay i say it boring youll pick progressively stronger and better gun but at the time enemy get a little faster a little bigger a little deadly there a balance established strong weapon and strong enemy however of the action consists of running forward throughout similar room finding the strogg and shooting until fall and their corps disappear they dont move around much at they often dont even try to evade your fire and they dont try to outsmart you in the slightest bit usually theyll stand in place move towards you and shoot you without taking much cover or attempting to get around you for an easier kill a of the enemy have different tactic but tactic are usually just slight variation from the standandshoot or runandslash strategy it disappointing game like call of duty have impressive intelligencethe gun you get can be pretty cool but i discovered that almost anything can be killed quickly and effortlessly with a few wellplaced shotgun blast or an entire clip of machine gun ammo even near the end of the game the enemy dont take much cover is an example set for the playerrunning around and mindlessly shooting doesnt have many repercussion it isnt necessary to hide very often because of this even inexperienced gamers can plow through this game action you have to play through this game play it on a hard difficulty setting unless you simply want to cruise right on through it the thing that break up the action even the slightest bit are a few vehicular distraction which are admittedly a lot of fun one of them put you on the back of an onrails truck shooting the strogg with your weapon the next throw you the cockpit of a hovering tank you can quickly fire off missile and pound the opposition with machine gun fire the most exciting and last vehicle is the walker which can use lockon missile and machine gun fire to rapidly take down enemy these distraction are a lot of fun and it a shame that the rest of the game is so genericmultiplayer on and offline isnt more interesting the singleplayer have a robust fastpaced frantic set of game turn out to be pretty dull and generally unexciting eight people can join up in a single game and of course you can frag in deathmatches but there isnt anything that impressed me in the slightest bit all these year ive heard about how much fun quake can be in term of multiplayer and im let down gameplay that simply isnt interesting not to mention xbox live is very inconsistent and the alreadylow frame rate which ill mention momentarily make quake more frustrating to play than it ever should have beenvisually it is very difficult to classify quake there certain part the game that i wa admittedly impressed with raven choice for art and style there is a lot of detail throughout the environment from bloodsplattered wall to gear and mechanism scattered around the various room even the nicelylit interior location which compose most of the game are interesting corridor shooting isnt nearly repetitive when the bulk of the graphical factor isnt stale and boring on the other hand player model are very generic and almost every marine look like partner one marine might have different hair and another might have a different skin color the model also look so jagged without a highresolution screen that it appears they have spike or fur quoting a friend quake cactus graphic the effect are extremely dull whether it the nintendo calibur muzzle flash or the fire and smoke effect that would look at home in a generic playstation game the music isnt very good either where perfect dark zero set a mood with it tune quake nothing to pump the player up for any battle or confrontation it not epic it not exciting and it fails to impress me at all the voice acting is alright but the dialogue is so cliched and generic that it cancel out any sort of impressing aural qualityoverall quake is a big disappointment what wa supposed to be a visually stunning fastpaced pulsepounding shooter end up one of the most dull launch title on the xbox the story is interesting enough to pull you through hour of generic and brainless action and the vehicular distraction are a quick and effortless blast but thats about the furthest quake go if youre a quake fan i wouldnt question you if you rented the game but id have to frown down on anyone decides to buy this game there isnt enough here in term of depth or new modern shooter attraction pick up perfect dark zero or call of duty instead believe me you wont regret it

specifically for the wii theyve made a quality title dewy is a droplet of water control tilting wiimote around you actually tilt the level to move him similar to monkeyball isnt monkeyball the game is adventure along the line of mario youll freeing friendly creature fighting the baddie solving puzzle and a blast dewy ha a bunch of cool power to use causing an earthquake creating gust of wind and changing the temperature of the world changing the temperature turn dewy from water ice into a cloud giving him unique power ice dewy smash bad guy more easily cloud dewy can float and shoot lightning the level also change with the temperature flower sprout you make the temperature high or everything will frost when you make go this add a beautiful variation of detail to world and make the game cooler it also help you solve puzzle for instance you make the temperature go up youll melt a block of ice to access a new area the puzzle and game get harder a you progress but never frustratingthe control responsive and well implemented youll be using the wiimote a variety of way importantly you tilt the controller to tilt the level and move dewy around first a bit sloppy so dewy would fall a ledge here and but playing and getting used to the control im moving dewy around very precisely there also a controller sensitivity adjusment in the menu youll be wagging the wiimote left right to cause earthquake or up down to create gust of wind boss you also have to shake the wiimote around at certain part and it always fun the game ha a beautiful art style and the graphic are a stepup from most wii game the sound effect and music are also very good and definitely fit well with the game there a lot of replay vaule too the mutliplayer the level creator and finishing each stage with youll be playing for a the main story is fairly long start off easy but get more challenging there also a lot of variation between the world character and boss dewys adventure wa designed specifically for the wii it very unique ha beautiful graphic excellent sound lot of fun to play for people of age and great replay value overall it a stylish highquality title for the wii and it well worth picking up

someone loved old infinity engine crpgs baldurs gate icewind dale planescape torment quite liked the original neverwinter night despite issue pretty high hope game fact i got pretty much the day it released probably tell the date this review that it rather failed arrest attention nwn game that by right great unfortunately it suffers serious unavoidable basic flaw that totally cripple the fun factoras one can expect the game engine and graphic new and improved you can certainly tell by much longer it take to load area and how big a drag on system resource this game becomes even current system the time of this writing lag at some point in the game and machine is borderline you can expect major issue even if you have everything turned to minimum in fact nwn is taxing on your pc a lot of game that look a whole lot better and on that note it actually look a whole lot better than the old nwn character model are especially bad and you say thats a game engine limitation check the witcher sometime it us the one i dont know how obsidian could have neglected character appearance it probably the critical visual factor in a game like this sound and effect are fortunately a lot better and this make it somewhat tolerable in the multimedia departmentthe gameplay is sort of a mishmash baldurs gate and nwn you have more control companion and can some thing like determine how they level control directly in combat if you wish unfortunately you probably have to take direct control the ai is absolutely atrocious you thought the pathfinding in baldurs gate wa bad it look positively brilliant compared to this nwn is a new low character getting stuck behind or on empty terrain for reason running right a room filled trap not attacking enemy directly in front of them spellcasters choosing to melee instead of casting healer not healing party member that are on the verge of death the list go on and on fortunately there some free downloadable hack that go quite a way towards fixing the ai and if you want to progress the game at anything approaching a reasonable pace are absolutely mandatory on additional note you cant multiclass of your companion in the campaign all you can do is assign point and feat is a shame your main character can pick up to total class though the level cap of limit you somewhat limited in term of viabilitythe nwn campaign an overhead map that may bring back memory of baldurs gate however the campaign more or le shoehorn you into going into certain place in a certain order and isnt a whole lot le linear than the old nwn there some halfhearted attempt at side quest including some companion quest and a phase you get to manage your castle but it nothing like baldurs gate extensive character development and exploration if youve played bg youll end up sorely disappointed for a it look like nwn is headed in the same direction and it all just sort of stop or get dumbed down to boredom it an improvement over nwn in this regard but it ha a long long way to go to get to the level of even the original baldurs gate a far a the campaign story go it pretty runofthemill no real surprise not particularly imaginative in short a whole lot like the lackluster original nwn campaign ive yet to try out the expansion for this game and itll probably some time before i do on account of how little i enjoyed this campaign even on a loot note there not a whole lot to be had i started noticing a lot of duplicate item halfway through and checking the total list with the toolset i wa appalled by how item are in the game not to mention how dumb most look most of them arent even provided with any interesting background just generic statstheres a few additional and new feature that have potential the game us the dd rule and is somewhat more streamlined than the original it still take a bit of slot juggling to figure out stack with what but a lot of the weirder thing have been simplified or removed there are new race including some that are more powerful than the standard one and thus incur a level penalty not a good thing considering there level there a new base class in the campaign the warlock and a decent collection of prestige class unfortunately due to the cap and the fact that you cant multiclass your companion you probably wont get to experience most of the latter unless you either cheat or keep replaying the campaign which a noted is not exactly great fun there also some new item creation feat and skill though in practice i found them to be difficult to keep track of and not a whole lot of use anyway there also attempt at replay value in the campaign using the new influence system but most of these come very late in the game and dont have a very serious impact on what actually happens anyway there also not a whole lot of motivation for what few optional quest there are since most are quite boring and a with the original nwn youll hit the cap before you finish either wayas for character customization you can alter appearance name skill feat and class in general you really want to stick with one type of class eg if you choose to be a spellcaster you should stick with that and related prestige class trying to get your character to do everything make you pretty weak all around since this isnt an epic campaign then if you dont really care about a powerful main character do whatever the game isnt particularly hard and your companion can probably take up the slack a with nwn you can use skill in some dialogue choice and world action though aside from bluffintimidate these are pretty darn rare in particular skill like listen survival and intimidate are rarely used they might a well have just taken them out some reviewer have said that the game favor melee class but this is definitely not true you get out of the noob stage in fact i would say spellcasters are favored in the latter two third of the game on account of how many huge pack of weak monster you encounter nothing like aoe to clean that up right quick you can rest almost anywhere and it only take a few second which make memorized spell limit a nonissue unless you get into a really drawnout fight not common that aside seeing spell go is one of the only real highlight of the game combat system weapon based attack are so boring you dont even watch after a whilei do believe nwn ha potential and the expansion may manifest that so could player made content since the toolset allows you to change practically anything however the outofbox nwn campaign is barely an improvement over the nwn original campaign that one fortunately got better with expansion but the original wa a bore and really didnt hold my attention it look rushed unfinished in graphic and quest design and ha ton of new angle that could have been really cool if they actually done right the simple sad fact is that there a lot of better rpgs out there and have been since nwn release which is it took so long to get through this game in that light i really cant recommend this title
