plenty review telling awesome game part are true id like drop note thing the game annoyed playing since review seem to that lousy ai frankly the ai of teammate leave lot to desired you seemingly change the action they can cant take in battle and only you control the people character top of that the lack of option the game give you setting action to take are frustratingly low invariably it came to two choice for me either tell to take action or watch them waste all mana needlessly in the most awful situation ie using special move when enemy is about to die to the next melee swing etcyoud imagine that setting a character to keep u healthy would mean they would conserve mana to heal ala they use most of it to attack and when you need heals you end most if not all of it low capture rate im sure youve read or heard this game a pokemon aspect to it the game ha different monster for you to capture and for and every one of them the only way to capture them is esther on roughly a chance the monster be captureable this is a stark contrast to pokemon you can throw a pokeball at anything you want at any time be prepared to spend hour sometimes trying to capture something specific with alternative except to pray that one of fight youll finally be able to capture it melee attack can be blocked not in a traditional sense in with a shieldthat would be fine but any melee familiar you use will invariably run clipping issue trying to reach the mob supposed to attack meanwhile it swing away at the air in front of it missing everything it can reach the mob one would think clippingpathing issue would be resolved the game released but apparently this ignored aoe attack interrupt everything in battle for the uninitiated aoe is area of effect meaning attack that hit everything on the screen whenever your character and their familiar any attack or even heals that hit everything at a earsplitter you are treated to a minicutscene of it happening what this doe unfortunately is it wipe any move that wa cast but animation not finish for example if you trying to charm a mob and esther harpplaying animation did not finish yet and an aoe spell went it effectively cancel your charm attempt and you to do it all over for charm there is no cooldown but for spell such a swaines trick shot there areand yes getting your move cancelled this way put in on cooldown this is highly annoying over the course of the game a a lot can happen in a few second every battle and your move put on cooldown arbitrarily is horrible lackluster ending not necessarily a flaw but man wa it disappointing if youre playing this game with the hope that at the end of it youll be treated to some studio ghiblianimated ending with some insight on what the character are up to since you beat the game youll be sorely disappointed there is a semblance of that but it is short and abbreviated that it left a lot to be desired dont know with all the effort they put into the game that it would be so hard to give u a like a two minute animated ending or sowasnt this part of why studio ghibli wa on board in the first placenow none of these thing really detract the game overall but they are annoyance you will have to deal with when playing this game overall this game is still every bit a charming refreshing and fun a all the other review say they are are two positive i absolutely loved about the game the best part about this game is it brings back the world map and exploration to rpgs something that many new rpgs take for granted these day many are so linear they feel like youre playing candyland proceeding from point a to point b along a single path without a choice this game ha an actual world map ton of hidden area and treasure many sidequests and distraction and it is something that feel so refreshing since it is so rare these day to find a rpg with these element still intact the attention to detail here is stunning is why i dont understand how the flaw ive listed could happen when you visit the winter isle your character actually start shivering in the snow your character are eventually given snow clothes and snow clothes appear when you fight in snowy areaseven your profile picture next to your hpmp bar are updated with the new graphic it is easy to skimp on thing like this in a game and no one would probably notice it but i for one found this to be yet another refreshing and beautiful aspect of the game and that is what make a good game greati sincerely hope that studio ghibli doe another rpg in the future hopefully with these issue fixed this game ha restored faith that the classic jrpgs of the past are not dead and when done correctly can still be a masterpiece of a game newer style rpgs have it place and are fun but to play this game in this day and age reminds me of why i bought my p and why i fell in love with video game in the first place

drum work well although price level unreasonable expect perfection couple thing could betterfirst good point the whole thing very sturdy especially the foot pedal is heavy solid havent noticed missed note also the pad are tightened properly dont move the angle of pad is adjustable form of tightening they remained firm play they stayed place even game session lasting hour the dpad and controller button the transmitter a nice useful touch i a lot of fun playing thesethere are a thing that could have been better the important is the set very limited adjustability it not wide enough to move the pad much at cant slide a centimeter apart each there a little more play in the cymbal but still not a lot and you forget trying to mount them outside the pad you can see i mean looking at the photo also the leg height is adjustable doesnt go very high i exactly foot tall and at maximum height the pad were high enough to comfortable youre much taller than that you might want to try you buy what it worth i dont know whether the other available drum kit can be raised any higher than this onethe other negative dont really affect play first folding and unfolding the set is not a job measured in second itll take a few minute and to really make it flat youll need to remove the cymbal entirely not a huge issue but the manufacturer claim is misleading on a related note the rotating leg have no lock they just swing freely i didnt experience any shifting during play but if someone were to bump the side of the set it could very easily fall over just something to be careful of especially if you have small child running around another annoyance is the usb dongle for this kind of money no bluetooth ive heard that the bluetooth system is simply not capable of the exact timing required for music game but i cant say for sure if true thats certainly a reasonable excuse for the wire that connect the pad and pedal to the transmitter they are plenty long enough but theyre also extremely thin im a little afraid that it i were to pick the set without remembering to also pick up the pedal the weight of the pedal could damage it wire something else to watch for if little kid are in the houseone more thing to bear in mind is that while the pad dont make a ton of noise they arent exactly quiet youll want to turn up the game volume fairly high to drown them out i able to play them without waking sleeping people in another room but if you live in a very small place or if you have downstairs neighbor you may be limited in term of you can playoverall the good definitely outweighs the bad and i recommend this set if it fit budget ill finish by commenting on it compatibility with the game that i tried guitar hero worked perfectly rock band worked perfectly rock revolution worked perfectly with the game option set to pad mode instead of pad mode rock band not work wa recognized a a microphone by the game for you can download the song to rock band which i expect would make them playable rock band acdc track pack did not work wa recognized a a microphone a with rb you can download the song into rb or rb for free and i expect that the song would work in rb

well figured game could use review someone actually played quite a bit unlike review from people who either a played it b complaining securom c have played it minute prepared review anyway the game actually quite fun start the ocean whichever little critter you make and swim around and eat smaller fish pretty simple and im sure youve all played a game like anyway you get bigger and eat bigger fish get new part you add the specie youre creating and voila the cell stage you move on to the next stage depending on decision you made in the cell stage you might classified a carnivore herbivore or omnivore anyway youre going to get to add some new thing to specie add a couple leg arm bigger mouth etc and remove thing you longer need since youre the water now you go around and you can either befriend other specie or kill off your choice i chose to kill of them off though i tried to befriend them first some are easy to befriend some not much one of the thing i kept getting is specie that wanted to pose for them i hadnt found the right part around the planet yet to give me that ability in fact didnt find them right after that stage this is really easy stage you get going youll hibernate a couple time to new nest and find some specie to either befriend or make extinct most of the new part you get for your specie are going around the planet and finding bone very easy and some are clumped like in one area make for alot of addons for your specie after you finish this stage youll move on to the tribal stage this stage is kind of like command and conquer style for of you that have played it youre going to be controlling your specie from a birdseye view default view you can move the camera though and interact with other tribe your specie now have the ability to make fire build hut collect food to keep the camp etc however pretty much the basis a the creature stage go around and either kill off other tribe or befriend them the way you played the previous stage also ha an affect on this one itll classify you a an aggressive specie friendly specie or adaptable specie aggressive of course one that like to kill specie off and friendly one that like to befriend with adaptable being in the middle you start off with creature from your specie in your camp one being the chief and two being workersfighters whatever that may be you can then add member by creating baby though you can only have a maximum of tribe member until you kill off other tribe to increase your amount i havent finished this stage yet but it pretty good believe are two more stage after this and ill try and edit review i find out i dont really think this game ha to much replayability sure you can create new creature and all but the only difference will really be changing to a herbivore or something it would be stupid not to say that every time you make a new creature you are going to give it the same part a your previous a youll want the best stats though you can form it in different way it will always kind of look alike another thing i dislike is the fact you can change your character so much dont limit the customization at all im not talking about the first time but once youve looked like let say a dinosaur the next time youre in edit mode you can make some kind of legged specie with eye wing completely change the color take away the tail and though thats what the player want to i guess thats fine but it just weird my specie actually went from looking like a horse to looking like a trex of course i guess that my fault but still anyway still a pretty decent game though i might be biased a i no idea this game wa in the work for the last year or whatever i just heard about it like two or three week ago i think when they released spore origin on itunes and i wanted to check it out so i wasnt expecting a genrechanging game like most people now about securomit really suck yeah but i guess have to live with it or just stay away until they are forced to change it i actually install securom game on my computer that isnt connected to internet and if i have to connect it for activation i do and then disconnect it still a pretty good computer and i dont use it for bad either for all the hype ive heard and read that this game ha had i would be pretty mad to if this wa what i ended getting but a i said i had no expectation so it wa fine with me i know my opinion would be different if i had waiting year for it

mild spoiler aheadas others said beautiful game original lore make seems fresh among wizard warrior mmos although the typical professionsclasses present aion it with a unique twist player start human the first level ascend gain wing and pick a true character class for the four class priest mage scout warrior selected time of character creation their are two branch that the player must select at level for example a priest that hit level have to pick becoming a cleric predominate healer chanter melee fighter with heals and buff at level a mage will become either a sorcerer or a spiritmasterquesting aion linear coming from a predominate guild war fan accustom to a deep monolithic storyline connected missionscampaign quest are plenty of quest dont have a rich ever evolving storyline with aion the reason is that the game is really pvp call pvpve although it start out a a pve game is really problem with aion it is significant in the u pvp gamer crowd is distinct from the pve crowd people look for different thing in game a game a world of warcraft solves this problem by providing pve only server that a new player elect aion doe have pve exclusive server and probably never will at it core it is a pvp game a player character evolution is something like thislevels beginner island hour of play can played solo all content is pve focusedlevels access to capital city game feature open at this stage you can fly quest and grinding will help you level at this stage youre slowly filing out character armor and learning essential skill for your chosen character class hour of play can be played solo all content is pve focusedlevel around level player begin entering pvp zone and fighting the faction at this point the game is longer soloable and player have playing alone of the time will get frustrated and may take a very long time to level finding a good group becomes critical hour of play depending play style and quality of group you can get with group play is forced most content is pvp focused access to limited pvp zone open uplevel split between quest taking player into pve and pvp zone this part of the game is suppose to gear up a player for learning to play their role in a pvp group but since most of the content is pve oriented it really doesnt that all that well at least not in the beta ive been told it hasnt changed hour of play depending on play style and quality of group group play of or more required for most thingslevel this is the heart of the game you can even think of level a sort of beginner zone in aspect it is a the game take on a very big change at level and the focus is pvppvpve at this stage it about entering the abyss earning a abyss point capturing location for your faction etc essentially it becomes a very very different game that caters to the more aggressive hard core player to help make the game more accessible to casual player ncsoft added many instanced dungeon for the u release and are available to level and aboveso thats aion in a nutshell it a solid game but youre arent into pvp aion could be a real let but if youre into pvp and pve gameplay there is probably not a better game

great game is better first one cole still electric power also ice fire based power well progressing the game new marais is a better city than empire city different variation in the scenery swamp the completely flooded part the city to palm tree and a new orleans style setting user generated content add a lot of depth to the game a well because even after beat of the story and side mission there are literally thousand of ugc mission to play a long a you have internet access you also spend hour creating mission is a lot of replay value certain power are better you get the fire based power playing evil mission and making evil choice you can eventually equip the firebird strike is this power special it is special because it you can actually fly jump of a tall building and use firebird strike and you can fly much of new marais your energy source is depleted the only criticism that have is that melee combat the camera may zoom away from the best part of the action mean that you may not able to see you are hitting all the time anybody that enjoys fun and exciting action adventure game check this game

let start saying ive read comic seen every episode the tv show huge fan of the walking dead series written and visual formthis game blew me away storytelling tactic insanely original the character are beautifully craftedand truly feel like a gaming experience a game itselfill lay the pro and con of the gameprosgreat story literally almost cried the endamazing character character a beautifully crafted arc and really become lee everett in the gamegraphics are well done although a bit laggy the graphic are fun and interestingalways surprise i feel like the comic sometimes draw certain story out much and the show definitely part of season example i never felt that in the gameconscontrols isnt fps it an actionadventure game like batman arkham city for example it a point and click for action type game even i found it hard point and click at the right moment due to poor button configurationlagging the graphic tended to blotchy and buggy a lot of the time cutscenes and sometimes during the game but this didnt take away the overall experience of the gamelike i said this isnt the best game ive ever played but it the best experience ive never i invested much a character character into a story or a video game world you become the character you play and you definitely build relationship it fun exciting tearjerking sometimes annoying but believe me you not want to miss out playing this itll take hour of time max and every second is worth it except second youre walking back and forth trying to find an appliance to open a door

time good western game came title released rockstar game knew one that i wa definitely going to get hand premise the game a tale of revenge take on the role of red whose family wa murdered front of wa young in addition to red you also play of the character including red friend even the bad guy the look and sound of the game is based on sergio leone spaghetti western starring the like of clint eastwood and lee van cleef among my favorite film of alltime the style of the game stay true to the genre with the look feel and sound it a blast to play with quickdrawing rapidfiring sharpshooting action the setting also look spectacular which includes everything border town cemetaries and silver mine to river mountain and green green valley gameplay range from run and shoot to stagecoach and train chase on horseback the control are a bit odd you are taken tutorial early in the story to help you master the art of the quickdraw and the deadeye some of the voice and the dialogue are a bit silly but it add to the charm of the game and are good a chuckle and there is also a showdown mode you take one opponent to earn extra cash and unlockable item it also a good place to practice aiming technique red dead revolver also feature a multiplayer mode for to four people i highly recommend this game to fan of the western film genre and thirdperson shooter have fun

two highly successful ridiculously fun game thenes konami brought contra super nintendo and wow incredible job contra iii favorite snes game and one the best game the system took everything contra did and improved on itthe graphic look great the explosion effect the gunfire the level and even the background look fantastic even for bit system the enemy varied and welldesigned especially the boss konami always extremely creative it come to the contra boss and they definitely topped time around my personal favorite ha always been the bos stage the beast kimkoh the sound effect and music are topnotch well level ha catchy soundtrack and it just make the entire experience enjoyableall the classic weapon are back the machine gun the fire gun the laser gun and of course the spread gun personally think it all i get the spread gun an interesting change is that automatically start a machine gun instead of a single shot rifle like incontraandsuper c new weapon include the homing gun shoot enemyseeking missile and the crush gun which shoot standard rocket there also the return of the barrier shield and the grenade that kill everything onscreen vehicle are a big part of the game a well and add more diversity to the gameplaythe gameplay is fastpaced intense and extremely tough a usual one hit death and you are bound to get hit without practice the control are wonderful tight responsive and easy to pick and use you shoot nearly direction you want to with almost effort a new and particularly awesome feature is that you can hold l and r and press the fire button to shoot gun randomly in all direction a you jump and spin in the air this is effective in dealing with the endless onslaught of enemy and it look really coolis anything wrong with this game no people say the game is short when you beat it all you want to do is beat it somehow contra iii manages to never get boring and thats the game strongest point the replayability you can sit for five minute go gungho and just blast everything in sight strategically take your time plan your attack and try to beat the game either way work perfectly and is equally funso all in all the game is perfect in every regard it fun challenging highlypolished and original contra iii is a mustown you a super nintendo

vehicle a ramming function is perfect slamming vehicle the road it awesomeyoull mostly using fist in the game gun are pretty scarce first thats not a bad thing however in fact found it to be refreshing wei start out a basic move set but a you gain experience point with completing triad and police mission hell acquire move that look great and are fun to pull off fighting isnt complicated let start saying actually liked original ff xiii i know lot people didnt i understand xiii strength also had it weakness the point i honestly surprised announced a sequelbut many problem a xiii had xiii address problem and came a the game that the original xiii beenits longer a corridor crawl area objective and a map leading to that objective youre shoehorned going where the game want you to go you have room to explore and side quest the linearity and lack of town much improved thisthe battle a mixed bag it a little different engaging enemy it a mix creature pop up the world map having a limited time to either engage flee the actual battle are similar enough to xiii that you could go straight the old game to one and feel right homeboss battle however include a new feature thats pretty much the quick time event that you see game however it give you ample warning that an event is coming up the time to react is very generous and it doesnt end in a game you mess up you simply dont end the battle a well a you could may mean missing on enemy drop or a slight change in story lineim rather split on this a far a quick time event go xiii this very well but im not used to having this kind of play mechanic in a jrpg it could a take it or leave itso here xiii right they refined the battle system added town and opened up the exploration this doe everything xiii tried to do better this is the game xiii wa trying to be in this way it is a very good game and well worth your moneyheres what xiii did wrong it is a very short game looking at the calendar it wa released on jan i just beat it yesterday eight day i beat this game in eight day i have never beaten an rpg let alone a final fantasy game in eight day sure there still plenty of side quest to do there plenty of content that offset the shortness of the main quest but the main quest is the real meat ofand the main reason to buya jrpg it should never be so short particularly a final fantasy gamealso the ending yes do let me rant awhile without spoiling much it a bit of a downer ending that i can handle crisis core had a downer ending tomb raider last revelation had a downer ending hamlet had a downer ending i can handle downer endingswhat i dont like are three little word to be continued when you spend premium price on a game you shouldnt have to proceed to be nickel and dimed by downloadable content to get the real ending actually i wouldnt even be so harsh to be continued a long a the game had a selfcontained ending an ending that would make you say yeah there to see i may get the next part to see it resolve but i feel satisfied with this if this is i see of this story line i still feel like i had a complete story and therefore a complete experiencebut thats not what they do the ending leaf everything in a very bad very unresolved way they let you know that if you want kind of resolution youre going to have to pay more and beyond the not so cheap sticker pricenow dont get me wrong i think downloadable content ha it place an outfit a special weapon new character new map but to make a precedent where you have to download the actual ending to the game above and beyond the sticker price is the start of a slippery slope of not having to have an entire game on a rather expensive disk dolling out the rest of the game in an undetermined number of expansion that nickel and dime the player already paid to be able to play and finish the gameso where doe that leave this review doe the good outweigh the badunfortunately yes the good doe outweigh the bad like i said at the beginning of this review i liked the original xiii this doe everything better it what xiii should have i may or may not go the dlc that finish out the game though ill be a sucker if i do but the bottom line is that this game is fun it ha an emotional impact with the story you come to care about the character it a heck of a journeyi would give this game five star even given the shortness of the main quest the ending and having to go to dlc in order to finish the game however is going to cost it a starits a dangerous precedent of not having an entire game on the disk and forcing the player into downloading more dlc in order to have a complete experience video game are an expensive hobby enough without nickel and dimed just to get a complete gamei would say three and a half star amazon doesnt deal in half star since everything else about the game is so good ill be generous and say four star

third sims castaway game ive played completed sims castaway d and the sims castaway story for pc the d version addicting and entertaining sims game the pc version fell seriously short therefore didnt get my hope for this game still opted buy used to give it shoti a pc sim gamer but i also thouroughly enjoy sims platform game for the goaloriented aspect a probably already know this platform sims version you create a character becomes a crewmember aboard a ship sink character is washed ashore a deserted island and left to fend for himherself you start simple task learning to meet the sims basic need and gathering resourcesfood and exploring the island a task are completed goal are introduced that are increasingly more difficult and time consuming yet equally intriguing you gradually discover your crewmates who you convince to join your tribe you are able to control a you your sim this is a perk for two reason you use them to gather resource depending the job you select for them while youre working on a goal your own sim and your original sims meter are low you can switch to another and continue with whatever goal youre working on while your other sims are replenishing metersi wa bothered meeting the sims basic need it get tiring to rest my sims especially would refuse to gather resource if she wa tired the sleep meter seemed to run quite fast but le halfway the game id met another sim and wa able to switch back and forth the two made it easier to play continuously without having to constantly replenish the needsi wish the game done a little more with the recipe factor many different type of fish fruit veggie and grain but little emphasis on the recipe i also felt there were waaay many clothing design and not enough time desire to make them all essentially my sims wore the thing the whole way through the gamei enjoyed the graphic of the game although the perception got a little tricky it is pretty difficult to adjust your view in the jungle in order to see anything but a bunch of shrubbery on your screenthe one thing the game did not provide wa closure you can get off the island using different method but once youve achieved that it sends you right back to the island to continue meeting goal making shelter etc i know that this the developer way of allowing freeplay but once id met all the goal and discovered all the way off the island i had desire to continue playingall in all if you like sims and youre willing to spend about to buy this game used then go for it i played it off and on for about a month i finished it and wa ready to sell it off thats more than i can say for many other game ive played in the past

believe game sort movie tiein story supposedly take place the first hulk movie eric bana a lackluster film fortunately this game make thing much interesting blending element of the movie with of the comic book more specifically many character the comic like the leader betty ross more obscure hulk enemy like ravage flux madman and halflife appear well this game bruce is looking a way cure of the hulk in the process a supposed doctor friend of absorbs of bruce radiation and turn himself his version of the hulk naming himself ravage the hulk go after ravage in the hope of stopping and the leader from using his own radiation to create army of hulk the story is pretty good and the gameplay is thankfully even better even though this is not a freeroaming game still plenty fun going the many level mostly underground or military base and beating the crap of soldier tank hulkbuster robot gamma dog like in the movie and gamma soldier the gamma soldier actually quite annoying with martial art attack and theyre twice a annoying theyre armed with gamma blaster an insane amount of damage to the hulk the bos fight also quite challenging and several of require more simply running to the bos and continually smacking them around for example getting close to halflife allows him to absorb the hulk health increasing his own so keeping him bay by throwing crate and pipe at him is the way to go for that battlethe hulk himself control well and can perform damaging grapple attack his enemy like breaking their back or throwing them into other enemy his standard punching smashing and thunderclap attack can get the job done of the time but can also perform powerful rage attack that can take out large group of enemy simultaneously with either a super ground smash or super thunder clap the one downside gameplaywise are the level play a bruce banner which involve him sneaking through certain area in order to reach his destination bruce limited combat capability which can work weaker enemy dont firearm but against armed enemy not to mention gamma dog and soldier bruce get killed in second so stealth is the name of the game while playing a bruce and while the stealth isnt bad it seems a little out of place with this particular type of game the hacking portion of stealth playthroughs are especially annoying could have done without those for it time especially this game bought title budget price looked like it might offer fun a day given and ive played this more game far first let me qualify that this a top tier game graphic realistic physic it really not ground breaking in respect however serve material well the entire game a delightful b grade movie feel youve ever enjoyed movie giant ant robot ufo and giant godzilla like monster youll instantly get the appeal this game the ant and spider teem and swarm building the giant robot a comic book aesthetic they plod along with a perfectly believable gait for size reminding me of the slow inevitable advance of the atats in empire strike back they definitely my favorite enemy they satisfyingly recoil with well placed rocket or sniper shot the head it also great fun to watch onrushing swarm of bug get broken grenade launcher sending a couple of mack truck sized ant the air good timesthis game not have an online component but i dont think that is a detractor new fps game are focusing online and leaving le material for single player game and le and le on console multiplayer support in exchange get level with different mission and enemy and a selection of different difficulty the harder level you play the better the weapon you receive im starting to play on hard and some of the weapon are becoming satisfyingthe level are usually simple objective kill everything or destroy an objective simple running around looking for that last enemy theyre on your radar no looking desperately for that one power or switch to flip you are also free to run anywhere and the level are huge you arent canned into a set path like most fps singleplayer the building are fully destructible one rocket or grenade and they believably crumble ala independence day the only thing i dont like are that you get knocked in some attack making it impossible to maneuver and that the vehicle are almost impossible to pilot effectively the mech and tank could have much more satisfying than they if you chose to use they make better gun emplacement shoot with them a long a they last fight on footif you are a hardcore year old twitch monkey or a fps elitist you might not like this game if youd enjoy a game you put in for min of mindless shootem up you can play with a friend this might the game for you mine wa new it is a steal and a pleasant surprise especially for that price

ive played maybe pc video game start to finish last year would to rank in the top got everything could want from game graphic storyline strategy sound blizzard hyped this game pretty big it release and think theyve deliveredother reviewer have commented this game really update warcraft ii that really doesnt achieve anything groundbreaking original true is almost nothing original in this game i think a lot of people forget that others may have played game warcraft starcraft etc supposedly ripped whaddya want the game is derivitavely sublimelets see else i say the user interface is easy and intuitive the gameplay is always interesting and the voice especially welldone in particular i love the orcish witch doctor chew got manbut i would have to say that the standout of this game would the graphic there are hundred and hundred of and theyre so indescribably cool example character get healed or one of the hero cast a spell or when the witch doctor set up a healing ward there are so many cool graphic and animation in this game it actually sort of interfered gameplay i found recasting various spell pointlessly and getting little myrmidon to various task all the animation rocked not necessarily because were exigent i have to confess i chiefly enjoyed this game simply for the way everything lookedi do have my gripe though the story is strictly for gradeschoolers id be surprised there is a single person there even the big fan can sit the cut scene and not think this is lame let get with iti for one wish they just spent time making level instead of taking up memory on the disk with all this sillinesstrue the cutscenes look good least today standard theyre stateoftheart for but the bottom line is that the story line is idiotic and i dont pay big buck for a game to watch moviesi can say that i have rarely seen the thing bug out a couple of time and they were quite minor bug blizzard is wellknown for useful patch and substantial customer supportanother thing i like this game is that blizzard at least for their starcraftstyle game always release cheat code a few month the game gone on the market this is great so that if youve simply had it with the game you can enter cheat code and finishand cheat code can be used for entertainment for example one of the thing i liked using them to subvert the supposed goal of level to find out what would happen if you for example betrayed ally would the game still let you winmy favorite wa using the god mode cheat in combination with the goblin shredder to level the elf sacred forest right before their weepin eye and with their not able to do a thing about it for some extra entertainment try vanquishing your allied town without cheating nearly impossiblebut the game is a great value even if you dont enter cheat code and play it through straight youve got more a couple of month of variegated entertainment and thats not even counting online playinganother thing i appreciated about the game is that if you get wiped out on a level you can restart the level by choosing reduce difficulty i thought this wa really cool for those few scenario that drive you up the wallbut what youre being offered here is a triple pack not merely warcraft iii but the frozen throne expansion pack well a well a prima strategy guide for when you consider much youre paying how much entertainment youll get out of this why youre being entertained for penny per hour so i would have to say that especially now a couple of year after it initial release what youre getting is an indisputable value

almost gave game i annoyed ticked and the hacking minigame hundred time wa tedious and got on nerve i died repeatedly and wa cursing theni got to the china level the game improved drastically it that i finally got upgrade that smooth sailingthe reason the hacking mechanic annoying first that it literally a large measure pure chance youre first starting you have to first get up to a skill level to hack level security system youll also want to invest stealth so the random chance of getting caught diminishes and probably fortifying skill so you protect when the counter attack the trace start up you can play the game minimal hacking skill but it suited to playing with high skill and youll rewarded with more bit of the story oh you can also hack robot and turret are sadly fairly limited in number but are still fun i got enhanced strength and at one point carried my little buddy around entire level plopping and letting the turret kill the enemy yeah it wa cheap yeah it wa stupid it wa still highly amusing to be able tocombat is really well done with a nice cover system that help the stealth mechanic you can also get up close enough to trigger a melee attack that can kill someone outright dont try it on a bos though and can be upgraded to kill two at a time which is danged handy you also have access to a nice little typhoon system which let you trigger explosive near enemy and upgraded far enough even kill robotsshort version game is a stealthy one you cant take much damage even if youre fully upgraded you instead have to rely much on stealth a hacking minigame thats based largely on luck and you have an interesting storyline you uncover a plot the ending you have several choice though none of are all that big of a deal if you want to see all of them just save you make final choice dont worry the game tell you when that is

havent completed singleplayer campaign ghost recon i thought i would go ahead offer impression nonetheless first the tom clancy game my favorite xbox franchise halo and i loved the first ghost recon and the island thunder expansion pack despite flaw i first heard ghost recon i pretty excited about seeing the final product ive played the actual game for i cant help but agree reviewer say that although ghost recon may well a good game really isnt ghost recon despite their occasionally rough graphic and overcomplicated control i ultimately think that gr and grit unique and enjoyable gr i must give ubisoft credit for willing go a new direction with the sequel to one their popular game instead of simply tweaking the graphic a little and adding a new feature here ea anyone didnt like the fixed first person perspective of the first game well now switch first person and the shoulder view thought the menu were confusing now theyve simplified and the selection of weapon streamlined thought the command system for managing squad wa complicated now you one squad to worry about and the command system more closely resembles rainbow than the original ghost recon in fact the whole game seems much closer to rainbow than the first ghost recon and therein lie much of the problem i think yes gr wa a little complicated but you master it you a wealth of option available to you in term of strategy and tactic gr much more like a typical runandgun shooter in you have a squad who back you in other word rainbow one squad isnt too much of a problem for i often went with one in the first game to simplify matter but the ability to switch between character is sorely lacking in the first game you could be the sniper whenever that wa necessary or switch to the guy with an automatic weapon whenever you needed to hose a building full of enemy but now you simply command your squadmates to thing for you ubisoft also apparently eliminated indoor environment is understandable given that the squad would often get stuck in doorway and whenever you went inside a building in the first game but i think could have just fixed that problem instead of simply getting rid of wa an interesting element of gameplay the ai is also a little different the north korean seem more adept taking cover and protecting than the russian or cuban did in gr and grit but their heightened aggression come at a price in the first game the enemy basically patrolled a certain number of path which allowed you to observe and decide to best attack them at your leisure in gr they simply spawn when you reach certain point at the game and attack you en masse much of the stealth and strategy element that distinguished the first game and expansion pack are simply gone in it place you have a wellpolished and nicely executed military shooter that bear little resemblance to it predecessor and is best enjoyed without prior expectation

big fan prince of persia i liked sand of time thought goty nomination taking far i saw it a solid highly enjoyable experience but not aaa title others touted it asi skeptical of igns review of this new pop the reviewer a love affair the game the page of ign seemed like he wa too much love with the series in general give a truly unbiased review i also recently reading many revisionist take on this game saying it too short too easy too shallow bad combat overrated etc the usual thing the second guesser say a well received gamei picked a copy of the game and have beaten it and unlocked of the achievement the i have ever done in a game in depth experience given informed impression of the game is much this game right where it just grab hold you in the palm of hand time you may find annoyed frustrated even bored all in all this is an excellent game you experience but ubi soft had a particular type of gamer in mind designed this new prince of persialet me start with you should get this gamefor one the game is absolutely gorgeous a work of art i love the look of this game and it is nice to see a western developer create a style detailed and beautiful i cant stand the big eyed weird looking japanese style of artistic game and i hope other western devs follow ubi softs lead it is part cel shaded part conventional graphic reminds me of a movie us rotoscope animation the game world is like a painting in a museum and the main character have so much detail and care put design and every movement you cant help but take notice even when in an intense situation this is the type of game you stop playing for a bit and just look at the prince stand on a balcony of a massive tower overlooking a massive landscape is a sight to behold my dream game would a conan game which us ubi softs engine and frank frazettas art stylethe difficulty in this game is about the a sand of time and may even be a tick challenging you cant die in the game the ai character will always save you it is a bit lame but it is not much different using the time control in sand of time to rewind time to save yourself it is essentially the same concept i dont see why so hard on this game but give sand of time a pas also there are a ton of game which allow you to save anywhere at anytime creating checkpoint is that le cheap than not dying in this game there is also an achievement you get where the ai can not save you more than time there a little incentive for you to be more careful and there is another component to this game which involves collecting light cystals you beat certain area it can be pretty damn tough to get all of and offer a different kind of challengealot of game day are short too short prince of persia is not one of game though yes you beat it you may be done with it but it is like that with most single player game it took me well hour to beat this game now alot of my time had been spent gawking at the scenery but this isnt a game meant to be rushed you really have to stop once in a and soak it all inthe gameplay is good and the control are top notch this is an action platformer and a joy to play there are plenty of intense and epic moment to be had in this game you constantly be wondering else they have in store for you the gameplay is like sand of time but with a slightly faster pace and more intuitive controlsthe combat is pretty good this is not warrior within so there arent that many enemy to do battle with the focus is platforming and exploration what combat there is though is pretty fun a more polished version of sand of time where you can do some really cool stuff the gripe i have about the combat are the flash prompt which i will discus laterthe sound in this game is incredible the effect to the music it doesnt just sound good but it know the right time to kick in a well youll hear an earth shattering roar just when thing started to get nice and quiet or youll hear some epic movie like music just a you walk onto that balcony to check out the scenery like luke skywalker watching the tatooine sun set with a john williams score in the backgroundyes there are some flaw and ill mention them real quickthe prince can be annoying ubi soft ha an incredible art style and gorgeous game world they should have taken the character more seriously they went in a tongue in cheek direction but with the prince character they tried to make sarcastic and witty but he come across a a bad disney version of han solo or a poor man ash bruce campbell in evil dead movie it doe take away from the game quite a bit at first but eventually he will either grow on you or youll learn to tolerate himthe story is generic would have been nice to have a story that matched the scale of the game world but it is nothing too bad especially video game standard the ending i must say redeems the story completely and leaf you gaping at your screen exceptionalcollecting the light seed will seem tedious at first it to me but then i realized the real challenge in getting to some of these thing and how it add a new dimension to the gameplay i soon looked forward to collecting them but they will be tedious to othersthe game ha incredible platform element im talking some pretty intense stuff here but the platform puzzle aspect other than getting to some of the light seed is lacking one main reason for this is you can have your ai companion cast a spell which light up the path you need to take a glowing orb will show you the direction you press the button still getting through that path safely can be quite a challenge and when it come to finding a way to get to light seed youre on your own some tomb raider like puzzle would have been great and would have added much to the gameplaythe game world feel a little lonely not that many character you are basically trying to save an abandoned part of the world so it mostly just you and the ai companion along with the occasional enemy to battle would have been awesome if this game had a zelda like spin to it a minor gripethe boss are pretty impressive in the game but you dont have any real fear of dying from them youll be amazed what you live through the fight can be quite the spectacle a spectacle you are fully involved in but the battle also use what i will call flash prompt where the bad guy get close and enters an animation and you cant control your youre supposed to wait for the appropriate button to fash on the screen and if you hit it in time the prince will react and counter but if you miss it you get to watch him get beat on these flash prompt were a pain to me i felt detached from the experience they arent a huge portion of the battle experience thoughfinal thoughtsprince of persia wa designed with a more casual gamer in mind someone is not particularly seasoned in gaming but is interested in getting lost in a beautiful new world somneone who enjoys game but doe not have the time to sink endless hour into one and accomplish nothing the objective of the game are the same throughout beat a world which take around min or so and then collect the needed light seed it is the type of game best enjoyed when played in spurt a opposed to setting aside your whole weekend afternoon the longer you play it the more tedious the limited battle and light seed collecting becomes when you play it in spurt such a an hour or maybe two at a time then you will be presented with a gorgeous and fully detailed world lifted right out of the dream of your childhood and the page of a fairy tale the platforming and acrobatic move are a joy and collecting all the light seed in an area is a challenge but one that wont keep you up all night the gameplay is incredibly streamlined and there is a deliberate effort to avoid frustration a much a possible this is good for those who play it in spurt but possibly problematic for those who grind right through every game they get with the beautiful animation ubi soft is also flirting with some dangerous territory here where you feel you are watching the game more than playing the game still quite challenging but at time the platforming seems a little too automated a wellit is a beautiful elegant game which control got lot mileage ofbattlefield bad company campaign pretty much a bust i wa still fun multiplayer mode a week ago wa time start bracing game it wa the fun id with fps since the original battlefield another game wasnt necessarily having an itchy trigger finger whether could work together with team to complete an objective battlefield continues that tradition of addicting teambased gameplay delivering one of the finest multiplayer mode ive ever playedbut it mad rush to dethrone the call of duty franchise the developer dice may pulled the trigger a bit early while still a game that hold high all others in the genre it weak at the kneescampaignas i said the campaign for bad company couldve better it wa pretty frantic at time but it wasnt long it started to feel repetitive you throw many enemy soldier a you want at the player but there substance no reason to even care if youre shot at somethings battlefield try to rectify this making the mission involving mostly action it not so much go kill though you a lot of that but more like go here guess whats gon na happen next there more variety in term of mission completed for an idea of i mean it kinda boil to this if youve played the modern warfare series well you godice have tried to capture that proverbial cod lightning in a bottle by delivering a campaign that feel like modern warfare if it tried to take itself way too seriously and that might be good or bad depending battlefield all the action but a startling lack of character that exude anything military protocol you know that you for the most part play a staff sergeant henry blackburn the solemn stonefaced u marine that you see in cutscenes mission you also know that blackburn wa attempting to stop a nuclear threat of kind before being placed interrogation by superior aside that the eyepopping action and the attention to detail there not much more to it than thatgranted all of the level look dazzling and unique from each other it obvious that a lot of work went the level design i cant tell you how many time i found holding the mission to take in the scenery it definitely one of the best if not the best looking game currently available the xbox for a game to look this good on sixyearold hardware dice must have magician working for themits definitely the best battlefield campaign that ive played unlike bc i wa rarely bored the action is intense there some interesting twist and turn and the visuals take everything up to a whole other level the main caveat being that it just nothing that hasnt been done before militarybased shooter involving a nuclear threat are in no short supply day add to that your typical launch day glitchesbugs questionable ai and lack of compelling character to care about and youve got a campaign that wont disappoint but at the time only raise the bar for it franchisethough it doe pull off a framed narrative with more competence than dragon age ill take excuse to rail that gamemultiplayera majority of bfs player will very likely forget that there a campaign disc and throw straight at the multiplayer almost that myself to be brief that multiplayer is good very good i wasnt sure how dice would improve on bad company nearflawless in opinion multiplayer mode but theyve certainly found a way a lot of the change are cosmetic the level are more citybased add a whole new element of strategy coming from bcs mostly rural settingthe destruction aspect is still there smaller one or two story building that take a little bit too much flak will eventually collapse and taller building under the same treatment will shed mound of debris onto the street exposing the inner floor and decimating any player unlucky enough to be standing on the wrong part of the sidewalk there wa some concern about whether or not the destruction wa toned down for bf but i dont believe it ha there just different form of destruction youre not going to see tower collapsing onto the street or anything but like in bc the level probably wont look very pretty by the time your game overthe vehicle are back with the notable addition of the fa super hornet enabling jet combat with it own set of weapon and countermeasure new to the series vehicle can now be disabled making it possible for ground troop to get the upper hand with some effort the class have also been tweaked a bit with assault now fulfilling the role of medic a well and the new support class being for ammo distribution and enemy suppression to top it all off there are many more option for customizing and finetuning your weapon and sidearm to suit your playstyle no colorful weapon skin or anything like that but i consider that a plus in this contextmovement ha been improved with the ability to vaultslide over obstacle and the reintroduction of being able to go prone at first i wa very much against this since i could envision half the map hiding away prone sniping until got bored doesnt mean that didnt happen but the lack of maneuverability you have make it difficult to defend you be discovered keep thing nice and balanced for nowthe current downside to the multiplayer is that it not quite stable it very clear that ea underestimated just how many people would be playing so lag and entire server going dark is a constant at this point i havent even been able to access all of the map yet it tough for to complain le than two day launch since this is usually the case for all game of this type but with the campaign being in the almost state it is now and the rest of the game being so heavily reliant on it online element you might have yourself a two disc game and nothing to dothis should be cleared up and stabilized within the next few week along with the battery of patch that are sure to come but if you like having the certainty of playing a you like waiting to pick this game up might be in your best interestas it stand ive played through the campaign and seen enough of the multiplayer to know that i wont be regretting this purchase i can nitpick about this aggravating online pas business the ai teammate that like to push me out of cover or how the only female character in the game is the only one doesnt talk but it wouldnt take away from the fact that ive been having the time of my life when the server permit it in my mind these nitpicks are what keep battlefield from achieving the absolute greatness that i thought it would on it first try but even so it still met my expectation and it been a great ride so farnow can all sit back and wait for the inevitable battlefield vietnam

two reason buy playing street fighter using traditional controller dpad the button may seem like much the end theyre perfectly executedthe dpad interesting design essentially is a very small joystick a dpad mounted top thus move right either pressing on the right side pushing the pad towards the right this the movement is very fluid and dynamic but there is a bit travel you would get with a traditional dpad ive found it to very helpful with rotationbased move down downforward forward but the distance is le helpful for charge move back for second forward direction are quite precise and never find that im accidentally pressing the wrong way overall it beat dpad available on the easily including previous mad katz pad and hori importsfurther the button are pure beauty to use the layout is perfect and the button are spaced far enough apart that i yet to accidentally mispress button action is short and sharp allowing for faster usage this is the button layout that the game made for the shoulder button unfortunately are somewhat stiff and difficult to use but get the job donethe pad also feature rapid fire is pretty easy to use hold the rapid fire button and tap the button you would like to set a light on the controller blink it go simple a a bonus the controller is curved almost perfectly that any button can be held down with a simple rubber band youre the kind of cheater that sort of thing second starting with this controller it felt perfectly natural in hand this is the way the game wa meant to be played instead of fighting the control i felt like i wa playing the game dollar for a pad that you probably use on one or two game may seem like a lot and it is but this controller is a pleasure highly recommended

spiderman otherwise known amazing spiderman v the kingpin sega genesismegadrive truly awesome superhero experience manages nail lot important character trait translating to gameplay the game work wonderfully itas spidermanpeter parker youre dropped a platforming action game the ability to climb wall web swing across the city skyline and shoot spidermans trademark web shooter while the combat certainly isnt a varied deep a something like maximum carnage the level design here is wonderful and make a lot of make the game great air vent to crawl wall to climb hidden powerups to collect a ton of fun traversing these levelswhat also help is spidermans ability to take photo these stage parker sell to the daily bugle to support superhero antic the money earns he spends it on the web fluid he need a spiderman is a great addition to the game a it done well it a lot deeper you initially imagine it photo become an essential part of this game and it absolutely character appropriate on a regular basis youll earn for taking photo of regular enemy and upwards of for photo of super villain which appropriately make up the end boss of these well designed varied stagescontrol is pitch perfect climbing wall web slinging around and generally being spiderman feel natural to the sega genesis the game a great job of making you feel like you whatever a spider can the web slinging web shooting and even the basic attack combat control are superior even to of the recent bit spiderman outing the web slinging feel extremely fluid especially compared to the game based on the animated series or even the glorious maximum carnagegraphically the game fare ok this is an early genesismegadrive game all some thing arent a detailed a would have liked to see a bit game of this type for the time this released the visuals are definitely serviceable there are great static cutscene image look a though ripped straight the comic and all of the character are immediately recognizablethe bos fight in this game require a fair bit of trial and error to complete while you may able to get with just beating down some of the boss and hoping they die you do for a lot of these encounter youll have to rely on a solid strategy it memorizing pattern and exploiting initially i hated some of these boss electro being the main offender however i played the game more and figured out to take these boss out i could get past of them with minimal troublethese bos fight and the beating youll initially take from them lead to the way health work in this game while there are health pickup found throughout some of the level arent nearly enough to fill health bar all the way youve taken a moderate amount of damage this is where peter parker apartment come into play the entire game is set on an ingame hour timer the timer move quite slowly far from realtime though mind you but when you return to parker apartment it speed up significantly this is returning to the apartment is used a a mean to regain lost health you take spidey back there let rest up for about an ingame hour about second in realtime then youre back the beginning of the level you left much like the photography mechanic this health system is also quite deep and work well considering the timer here made with great care it lenient enough to give you more than a couple of hour to spare yet when you die and have to continue youll lose hour on the clock granted there are unlimited continues a long a you still have time to spare but it almost always better to heal up at your apartment than to flat out die the extra ingame hour you save is worth itthe audio here isnt spectacular a lot of the music fare well enough though it nowhere near maximum carnage green jelly quality the sound effect for punch kick etc dont sound all wonderful either from an audio standpoint this is a passable game which is a shame a every aspect is perfect imo it make me wish this exact game were released later in the genesis lifecycle with better sound and visuals however there is a great sega cd version of this game that fix a lot of the issue i have a well a adding new mechanic to the gameplayall in all i would recommend either version the amazing spiderman v the kingpin get so many thing right about spiderman it easy to overlook the flaw a the poor implemented minibosses that being said i believe every bos fight is fun up to and including the kingpin and theyre all intense in way this can be a really short game but it definitely an easy one it not the hardest game ever or anything like that but it definitely a challenging enough experiencethis is a truly great game and honestly one of the best spiderman game ever made it get nearly everything down to a perfect character appropriate science and any spidey fan would be a disservice by passing this one up this isnt nostalgia talking either i didnt even get the chance to play this when i wa a kid i genuinely love this game a an adult though and think it surpasses even later spiderman game entry like i said the game is absolutely a great time it a great way to spend an afternoon and i cant stress enough how fan of spidey really not pas this one up it still worth a look to this day

first released sh might flawed unfinished download install version patch soon a install the gamethe graphic setting need configured when you first run the game a the default setting look pretty bad have fast computer and video card i run the game x wide screen supported the game the texture have much noise in giving a washed look also many of the indicator and dial dont use the full resolution simply scaled a lower resolution i think is they didnt want to play around the field of view change would be required they adjusted the scale to match the different resolution so the d look and feel is not spectacular but it is still goodthe game play is very well done with option to micromanage or automate quite a bit of it turning up the realism make torpedo run a difficult and hectic experience this game accurately simulates programming the tdc and the difficulty in making accurate estimate with the realism turned the way up evading enemy destroyer depth charge attack is pretty well modeled meaning it isnt easy not not impossible either the enemy ai is pretty good the time compression function is really nice allowing you to steam ahead standard speed and still complete a trip in a short period of actual time ive gone up a high a x normal speed it might go even higherwith the realism dialed this game is a lot like the old silent service from microprose in the you look at the map and see all the ship are torpedo attack are easy and you dont worry fuel or logisticsdont be afraid of this game at a good deal if you are interested in the genre

start review stating matter happens nothing opinion will replace amount fun trial error experience i world of warcraft come my mmo experience wow will always remain my favorite mmo of all time luckily finally finished campaign added the end original multiplayer review i good amount of gaming time franchise i already a big fan of cod i got bc i wa impressed with the lack of class customization and felt it not have much of a reply value i went back to cod mw a great game disappointed several way the turned damage made shootout short and unsatisfying team coordination made playing without friend frustrating select class combo made combat cheesy tac knife runner duel shotgun runner old javelin cheat i found frustrated fun and decided to stop playing mw my brother convinced to try the bc demo and day i wa hookedi wanted to point a highlight that separate game from mw and bcthe speed of the game is up to large map and lot of cover facilitate numerous playing style a lot of area that are le traveled and allow flanking maneuver sniper spot you are able to wait in cover for extended period of time allowing for more tactical movement or for the stealthy approach ive already chastised for camping something severely looked upon in mw the rule are different in bc establishing a defense and eliminating a threat no matter are is the name of the game thing like establishing a kill zone or stealing vehicle disturb the enemy operation tempo is a viable tactic for victorykits are better balanced and allow customization assault is the backbone for antiinfantry operation rifle are good balance of power accuracy and rate of fire rof they are able to carry a grenade smoke or dart shotgun launcher they are the source of ammo the battlefield engineer play several role they can repair vehicle well a can carry rocketsmines to destroy primary weapon is a silenced smg which is deadly for cqb and flanking maneuver the medic is the only source of healing and can revive downed teammate they carry a lmg and can a effective attacker or support gunner the sniper can be effective mean of disturbing the enemy distant they can specialize in a boltaction for longrange kill or a semiauto for more tactical ops they can be demolition expert with c or the mortar strike with the spotter scope they can provide quick recon data although customization is not even close to mw some option allow you to put different sight on weapon decide you want to carry more ammo have more accuracy or damage they now also allow class to carry a small selection of shotgun smg and riflesvehicles can play a major part in your victory but are only a good a the support a dedicated engineer with infantry support can ensure a tank can last the fight on the end a coordinated rocket attack or cmine strike could halt a tank advance depending on the map you can have a medium scale tank battle andor chopper supportdestruction is what set this game apart from every other fps youve played the battlefield is ever changing and you must adapt or die the game allows you to destroy almost everything and you find that good cover is a temporary convenience destruction will continually present you motorstorm simply put tour de force offroad racingeverything game is nextgeneration gritty car model the beautifully rendered vista to the online multiplayer racesmotorstorm feature a slew of different vehicle handling characteristic advantage and disadvantage youll race a big rig barreling mud and competition alike a atv carefully maneuvering in obstacle or a a rally car blasting along high speed or even a motorcycle necessary to avoid vehicle and mud and instead sticking to cliff ledge and jump the unique aspect to motorstorm is mix of element together and it work the game is challenging rewarding youll learn different terrain feature of track and learn where to use feature to the advantage of the vehicle usingmud cliff and jump are all important feature in this game lightweight vehicle are fast but fragile and dont perform well in mud heavy vehicle are slow and difficult to maneuver but slam through the lighter vehicle and breeze through muddy obstaclesthe graphic are breath taking and make you gasp you are on the cusp of going the edge crashing to a valley bellow the track feature deforming terrain that will become more and more challenging to traverse a you race track will also increase in challenge featuring everything from sheer cliff to jump and fast straightawaysmotorstorm also feature one of the best soundtrack heard a racing game featuring band like glucifer wolfmother and queen of the stone age the music fit the game perfectly and ramp a the racing get extremeonline play feature a thriving community even on the market for long frequent event and online racing league keep motorstorm alive the sony playstation network also feature several track and vehicle pack available for download that extend the single player experiencea must buy for the race fan

unfoldas i mentioned in the gtacomparison section the story flow really well and keep you hooked however the result of this is unlike game like oblivion or more obviously the wonderful infamous where your every action seems to change the world around you not the case in rdrthe ability to choose your mission selection mean that you might be at a ranch where everyone wa slaughtered and then an hour to gta but where a in gta wanted level equated to highspeed chase racing your stolen car through oncoming traffic narrowly avoid car wreck or not and a fantastic explosion in rdr it just riding your the singleplayer that opportunity for action to really effect anything other your fame or honor bar maybe if when you saved a guy life that guy had a name etc and he would buy you a drink every time playing regret i never got chance play the first one well fun far it the gem the review site said it is technically open world game confined within the boundary arkham city this work well the story it allows the developer extended liberty the villain are all working with inside the city and they are all worked fairly well despite the focus primarily the joker the story isnt really that hard to follow but i found losing interest sometimes because of all the different character are it also one of game you take two step back and one step forward every plot point task to go find freeze turn first running into the penguin ha actually captured freeze fighting all the penguin bad guy and finding freeze but then freeze cant help you you freeze a favor after you help freeze who help you then try to kill you another villain pop and you have to go chase batman also appears nonchalant running into various enemy however this keep thing fresh despite disjointed feel you run into robin killer croc and rescue vicki vale a helicopter crash sometimes i wish there dynamic in these interaction robin is there almost a lip service to the character you have the dlc you play a but is not a big part of the storythe game also suffers sometimes from i like to call random good guy appearance to save the situation mode you know where you are in trouble and then someone show up screen to save you i see it a a failure to take a risk with the character and it something have all seen way many time however the game have different ending based on a choice you can make a catwoman to either save batman not save batman it kind of interesting and a nice change of pace to give the player the option to choose a plot pointeverything the game you heard wa great is in factgreat so i wont spend too much time on them the gameplay is solid fighting mechanic are fun grappling and gliding around is fluid and look cool the gadget are cool a well a actually serving a purpose in the game you really feel like batman the game will often just leave you alone with idea of really where to go next thinking like batman will often get you of the situationthere are two thing i didnt like the environment is too dreary it not fun to explore like in other open world game you do a lot of backtracking but it difficult to recognize place the color palette is all grey black and dirty brown everything is crusted i think they went a little too far with the destruction of arkham i know it like that because of what is going on but i would prefer sacrificing of that for some color this also make the game graphically difficult to judge i dont think it graphically a good a red dead redemption environment or character model but it hard to judge the environment because everything is so downtrodden and the broken building start to look the inside and there is a certain part of the fighting system i dont like you have to beat up an enemy severely until you knock them out because batman dosnt kill people however he ha no problem breaking limb and landing punch that would probably cause brain damage anyway often they will lie on the ground unconscious but still able to get up you have to do a ground slam to finish them off imagine playing uncharted but then the guy you punch just lay there for awhile and then get back up the game compensates eventually letting you level up to perform critical strike critical strike are basically finishing move so you can string together a many a possible landing knock out blow however you can do this after a time combo where you then have to press x immediately after you finish one move and the next one this is actually more difficult it sound at later point in the game you will be surrounded by more bad guy if you button mash you almost do anyway because there are so many you will miss the critical strike thus you will be knocking guy out but they will get up and keep fighting you in the meantime you are being attacked by other guy the guy you just knocked out then come to fight you and you have to keep punching him some more until he finished i wish they would have just let you knock guy out after the first series of punchesbut if these issue do not bother you then the game is basically a ten a far a ten go

shadow heart story yuri hyuga young man the mysterious ability fuse with the spirit of monster defeat he commanded a mysterious voice to protect the life of alice elliot saw father torn apart rouen france is fleeing her life across mainland china the world hang in the balance the great magician of earth vie for power spy and magician young boy and vampire fight their side a unexpectedly complex story unfolds for the player set early in the japanese invasion of china world war the scene shift the mainland countryside to shanghai prague rouen and englandmy initial reaction to the game unenthusiastic disappointing shadow heart animation fall a bit short of is currently state of the art for rpgs the p is a bit of a shock to switch from xenosaga darkness heart to a typical standard for mainstream rpgs in addition the story and character get to a slow start without the benefit voiceover and cutscene continuity the fighting system us object called a judgment ring to determine the success of a strike take a while to grow familiar if the player stay with the game and wait the initial reaction gameplay becomes increasingly pleasurablealthough gameplay is linear the story is interesting with setting a varied a vampire castle and space ship player ha an array of special power from feng shui magic to bomb dropping plane a well a physical attack puzzle and maze abound which keep leveling entertaining for of the game and gradually animation and the use of cut scene and voice pick up the flow of the action becomes more and more engagingone of the reason i like this game is appeal to side of the player the combat half of the game is fairly straightforward master what you use and conquer the dreaded judgment ring the addition of a set of puzzle to worked out is a great plus while arent up to ffxs level can keep attention finally this isnt the kind of game that try to destroy the ego of the play the problem surmountable with the application of persistence i hear rumor of a possible sequel and looking forward to it
