tend divide fitness video game two category fun motion game like kinect star war kung fu live get workout course playing a game and pure exercise game designed the groundup to workout game in the world of pure fitness game far two contender the best the kinect shape fitness evolved and adidas micoachim happy to say that from ive seen far nike kinect training power way to the top of the list the accurate motion detection and interface of the workout game ive seen to date ha a truly innovative fitness test and put together workout routine that really feel personalized for youwhile the adidas game appearance animated version of recognizable athlete dwight howard and eric berry nike you have animated version of alex molden marie pervis best known a nike certified trainer although molden spend year in the nfl i found that fact that are actual trainer lends a bit credibility to the training a opposed to game hire big name athlete or pop star to drive salesthe concept of the game quite simple you start by selecting your goal such a get strong to increase your power and build explosiveness get toned to develop lean muscle and muscle definition or get lean to maximize calorie and fat burn you go a fitness assessment which youll get a customized circuit training routine to do the next four week in other video game i tried the assessment is really just smoke and mirrorshowever you do on your fitness test game give you the exact workout routine and call it a personalized one with nike kinect the workout i given really feel customized to exact goalsthe fitness challenge basically run you through a series of exercise using the kinect to measure both well your form is and how many rep of exercise youre youll see a video image of your animated trainer and a silhouette of next to or one thing to keep in mind is that you need a minimum of foot in front of your kinect sensor with a clear view of the floor and youll also need a good foot from left to right for certain exercise where youll be jumping from side to side edit have reported that foot is even enough for certain exercise in case you get stuck with the system unable to track you just use voice command xbox tracking to proceed with the exercise thanks to han for the tipeach exercise is similar in that youll see your trainer to the left of the screen and youll see a silhouette of your body to the right your silhouette will be orange first will glow blue youre using the correct form the kinect is extremely precise and did a great job of gauging whether i wa doing the exercise right each timethe first part of the assessment test your lower body and upper body mobility by you strike a pose first lying and raising each leg and then standing and stretching with your arm behind your backthe next part of the assessment ha you doing a variety of exercise from a hop and stick is the one that requires a ton of space from left to right a squat jump whats really cool this is that not the system judge your performance itll also give you detailed data that you try to beat each time you do the exercise for example the squat jump will tell you your vertical leap in inchestheres a cool exercise that test your speed reaction and agility where you have to hop and jump to various target on the ground youre also tested on squat pushup and high knee sprint i loved how you could set a benchmark and then try to beat it with each rep you do a bar on the bottom of the screen will show you how good your form is the more it fill up the better youre doing i also loved how the system displayed thing like time and rep it stylistically integrated into the background of the scenery in a way thats easy to read and ha a certain coolness factormotion sensing wa excellent something i always try to test with these kind of game i tried to throw it off several time but it seemed to do a great job of keeping up with meafter your evaluation youre given something called a unique fuel print interesting metric that track your fitness score on one side and your athleticism on the other side the test you basically establish a benchmark and then every four week youre given the same test to see how much youve improved i started with both number in the which i knew meant i had a lot of room for improvementyoure also set up with a custom week workout that focus on your goal a well a thing from your fitness evaluation that need improvement there a cool visual representation that show the system picking the right exercise for you the exercise in the workout routine are along the line of what i described doing various exercise where youre evaluated on how well your form and your execution are the virtual trainer doe give excellent feedback of your performanceat first i wa excited all the marketing material pointed to this game being tightly integrated into the whole nike system it turn out the integration is not very deep at all if you have a nike fuelband youll earn nikefuel playing this game just like you would doing any other exercise but other that there not direct connection interaction the fuelband and kinect training kinect training will sync in summary form to your nikepluscom profile so you can view your overall kinect training statistic on the site next to your fuelband statistic but thats itone thing i also love about the game is that it supported by kinect playfit so calorie burned will be counted along with all your other playfitcompatible gamesthe one thing i wish this title had wa more fun activity where you could get exercise by simulating real sport or activity this is something that other title such a your shape fitness evolved and ea sport active both have that provide some nice variety and diversion to keep the workout from getting monotonous nike training ha some of that there an interesting game where you need to move your body to avoid shattering a pane of glass thats coming toward you for the most part it still mostly like a virtual experience at a gym so if you have a tough time getting motivated to go to the gym every day chance are you might have a tough time keeping up with regular workout with this game that said the game doe basic training and exercise better than any game it and make a great addition to your kinect workout game collection

like action adventure shooting full suspense give cold fear try warned is rated mature get quite scarythe game is set a russian whaling ship middle of the ocean tossed really heavy wave you heavy rain falling around you obscuring vision and even dripping your monitor screen the entire ship lurch side side throwing you your foot swinging wire and cargo making hard to know if a quick movement is a threat an inanimate object face peer window and around cornersyoure a coast guard rescue person sent in on your to figure happened on the whaler you quickly discover that the ship is overrun zombie and your task is to get through door shoot zombie and save the innocent something have an issue with is that you end blasting away all the innocent russian shipworkers are afraid of the zombie and you can read russian fluently instead of calling out friend or something or trying to show you are a nice guy you end up in a shooting match and kill all coast guard rescuethe graphic in general are rather nice with a gritty constantlyinmotion feeling to them you try to peer through darkness see in flashing red light situation get a glimpse of something through the storm of rain and wavethe sound is immersive well you hear hint of movement noise amongst the crashing wave and blaring alarm it really test all of your sens to stay on your toe and stay aliveon one hand the overall map is small youre on one ship with three level and various room on the hand this is in fact a rather large ship and a lot of the puzzle involve you traversing from one end to the other in a series of fetch the handle or find the code key sort of missionshighly recommended fan of the horror genre for some zombieblasting funrating

review game awful im fan clive barker horror a gift cerificate had left money picking bioshock this game cheap enough use up the certificate still based the review here expectation pretty lowturns this wa a great game im not sure ive this happy game ive played the last year the game ive played in a year never crashed my computer the game gorgeous not that thats a big deal but is really pretty the ai is better ive seen in any game ever of course i game ai for a living maybe i look for different thing than people do the story is great the character are good the special power are neat etc i kept waiting to get to the bad part people didnt like but i never found it i really really liked this gameheres other people said the game is linearyeah theyre right it is and i normally hate linear game but i thought it worked here i suspect part of it to do with the story and the ai often have multiple path but many quickly lead to a dead end and ai ally are always pointing the correct one to take and giving you hint to to go you finish a room and your squad take position the tank hiding the side of the door the sniper hanging back and aiming at the door the healer playing midfield but out of the line of fire of incoming enemy etc this work the ai know where the next entrance is so maybe that only worked by making the level fairly linear and the linearity made sense in level these werent warehouse you wander you had a definite goal so not move straight towards it you cant save you wanti hate check point and expected to hate here but it save the game after every single battle so when else would you save it the only think you cant do is save in the middle of a battle and since skirmish wa fairly short why would you want to the game doesnt make you sit through cut scene after reloading with one exception and you just hit escape to skip it replayabilitythis game is just a replayable a any fps is to say not if you want you try different strategy you have multiple people to use after each with very distinct game play and are a bunch of unlockables but in my mind when bioshockhalflifefearany fps is over it over that said i think this might one of the few fps i play because i learned to use jones astral projection power late in the game and didnt use ghost bullet much and i want to go back and try repetitiveyou shoot a lot of thing here or burn capture etc thats pretty much what you do in fps this game wasnt any repetitive than bioshock halflife or the other famous fps there were some puzzle here mostly involving hopping body with astral projection there were several rhythm minigames which i didnt exactly love but werent long or frequent you always got to restart when you screwed up and it matched the onscreen action and the really different power made for lot of different way to handle a level stealth capture snipe suck health indirect fire with summons etc plus the boss all had little trick to figure out and if you didnt the ai character eventually gave you hintsi think that cover it the only thing i didnt see mentioned here is the squad action it not really a strategic squad game you can give subteams order but i never maybe that wa my fault this isnt an rts or rainbow the squad exists to give you choice of to play the fps a they also kill bad guy and resurrect people unless the healer get killed but they never do the one thing that win the game for you eg theyll tell you how to hurt the bos but wont take the bos out for you you hide they let the player get the killing blow in which is what they do i expected more squad action but thats not what kind of game this isall in all i kept wanting to hate it since so many people here seemed disappointed but this game wa simply awesome

playing mass effect known expect mass effect me i have to admit i blown away production value game this truly one of the immersive game ive ever played thanks small part to the cinematic cutscenes voiced dialogue wellwritten storyline far a the way the game progress basically identical to me the dialogue system is the the somewhat misleading option make say something almost completely different but add new feature interrupt certain sequence icon flash the screen sometimes a paragon action sometimes for a renegade action and you click the appropriate mouse button in time commander shepard will interrupt the dialogue and perform an action sure to keep hand on the mouse and be readywhere the game differs from me in a way that really streamlines the entire experience a you may have already heard is no conventional inventory to deal with rather you use weapon locker on the normandy and sometimes placed within a mission to assign weapon to your squad member in shepard private quarter on the normandy you can change your armor but there many choice of weapon armor to speak of so the maintenance is minimal squad member cant change armor except that eventually you can change appearance but not in a way that affect their ability it purely cosmetic one nice touch is that weapon use the same ammunition so youll never need to search for specific type of ammo anymorethe way skill point work also changed the level cap of you will end with point you spend point on or power and power ha rank the final rank unlocks your choice of one of two possible evolved version that are powerful such a the choice a powerful version of pull or pull field affect a group of enemy the power assigned to each class have also changed from the first game so be sure to review the difference choosing a class even if you import your me save game you can choose a new class before beginning the gamenow said all that i still have one big complaint the game and it actually similar to the complaint i made about me the way me is structured is thus after the initial event you are given two or three recruitment mission during which you pick up new squad member after these mission the next big step of the main story becomes available after this part is done you are given another handful of recruitment mission which again must be done before the next part of the main mission is availabledont get me wrong the individual mission are fun welldesigned and offer plenty of diversity of gameplay but at the same time almost felt like filler between the main mission of the story just a in me the actual main plot mission of me really are quite short and dont account for the majority of the game there are recruitment mission for almost every squad member dont join you from the beginning and subsequently each squad member ha a loyalty mission which is optional but very useful to and again they are wonderfully designed but if you count up the actual number of mission that deal directly with the main story there are about four or five each lasting hoursi understand that it is necessary to do mission to recruit your squad member but i didnt necessarily like that doing wa a prerequisite for advancing the plot what that amounted to wa doing a lot of what felt like side quest the main quest wa intentionally postponed of course i want to do these recruitment mission but it would have been better if allowed to do them at the same time a we progressed in the main storyline in other word pick up a squad member we want then do a main mission quest or two then go back and do another recruitment mission but a the game is designed you have to do these other mission first before you are allowed to progress the main story it ha the effect of making the main story seem sparse and spread thin across the span of the gamebut i give me five star simply it wa superbly designed and massively enjoyable i cant wait to play me

a japanese game even if you are not a fan of the style of art it is the perfect face for the game when you see it togetherthe battle system in the game is traditional rpg turn based format they use the turn based system to perfection are six character on screen in the front row in the back character in front can attack freely but character in the back row can only attack if they have long range charactes who cant attack from the back row can still function a fighter if they have a combo attack with another character this add a well rounded strategic element to the set up of a conventional purchased mykindle fire hd g lte wireless dolby audio dualband wifi gb one first accessory i intended purchase case a stand i deliberated model would suit best i purchased case the persimmon color mother shortly afterwards i wa sent the black case to review my research the various case fit my model this wa the one i expected to like the bestmy mother case arrived first my sister and i gave to with a new kindle fire hd for christmas her kindle worked well while i wa setting it for her i put it in her persimmon case soon a i put it in the case the kindle shut and would power back on removing the device from the case allowed the kindle to power on and remain examination of the problem led me to the conclusion that the case button that fit over the device power button must pressing on the power button enough to keep it from powering back on i sent this case back for a refundthen my black case arrived this case not the issue inserting the kindle in the case did not cause it to shut downi have three different case for my kindle and i have to say that this my least favorite the one thing i like better this case is the way that it hold the tablet this case fit the kindle a a shell and the tablet snap easily it inserted the case hold the kindle securelyunfortunately using the case a a stand feel rather flimsy it really doesnt have anything to keep it in place and it slide on slick surface when press command on the tabletalso when the case is used a a stand it doesnt allow for the charging cable to be plugged inbetween the experience with my mother case and mine i have to say i think the best this case deserves is three star instead i recommend theverso darwin crocco standing cover for kindle fire hd red patent fit kindle fire hd which hold the tablet securely function well a a stand and also allows the plug to stay attached when using it in stand mode

credo hope first entertaining series featuring police detective alexandra wolfe part police procedural part mystery deft touch comedy is well written novel with an interesting story likeable charactersalex and partner casey called a case a prostitute shot a young girl injured and the suspect is in the wind going to take hard work and a bit of luck to track alex cant resist her best friend plea to take a cold case involving a death row inmate investigating on her time alex manages put her bos offside and to step on a toe including of the prada shod mafia bos giannina angelino despite assaulted shot kidnapped and harassed alex is determined to follow every lead and see justice donei enjoyed the multi layered plot spear headed alexs official and unofficial investigation holts own experience a police officer is evident in the detail the investigative process to the physical confrontation are also interesting subplots a caseys ongoing argument with another detective mr highland and alexs accidental involvement with the local mafia there is sense of crowding despite the action and the pacing is well handled the dialogue is well written snappy and realistic and generally the standard of writing is high there a few occasion where thought the writing could a little tighter i think would benefit from an experienced editor to provide a final gloss of professionalism to the manuscriptholt display real strength in developing a cast of realistic dynamic character all of are appealing alex is smart and grounded with enough attitude to make hard choice the right reason her phone call with her mother give u some idea of where ha come from but it is her interaction with her friend colleague and dog tessa tell u she is alex belief in her job evidenced by her determination to follow her case wherever may lead despite threat to it a mix of stubborn bravery and dogged resolve that make alex an admirable detective and loyalty and sas that make her an appealing protagonistas alexs best friend megan provides a lot of the laugh but also reveals alex lighter side she is a wonderful foil to the serious aspect of the story and provides a believable impetus for alex to involve herself in the brian mcclelland case i also enjoyed many of the supporting character including alexs beleaguered bos kate and nurse maddy and carlocredos hope is a great read and an impressive start to this self published series im really glad i took a chance on it and recommend it unreservedly to fan of the genre im hoping to read the second installment credo legacy a soon a i the opportunity

received free copy book author exchange honest reviewhillarys happy life vanishes the night father start molest rape her month of agony confides in her mother refuse to help her alone and angry hillary discovers a new friend inside her head who know exactly to make everyone listen to herin book one see the psycho that hillary became and real sympathy for her her action this prequel novel show how a good normal teenage girl becomes that twisted monster of the abuse she subjected to her gradual descent madness wa gripping and compelling seeing the girl sympathy for inflicting horrific cruelty her family and former friend i no sympathy for michael or kathy for part in hillary appalling experience but i felt sorry for her brother and sister who really had done nothing wrong and poor storm i couldnt even read that scene because i love beagle and i didnt want to see in printwe get opportunity to see kind of girl hillary wa the abuse and how michael reign of terror affected firstly kathy and daughter kathy a sympathetic figure the start of the book you see the monster that michael wa manipulating violent bullying leaving her no self esteem or mind of her it is when she betrays her daughter that sympathy for her ended hillary is a bit of a pantomime villan the book and i laugh at a of her twisted comment the torture sure what that say my personalitythis book appeal to horror fan who like the jack ketchumedward lee kind of twisted gorefest the plot before is brutal and gory with scene of rape incest cannibalism torture and death you dont have a strong stomach dont go there im looking forward to seeing the continuation of hillary story and will also keen to see what else the author writes in the future

ancient bloodline and the vampire turned milkwood let back secondthirteenyearold malcolm first introduced in jay ridlers short story blood sawdust in his collectionknockouts ten tale of fantasy and noir and his older brother make meager living betting the underground fight circuit his brother in strictly for the money but malcolm is a true fan who know all the fighter least thought he didthat the night he saw milkwood fight for the first time short pudgy a face a mother could love and thats taking a beating milkwood wa utterly annihilated in his fight a human punching bag who absorbed an inhuman amount of punishment dragged the back door of the fight club and left for dead malcolm figured hed seen the first and last of milkwoodso imagine malcolms surprise only a few hour later he run a milkwood who is only conscious and vertical but who look like one ever laid a finger on much le a beating of epic proportion malcolm begin to piece thing together when he realizes he actually seen milkwood fight before except it wa a masked character billed a stretch armstrongwho wa also beat to hell and back in fact in attendance night four month ago sure stretch suffered a broken neckmalcolm know he dealing with something unusual but not until milkwood dispatch in a particularly gruesome manner one involving teeth and a throat a thug trying to rough malcolm up that malcolm truly understands milkwoods secret far scared malcolm hatch a plan to use milkwoods vampiric strength and healing ability to their advantage him enter a big fight tournament a a massive underdog one theyll bet everything on and make a small fortune brings u back to lashturns out shes being hunted by a nasty piece of work named dizzy colt an eighteenth century demon and want to hire milkwood a her bodyguard though not everyday employment opportunity it still seems straightforward enough that is until malcolm realizes his mother disappearance five year ago is somehow tied into the whole mess and that he not who he always thought he wasfolks is not your sister sparkly vampire story instead of going with the in vogue idea of vampire a sexy and seductive ridler ha chosen to approach thing from the opposite end of the spectrum examining an average ugly guy handle immortality in ridler draw on his knowledge and love of wrestling underground fight club comic book and history the man a phd to give milkwood a complicated but ironically enough mundane set of problem to deal with he still running into the guy who bullied him in high school albeit with a slightly different outcome and rift with parent arent magically healed with immortality eitheralong the way ridler pepper in an intriguing backstory for lash and her family could be another book waiting to spring from that well bringing an element of the supernatural to the table beyond one would typically expect to find in a vampire tale combine that with truly bonecrunching fight scene a colorful cast of supporting character and an epic final showdown and youve got a bloody recipe for success

need a keyboard kindle a great one case fit either the kindle fire hd the kindle fire hdx have the latter modeli use the tablet is versatile also small convenient the beauty the belkin qode is it add the functionality of a keyboard while also serving a protective case and manages keep the kindle lightweight sothe qode is a combination of a nice case and a thin highly functional keyboard although new for kindles belkin similar product line for ipads already in storesthe box include the casekeyboard combo a microtousb charging cable and a user manual the manual is basically a card and contains little informationthe exterior is a synthetic leatherlooking material it seems to of good quality and durable the case fold the front of the kindle while the tablet sits in the case the back fully covered the case us a magnetic closure is different bigger brother which fit the kindle model ha elastic strap which secures the case closedthe case interior is covered with a soft material the easel which hold the kindle is plastic the qode be positioned two viewing angle and yes you can still use the tablet in portrait mode the keyboard is landscape of course the key large enough to type without difficulty i a man with goodsize hand dont have issue typing or hitting key accidentally due to keyboard size it is a smaller keyboard though a it ha to fit the kindlethe keyboard is super thin so kudos to belkin on making a bluetooth keyboard product which add functionality but doesnt increase bulk much at allthe case pair easily to the kindle kindle button and port are accessible in the case the keyboard is well thought and ha a couple of nice feature such a a microphone key and a browser key it also ha a home key which can double a a lock key when used with the function key key are save cut paste updownletright and volume updown basically it a nice way to type on the kindle but still use tablet tap commandscharging the battery is done the included usb charging cable ac adapter included the charge is separate from the kindle so you can leave the keyboard and turn it on only when you need it if you like the case put the kindle to sleep and wake it when closedoepenedthis is bluetooth so you can pair it with other device keep in mind it is made specifically for the kindle so for example you can certainly pair it with something else but youd be able to use it only a a freestanding keyboard a caseoverall this is a nice case i have a couple of minor gripe with it which keep it from being a i would have preferred that the case interior not become part of the bottom of the stand when in viewing mode this to seems like it will accumulate dirt over time and since it the case interiorehi also am not crazy the way it fold when closed it not close like a portfolio but like a trifold wallet i realize this necessary a a concession to the keyboard but i am concerned that the keyboard could come in contact with the kindle screendont get me wrong i thoroughly enjoy the qode i just think it very nice a opposed to perfect

husband i really really like that series allhad to read of the booksand felt compassion and understanding for the male protagonist and the twist and turn of that series in addition to writing really innovative and exciting plot in unique setting rabi a gift for clever ironic dialogue evidenced the following exchange captured sworn enemy my secret loveryou shouldnt smoke say handing me onewhat itll kill me how i hope tomorrowthis book may seem to a bit of a slow start but the setup is the prelude to a kissamong other steamy thingswith lot of love to sweeten the deal i dont know how realistic the detail of this book are knowing nothing the setting time and so on i know it is a surprisingly good for a person doesnt readwatch thing related to war gritty emotional read with twist after repeated unwanted sexual advance from supporting male character militant leanne loses it in an entirely hilarious and empowering scene stand for and swears vociferously the entire time rather quote overly much ill share this shortly after that scene the protagonist megan watch leanne smoke and update her view of her bad pixieif are a literary thrillseeker who love character in jeopardy romance falling in love dynamic action situation that are unlike daily life with plot line that mirror the complexity and sexy sometimes violent aspect of humanity and life you love eve rabis book page end i reflected wa star book surprising m pruitts book star the way the last page pulled the rug and left me dizzy gasping and disoriented a great book and what a great writer lm pruitts book are anything but formulaic contrived character voice importantly the narrative voice authentic would swear that you are witnessing the actual event unfold you ala unscripted reality tv is a thing capture all such a manner that you feel the longing the heartbreak the laughter and the yearning right beside character because you are so mesmerized the character cari mike jamie et althe twist and turn in the plot are even more unexpected i found this story to intimate family study pack cari the heroine is a wolf is unsurprisingly an antiheroine and not a harmonious extension of the pack because she is not a shifter but rather a healer she is poised to more effective the outside of pack mindset she be able to solve problem from another perspective despite the advantage of ability and position this relationship her neighbor and loved one is not meant to be too many event and tragedy damaged her bond of trust and love cari and mike heartbreak is everyones heartbreak but a the member of the pack reveal layer of story soon realize that every man woman and wolf have experienced damage none fully healed and inevitably accepted a the difficult process of living i want to read the next story today i need to know what happens all of physically and emotionally damaged people great writing m pruitt

another review rating starswhen ex con jeremy stillson end begging money street corner boulder colorado idea life change he spy looming figure rance crawford heading towards the nearby yarn shop instead of money rance offer him a job that come a small room to call his in the alpaca barn fiber mill that rance owns is the chance jeremy ha wanted a way to honest and to go straight leaving the illegal lifestyle behind that he learned from his conman of a father a father died when a con went badbut living a honest life doesnt necessarily mean jeremys past is gone with the old lifestyle rance turn jeremys training to a young gorgeous man named aiden a master color and yarn dye even a teenager aiden is everything jeremy ha always wanted to be and jeremy idolizes the teenager from the first moment meet year year jeremy slowly adjusts he learns to love his new life he learns to knit and gain a family with the people he work with at the alpaca ranch and importantly he fall in love with aiden a aiden age and matures a wonderful young manjeremys feeling of insecurity and low self esteem never gone away and when aiden start to return his affection jeremy is petrified jeremys first instinct to run rabbit away aiden ha jeremy figured when aiden first met jeremy one of the thing he taught him how to hold a angora rabbit to make feel secure it be petted and brushed so when jeremy show sign of rabbiting away aiden know exactly he ha to to keep the one man he ha wanted from running away and make him trust in aidenwhat a wonderful story be the first to admit that amy lane is a go to author for amy lane book to me mean an outpouring of human emotion from character so real i expect to meet on the street an amy lane story mean that the situation and event character find entangled in come across so authentic so genuine that empathy but my heart is engaged from the beginning they weep i find sobbing along a well and when they find joy then my heart feel replete with happinesshow to raise an honest rabbit knitting brings back the character learned to love in the winter courtship ritual of furbearing critter knitting present and accounted for are rance crawford owner of the alpaca farm and yarn mill ben mccutcheon rances lover and neighbor aiden fabric designer extraordinaire and ariadne shop manager and spinner and of course jeremy the first story in the knitting series gave u rance and ben courtship from pov with the character circling around like satellite albeit family member satellite and a much a we learned to love ariadne and rory her husband it wa jeremy and aiden we kept returning to and we wanted to know their story and thankfully amy lane give u that and in how to raise an honest rabbitit wa hysterical to see rance and ben meeting and courtship from the other side so to speak a rances meeting with jeremy predates ben moving in next door but the heart of story is jeremy his pain born out of his past and his slow emergence into the man he wanted to be but never thought possible jeremys history is heartbreaking in that amy lane way mean the angst of his past is brought vividly home to the reader but in small subtle way that build over the length of the story into a horrific portrait of a young boy lost to society at the earliest of age we learn in tiny increment about the jar of peanut butter jeremy ha stashed so he always ha something to eat and the true reason he talk so much yet value silence and the awful fact that jeremy doesnt even know his real name the story is told from jeremys pov which is so important a we hear his thought about his life his panic attack his growing affection for aiden and everyone else around himand a we learn about jeremy we are also creating a strong picture of aiden a well from aidens interaction with rance overheard conversation and his talk with jeremy we watch a young fiber genius mature into a man who realizes that patience and perhaps ear plug are the way to capture the skittish man he ha fallen in love with it wa aidens careful loving interaction with jeremy that made me fall in love with aiden completely and with ariadne a well really is an endless stream of gem that i could be quoting from the story but that would take away of the magic to be found from discovering them on own a i didand finally a a knitter myself i loved every aspect of knitting that appears here from the carding machine noise to the method ariadne used to teach jeremy to knit and his own rhyme he made up there are the dye vat color card and description of how the colored strand can be spun in different manner ending up a completely different yarn and i dont think have to be a knitter to find this information fascinating it just is but i love the pattern for the fingerless mitten at the end yes i did and will try my hand at making a set this winterthere is another knitting series book on the horizon knitter in his natural habitat knitting johnny and stanley story i cant wait in the meantime i will just shuffle and reload winter courtship ritual back onto my kindle and start from the beginning more a i waithere is the order the book written and be readthe winter courtship of fur bearing critter knitting super sock man knitting how to raise an honest rabbit knitting knitter in his natural habitat knitting coming in november cover by catt ford are not the most adorable cover ever i heart them all

going wait to post review needed to posted somewhere i received arc exchange this anyone know know i wont mince word i dont care mother if i dont like something im going to tell youin interest full disclosure this review get underway it need to be known that i actually friend gina maxwell making that statement isnt one of oh arent i special thing it needed to be said before i let my thought regarding the latest installment of fighting for love series roam free told me that she wa writing character that wa a victim of sexual abuse i cringed a bit she writes romance steamy romance shes damn good itif youve the privilege of reading seducing cinderella rule of entanglement you know this her hero are strong and sexy and her heroine are actually likable this a huge thing for me when it come to romance nothing put a sour taste in my mouth quite like a milquetoast woman that swoon just because the hero say she i knew that when it came time for book number three it would be amazing but i previously stated when it wa set that the heroine would a background riddled with moment that human should live i felt my stomach turn i didnt doubt that she could pull it in the least gina is one of those author that labor every word she writes every syllable meaning i wa worried wa actually reading itin the interest of yet disclosure i wa a victim of sexual and domestic abuse this isnt a sob story about me that is just an important piece of the review im a ten year survivor and am always anxious to encourage people to stand up and speak living through something like rape and physical battery is something that one eventually come to term with but are still scar scar that you fight like hell nearly every day to get over when it come to learning to love or even more arduous learning to love youre fighting an uphill battle one that need to be handled carefully patiently and passionatelykat macgregor is the human equivalent of a bait dog abused in the worst possible way every move she make is calculated and every moment is spent looking over her shoulder working a hopeless job in a dive bar with survival in mind shes confronted with a looming debt that her pathetic excuse for an exboyfriend owes to a notsonice man that make money peddling drug and exploiting woman constantly avoiding her sister the one person that could help her out of the louisiana swamp and wipe her slate clean kat eventually find trusting in aiden irish obrien the bar bouncer little she know that wa sent there her sister fianceacute the hero gina maxwell nd book to keep an eye herbut irish doe more keep an eye on her throughout the narrative see that he is just a scarred but from dramatically different cut a former mma fighter irish blame his fist and his temper for the accidental death of his best friend sister because of this guilt he refuse to get close to anyone but there is something about kat that settle deep his soul and he go and beyond to protect her to save her life irish doe the one thing he swore he would never again fightas the hero is based on the obnoxiously aesthetically pleasing adam von rothfelder picturing irish wa easypeasy but what make the character quite literally the sexiest man ive ever seen on paper is his attitudeno one ever asks to fall in love with someone that ha more baggage than a kardashian and when irish discovers the abuse that kat ha survived the reader literally see switch gear a man that wa interested in keeping her safe and maybe engaging in horizontal action doe everything in his power to bring kat out of the shadow it no longer becomes about him and his need yes there is sex in this book oh mother is there sex and it melt panty and possibly whatever surface you are sitting on it is hot but every interaction is meaningful every single solitary lick and touch is irish way of showing kat that not every man hurt her and that sex be about her not the person thats using her but actually her the dialogue the two of is scintillating and refreshing it isnt just hey my dick is hard and you know you want me to place it somewhere in person there actual conversation real meaningful everyday people working way over a hurdle together conversation the tenderness between character is unbelievablewhat is more magical about this book is that gina capture kat journey from broken to beautiful in the glorious way the reader will actually watch her transform and the only word that i can use to describe it is autobiographical there entire paragraph from kat point of view i had to put the book and take a deep breath because i felt like i wa reading a diary it hurt but it wa the best kind of hurt because it wa illuminating abuse survivor run the gamut of emotion and one of the most damaging is their willingness to blame for the bad thing that happened to them kat morphs from a terrified caterpillar in an iron cocoon to the most spectacular butterflyfighting for irish is the kind of book everyone deserves to read there is joy there is pain there is sex i mention the sex ducttape your ear shut because your brain may possibly melt and trickle out that goodive used a plethora of word in this review but really the only one that count are these this book is spectacular ginas reader and anyone who love alpha with huge heart will now have a new favorite in their library were this book not already perfect i would love it simply because of the dedication gina dedicates it to victim of sexual abuse encouraging them to never stop fightingthis book is a manifesto giving the broken a glimpse to that someday when if keep fighting and never loose hope their irish will happen tooless

father is a agronomist who spending the year in afghanistan to help develops way to feed country marina is going to aptos california to live her aunt abby and her cousin cruz in their little seaside right word to summarize and review the book ive read i dont know a blog thats creating loss for word in my writing just temporary mental block but hopefully it go away soon anyway back to the reviewthis book is really of a star but i dont half rating since i copy my review to my different profile it easier to stay with solid star since thats the site use i actually found two thing i think detracted from what is an otherwise well written and interesting story however one of them just big that it dropped my rating considerablythe first thing that bothered and this is actually the smaller one wa that the character seemed to this inside joke that wa never explained to the reader there multiple scene with giggling character where i didnt really understand what wa so funny to the character in this novel there apparently something hilarious about the statement thats what she said i didnt get it and there nothing worse than on the outside of a joke okay well there is but it still suck youre left outthe thing that i thought wa the major flaw with this book wa the mary sue tendency of the character and their lifestyle werent quite perfect but they darn close at first i wasnt going to ding this book so hard for this but it wa her father winning the nobel prize that kind of put it over the top for me marina traveled extensively attending online school her father is only a brilliant agronomist a job that to honest id never heard of reading this book but also hold a faculty position at a prestigious university apparently he powerful enough that marina get her way on her class just mentioning name to the school guidance counselorshe is brilliant and is only attending high school because her father feel shes independent and need to learn to be around her peer it pretty apparent that one really expects her to learn anything new academically there let not forget thats shes beautiful and mystical wellher neighbor who pretty much adopted her to the point shes referred to a aunt evie is a retired fashion model who dress marina is prada and other top of the line designer just because she enjoys it if that werent enough with this flamboyant character she ha a basement full of expensive car that she let marina learn to drive on and oh shes the original fashion it girl not to mention the fabulous evie spends her time searching out hidden talent in fashion and music and helping them succeed in the business i seriously need an aunt evieher cousin cruz though a social outcast is a brilliant but a of yet undiscovered fashion designer his best friend meghan is a song writer with the amazing voice and cant forget that evan the boy who fall for marina is the hottest and most respect guy in school he the best surfer on the beach work all the time to achieve his future and adores the perfect marinai planned to mention this from about the introduction of aunt evie but i hadnt planned to make a big of a deal of it in my review until dad the nobel prize thats just what put it over the top for me the only negative thing really in the character life is that ethan doesnt have a lot of money and his mother ran when wa only a kid cruz is a social outcast and believe his father died in a car crash when he wa a baby only to learn later that his father wa a married man who tried paying his mother to abort meghan is overweight and also a social outcast and finishing out the social outcast crew is marina who mother died in child birth it a if the writer ha found a couple flaw she like and just attributed them to every characterthe book however is extremely well written fast paced and a quick and enjoyable read the plot ha some interesting twist and turn that keep reader turning the page the only thing i think the writer need to learn is that perfect character may lead wonderful life but it harder for a reader to relate to character whose life they envy than a character who ha just a many issue a they do overall though i really enjoy reading this book and i would recommend it to others who enjoy young adult urban fantasy novel it an excellent debut novel from a writer i look forward to reading more of there an obvious talent in the writing and the ability to weave a page turning story i only hope that the character become a little more believable in future work

disclaimer received book author part rr the lover of paranormal goodreads group this doesnt affect review the following my honest opinioni started midnight knowing inspired the story of cinderella and looking forward a retelling of the fairy tale unlike reviewer it wa actually the prologue caught guard i knew the series wa interconnected the way that jennifer blackstream chose to so me intrigued from the first sentence i wa surprised in a very good way and the initial intrigue me devouring the book itselfand cinderella meet werewolf sound like a delicious combination to methe story of loupe and etienne share some of the theme of the original cinderella and i feel like it could fine without i loved the idea of the ball and the twist m blackstream put the slipper i thought it wa a very creative idea and retelling that wa never predictable the character created intriguing i itching to know the other prince in the prologue and etienne and loupe dynamic in way might argue that loupe wa timid and weak but i felt that the growth and development wa logical and made sense considering her upbringing and history she is a kind woman and i say im a sucker for puppy and her empathy for them had me smiling and a handsome prince playing cute little animal extra point for the adorable on the subject of etienne wa a very interesting prince i have a weakness for werewolf and m blackstream put a very fun spin on them with her first prince dual nature and his struggle to handle his emotion a a human left me wanting to know more of himmy gripe are that it wasnt long enough in several part made it feel a little rushed i wanted more of them both and more background to it some of the scene and some of the character would have in my opinion benefited from more time on the page loupe stepmother had me wondering id have liked to know she and loupe father ended together more of she come from my hope is that a the series build might have some answer to question im left ponderingoverall though it wa a great read a fun story with character that interested me and left me hoping to see them even only in brief snippet in later book i recommend it it wa worth the read

alaina howard enters office one morning find previously unoccupied desk home to rather good looking man exchanging a pleasantry jordan blake alaina go to her uncle to try find a man with little to computer experience now working department although her uncle explains reason alaina leaf his office with question answer surprised jordan take abehis service dogfor a walk alaina find the more see her new office mate the deeper the mystery around grow caught somewhere curiosity and suspicion a volatile mix of emotion grow around alaina and jordan creating a bond neither denyquite a number of time throughout the book found alaina came across judgmental like her outwardly showing distaste jordan when she assumes incorrectly he going outside for a smoke when she again leap to conclusion that jordan isnt blind no need for his service dog instant reaction in respect understandable left with the impression that anything crystal clear make alaina react with suspicion and distaste hit me particularly when she asked jordan to leave his service dog behind when they go to the movie although alaina didnt know much jordan relies abe for his physical and emotional health the fact he kept his dog with him every minute for the week of time theyd spent together tipped her to a monumental thing requesting he left behind wa it felt unthinking of her like she assumed she knew better than jordan didi didnt find alaina to be anything like the common heroine but this made me more intrigued a to the plot and interaction would go none of her reaction were aggressive enough for me to dislike her character but it wa a brave move on the author behalf writing her like this and one that i feel strengthens the conflict within the story instead of a wishywashy sunshineandroses style of book a lot sharper and more realistic i really liked this and found difference in plot excellent some reader however mightnt feel the and might find it difficult to relate to alainai also particularly liked how jordan wasnt average hero ha made it back after time in the army he not lost a limb or got disfiguring scar and need the nurture and love of a good woman to make it right instead he got a more difficultand uncommonproblem to deal with that of anxiety post traumatic stress disorder and a mixed bag of other issue again i thought this wa a brave and excellent sidestep what could have become a story like many others it made the plot feel fresh and deeply interesting to see how alaina and jordan would deal with thing i found turning the page and deeply sunk the story engrossed for looking for a sweet story that break out of the more traditional role one expects this could well be a refreshing and wonderful readoriginally posted long and short review

molly parker used dwag dart wife girlfriend finding husband famous pro dart player paul bad lad parker also a naughty lad behind her back decides to divorce she need a new life somewhere far far away painful memory and her unfaithful husband she leaf england and move to tenerife her best friend franfor a thing couldnt be perfect shes beautiful exotic place starting a fabulous new life finding a job she love oh and to forget shes soontobemarried this time to absolutely hot and charming spanish guy antoniowell her friend seem a bit surprised shes getting married so soon after her divorce but just cant stop love right she love antonio doe she maybe deep inside shes just trying to get her revengeyou might think molly is one lucky lady and that finally she found her paradise earth thought so but trouble walk paradise her exhusband paul show out of the blue saying still love her and want her backdecisions decision decision she choose to be with at the endtoo much trouble paradise is a lovely chick lit book and i lot of fun reading molly is sweet and loveable character though at time absolutely torn and confused but then again who wouldnt feel this way in her shoe i admire the fact she had the courage to start a new life and her smile back so soon after the divorce i loved her energy optimism and big heart the two men in this story oh they will really get you crazy i admit i didnt like paul at the beginning he seems to enjoy fame too much and is not bothered with molly feel the female fan stalking him however you will see softer side later on a for antonio i found him absolutely adorablei thoroughly enjoyed this book great chick lit that will relax you make you smile and dream of sunny island cocktailsand dart

complicated romance dani and rus setup the perfect entertaining storyline initially this is the sort of book that is easy to get absorbed in however is the latter morethan half of the book dani get kidnapped the council of supernatural that provided a steady decline in the amusing factorwith it familiar idea it come a surprise that there would be something off the story despite the homey feeling stirred with the paranormal creature that inhabit it world the worldbuilding is really nothing special it a little bit of modernlifestyle thrown together with a very subtle historic feeling when the council of supernatural is introduced there is a lot of room future development i think the story could benefit for the rest of the series other that the world is neither interesting worth remembering perhaps somewhere in betweenthe plot isnt much better off after the kidnapping the story pick quite rapidly in it emerging event and not in a good way much happening in the span of feel like all of ten minute dani get kidnapped the council is introduced the seer is introduced the prophecy told all with the love triangle the center of attention the storyline soon becomes overcrowded with unexpected plot twist and turn which in another story presented a different way i would have jumped at the chance to talk about but not with this too much unnecessary angst and the endless description and overcomplications of every decision dani make the epic and mysterious plot that the description offer is unfortunately reduced to a tedious banalitymore than the plot dull it is the love triangle that made this read so frustrating for and perhaps the only book i wholeheartedly favour the second guy the first rus it for me with easy goingdemeanor and his loyalty towards dani to the point where his character is the only character that garnered sympathy and affection from me i loved dani and rus and the bestfriendstolovers romance is a favourite of mine which is when gabriel the seer is brought the picture i lost all semblance of open mind about this book the love triangle failing played in part to all the extreme change in the story dani go from being a snarky intelligent girl to a helpless blindbylove fool the romance is cheesy confusing and definitely not worth rooting for i couldnt wrap head around the gabrieldani couple all i did not come to appreciate gabriel character no spunk no allure rather he come across a meek not a character that get my immediate attention by the middleend of the story i found it difficult to invest in any of the character and ultimately gave up trying to find a final redeeming quality there is a lot more that could be said for the impossibility that this love triangle is but to sum it up it is beyond frustratingwith that said i believe chameleon is the type of read that work only for people have the right mindset and patience for a love triangle and all the conflicting emotion that it brings if not for that addition to the storyline this could have been a worthwhile read nonetheless despite my reservation i still hoping that ungifted will prove to be what it predecessor is not memorable with no i wish a little a possible mention of the love triangle keeping my finger crosseda copy wa provided by the author for review

short book one certainly pack a punch emotional roller coaster tell story portia whose husband unborn child cruelly taken a violent home invasion two year later still hasnt completely recovered from the trauma her recovery from the attack and subsequent coma mentioned the story pick two year later and offer a brief description of portias tragic pasther best friend try help her cope planning a th birthday party that go horribly wrong she meet the handsome brock that she start to explore the possibility of starting overthe steamy love scene are appropriate to the story without sensational it is a believable premise and portias heartache and loss are realistically portrayed really feel for her character and the unfair event that happened to her really tug heart you really cheer her blooming romance the hunky brock and hope for a happy ever for the sad heroinei initially a hard time with the best friend insistence that portia go and find someone new but since it ended up being she needed to heal it worked out fine brock could have used a little detail and depth but for a short story the character were illustrated best could the short amount of storythis a great short read that kept the edge of seat waiting to see what would happen to the unfortunate portia in the end wa rooting for her the whole way i wanted to see much she wa going to have to go through life wa finally going to give her the happiness she wantedalthough the book wa a short one it manage to include high emotion creepy suspense and steamy romance plus the promise of a happy ending for portia with brock it would be nice to see another story featuring portia possibly telling her back story in more detail you get the sense that she wa truly in love with her husband and that murder and her subsequent miscarriage really devastated her it is nice to see a story that deal with love loss and happiness in a believable wayif you are looking for a sweet happy story this probably isnt exactly what you have in mind considering the depth of the material but read it anywayit is definitely worth it and show the author great skill with her character and storyline sandra ross delivered another great read with real substance and i highly recommend it to anyone looking for a short satisfying tale

bad book not bad allthis story friendship about loving letting go kept glued seat finishedjustine james is a singer dream becoming famous someday shes fast losing hope band failsafe cant seem to make the usual crappy pub and barsone night she meet her idol the one musician shes always admireddillon pierce is the guitarist of the outlaw rover the band hed started best friend ash thoren hit it big when they got signed and at the topwhen dillon allows to dragged ash to this crazy party ha idea one meeting forever change his lifejustine and dillon connect the first instant and he impressed with her voice when they leave tour the failsafe go with justine ha now the chance to make someone notice herwhat she hadnt expected from this experience wa to fall lovedillon is actually a nice guy and i could see she fell when they first met she expected him to be arrogant and condescending he is famous but he actually listens to her and seems to really like spending time together he ha issue but in a way he managed to work them at least not allow them to condition his future much his flaw is his weakness when it come to his best friend in a way i think he feel indebted to ash and ha a hard time saying no to him even when he know that theyre is wrong and selfdestructivejustine ground them even only temporarily so they seem to be better around her or at least they try for her sake not to stupid thing and upset herjustine shes a strong girl know what she want when dillon break her heart and over she prefers to walk away and not allow him to destroy her and she doesnt give in to life stylethe important thing for her or the second most important is music shes pretty levelheaded and determined it wa interesting to follow the evolution of her relationship with dillon that kind of friendship is quite rare especially when stronger unrequited feeling are involved they manage to keep on the safe line and when dillons world fall apart shell be the one who rescue himwhile the book is not exceptionally well written i think the author awesome job in delivering the message that true friendship is a precious thing and it survive and grow and overcome all the obstacle let not forget that this is her first novel so great job amanda i really enjoyed it and i really think give it a tryhappy reading

love letter new hot the press christian historical romance dex stantonsinglehandedly saved family homestead his father desertion the time he wa the man the family he choice but stay home from school a dozen year later his family wa only his brother his brother wa married a ready made family and packing wagon to move on to kansa and the wide open space dex hadnt wanted to move on quite yet but hed lost hope the woman he loved would even look at himdexs new venture wa to find a mail order bride to his companion he established a new homestead on the prairie that required writing a letter two and then reading they arrived back he had always had a difficult time reading the word seemed to get all jumbled up and blurry spelling hurt his head rachel never had problem wa reading circle around by the time she wa six but he needed help to improve his letter writing or he would never find himself a bride rachel oliver wa assisting his nephew with his reading problem and finding successful way to help him he dare risk disgust when she find stupid he is to ask her helprachel oliver had always excelled her school study but now she wa at a crossroad she had hoped past couple of year she would attract dexs attention but he never seemed to notice her her mother wanted rachel to go on to college meet cultured people and perhaps meet a welltodo man to settle with rachel enjoyed academic study and seemed she no longer had a choiceuntil a momentary impulsive kiss changed everythingi enjoyed the story much that wanted to read the story wa heart warming and charming but much short in length in the kindle edition is a sneak peek the next book of series a bride for keep im looking forward to finishing the full length novel soon
